story:
Bring Dharavi Back to Life!

We rise by lifting others

Robert Ingersoll

Dharavi was first put on the global map with the success of the multi Oscar winning movie, ‘Slumdog Millionaire’. It’s first ‘local to global’ brand Dharawear will again catapult this famous slum located in Mumbai to a global stature, and more importantly bring income and livelihood to its pandemic affected workers. Dharawear will undertake its full manufacturing here, including tarnishing, cutting, and packaging. Among the products are 100% genuine leather, premium quality, ride-ready bomber jackets at unbelievably low prices.

IDEA ABOUT CHANGE:

As a group of individuals, we have decided to come together and help Dharavi craftsman to fight this pandemic situation by launching an exclusive range of leather products globally. Our team of skilled fashion designers started working with these craftsmans to bring their dream into reality. We groomed them at such a extent that they can outperform in global market. Now we are in a position to come up with an exclusive international brand "DHARAWEAR™" and we are launching this brand on one of the exclusive platform of KICKSTARTER. We hope this campaign would "BRING DHARAVI BACK TO LIFE"

The Impact

Talking about the impact of this mission, here are some hopeful points. If you buy one pair of jackets you will contribute to the books for two children for the entire year. If you buy a 2Xjackets, you can contribute to the education of a child. Similarly, if someone places multiple orders he can help survive the entire family for the next 6 to 12 months. Above all, this will give employment to thousands of sole bread earners of their families. We feel so strong whenever we imagine how it feels when a father of a poverty-stricken family returns home with income to feed his young ones, to pay for their child's education. As local residents of Dharavi, we realized that no matter how meager someone's financial situation is, he always looks at his children with hope. A hope that someday his child will vanquish all the darkness of poverty. It's our mission to keep that hope alive.

No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another
 Charles Dickens

Asia’s largest slum with over 1 million people cramped in just over 3 sq. km of space has been hit very hard by the Covid lockdown. The fighting spirit of its population reflects in the way it has been able to curb the spread of the virus. With Dharawear, the workers will again reveal their multi-talented facet to the world by making high-quality leather jackets and products at unbeatable prices.

“Due to the complete shutter down, there is no work in Dharavi, and with no work comes the greatest worry of mankind, poverty. We have decided to come together and help Dharavi craftsman to fight this pandemic situation by launching an exclusive range of leather products globally. We hope this campaign would ‘bring Dharavi back to life’”, says Ankush Naik of Dharawear.

 
 
 
 

HOW TO IDENTIFY GENUINE LEATHER?

 

 

 

 
 

The Dharawear team has rigorously trained the hard working leather workers of Dharavi to match world-class standards. The craftsmen have the potential to match and even beat luxury goods brands by making trend-setting genuine leather jackets and other products at cheap prices. Dharawear will be their game changer, providing them with global markets including the US, the Middle East and Europe.

https://www.facebook.com/Dharawear

https://www.instagram.com/dharawear/?hl=en

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O0V_cmOmc2k&t=5s

https://www.dharawear.com/

Environmentally friendly factories

We do not believe animal slaughter merely for fashion. Howerever we have defined quality process and guidelines as per below: We love animals and we are against animal eradication. We dont believe in exotic leather All our leather is processed as per environmental guidelines. NO animals are harmed only for the sole purpose of hide extraction.

Sustainable Distribution

> Logistics are already in place.

> Supply Chain is integrated.

> Shipping aggrements are placed already.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Keeping in view the present situation of COVID-19, we are facing a lot of challenges. We have to make sure that the workers do not get effected during work by maintaining proper distance between them and following suggested guidelines. Also, there is a lockdown so the supply of raw materials is not exactly what we are looking for. We need to make sure the provision of raw materials to the manufacturers on time so that they can meet the deadline.

If any delays were to occur due to circumstances we will definitely consistently update all our backers with full transparency and of course, aid you with any of the doubts you have along the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

The bigger Picture

Let's not forget the bigger picture which is to help and save Dharavi. These are unprecedented times and it needs unprecedented effort. This is our little effort to save a promising community but you can make this little effort much bigger with your support. We owe great thanks to you for your support and Dharavi can never forget your help in such a struggling time. We believe that

Together we are! Stronger we are!

story:
NOTE: Scroll down (pretty far) to see pics of our very stylish Perks!



Hi, I’m Rani, founder of guide2style

As a female engineer just beginning my budding career and having just moved across the country to Silicon Valley, I needed a fashion makeover for my new professional and social life. 

But I couldn’t turn to my nerdy co-workers, so I decided to study the rules of style to create a software version of a fashionable friend – and guide2style was born.  It later dawned on me that guide2style would be useful for all women – and eventually, men.  Scott, the owner of this Indiegogo campaign, was one of my nerdy friends and because his life changed so much after I re-dressed him he co-founded the company with me. (Unfortunately, due to my current employment contract, my full name cannot be used here.)

For better or worse, your clothing choices determine much of the course of your life (just ask Scott!!), but most women have neither the time nor the desire to become a fashion expert. So, they turn to their fashionable friend or a trusted stylist for advice. But what if your friend isn’t available right now or you simply don’t have access to a stylist?  That’s where guide2style comes in!!  We’ve created an advice and search engine so powerful, so detailed, that we believe she will change the world by optimizing the appearance of, well, everyone (eventually), while still keeping true to personal tastes and styles. This, in turn, will empower women (and men) to look and feel their best at all times, giving them their best shot at pursuing their life’s true calling. 



From the fashion-savvy to the style-curious, guide2style was built with every woman in mind. Powerful, proprietary, artificial intelligence provides occasion-specific written advice to suit your body type, complexion, tastes, and personality based on a user profile.

Pulling from over 150,000 rules of style, you can be sure guide2style will help you look your very best.  She then searches over 10,000 online garments to find the best pieces to match the advice enabling you to shop instantly.

  • Our dressing room allows you to save garments for later, letting you easily come back to the perfect outfit for another occasion while 
  • Our forum creates community and gives users a voice among fellow fashion lovers.

The first version of guide2style is live, right now, and with our Indiegogo campaign, we’re asking for the funds we need to continue development and raise awareness.

With the funds raised through this campaign, we plan to: 

  • Gain a little corporate and legal assistance,
  • Launch a much larger marketing and PR push, 
  • Add an inherently social feature to the website.

We hope this small amount of funding will enable us to then rely on the revenue generated from online click-through garment sales commissions for continued product development.


As we continue to improve our current toolset, we’re always looking for ways to grow and provide innovative ways to stay stylish.

We believe that we have a great website that offers top-notch advice and shopping, but our sights are already set on the future.

One specific idea: we want to offer daily outfit suggestions based on your existing

  • Wardrobe,
  • Local weather, and
  • Events on your calendar. 


Imagine this...

A young professional has a busy week ahead in her home and work life. Posing the simple question, 


“Ok guide2style, what should I wear today?” 

will yield results tailored to her weekly events. The customized response could be,

“According to your calendar you have an important business meeting today and weather.com says it’s going to be raining and cold. I suggest your grey pants suit along with your overcoat."

"And, since I have you, you have a date on Friday night, yet I don’t see anything appropriate in your closet. Would you like me to provide you some options from the Web?” 

We have the technology to do this today. We just need the time and resources to build it.


And we have other features in mind  


  • We want to use the intense detail of our database to search for a specific, envisioned garment with little more than a few swipes of your finger. We call this “Dress Well, by You.” 

  • We’d also like our users to be able to use a picture of a garment to receive feedback on whether it would look good on them - we're temporarily calling this "Reverse Advice," but we need a better name. Please help us out via our Community if you can think of something better.

  • We have a lot of other really cool ideas as well, and we need to make sure all of these features are wrapped into an experience that is optimized for PCs, tablets, and smart phones.








Please, check out our site 

It’s a fully functioning search website, with the base technology for all of our ideas above incorporated and on display. 

You can support us by giving here, or by simply clicking through and buying a garment that you find via our search engine. 

And please, get involved in our Community! 

If you have a passion for fashion (and technology), we want your advice and feedback.

  Thank you so much for your support!



  Special thanks to the uber-talented Violeta Constantin for our T-shirt designs
  and Vladan Zlatic for our campaign design.



          Twitter       Facebook      Pinterest      Google Plus      Tumblr

story:
Magic Robe is the worlds first smart massaging therapeutic robe that provides gentle massage to your shoulders, upper back and lower back. Magic Robe is Bluetooth operated and controlled via mobile application with exact pressure point & electric pulse vibration. Mobile application takes you vital body signs and predict you to best use Magic Robe. Massager inside Magic Robe is detachable which allows you to wash Magic Robe easily. Besides this, Magic Robe comes with a mobile charger to charge Magic Robe on the go. You can also charge your phone with the built-in battery of Magic Robe.

 

 

Besides this, Magic Robe comes with a mobile charger to charge Magic Robe on the go. You can also charge your phone with the built-in battery of Magic Robe. Most important, Magic Robe is light weight, trendy and stylish. You can bring Magic Robe anywhere and can wear it anytime that’s why we say; Get Massage Anytime Anywhere with Magic Robe.

 

 

 

 

 

Overworked? Can’t relax? Lacking the sleep you need? The Magic Robe was developed by experts and wellness-obsessed visionaries to help improve your daily routine.

Magic Robe is a, smart wearable tech - therapeutic robe that gives you the ultimate massage, reads you health vital signs and harnesses the power of Celliant technology to help boost energy levels, recover faster, and relax a little easier.

 


 

It has never been more difficult to turn your mind off, relax, and recharge. That's why we created the Magic Robe for anyone who has ever felt hyperactive, overworked, or had a bad night’s sleep. Our robe could be helpful to people who face:

Prolonged fatigue

Sore joints & muscles   

Sleep disorders  

It can also be beneficial for individuals who: 

Drink too much caffeine  

Stay up late 

Work long hours

 

 

The Magic Pad comes with a removable cover that is washable. The Magic Pad itself can be cleaned by wiping it down with a cloth. The Magic pad delivers precise tension and massaging vibration to that pressure point and delivers an amazing relaxing massage.

 

 

Through out the Magic Pad, there are sensors that read and pick up all vital health information that is sent to our application. There is a removable battery that comes with its USB charger. When the Magic pad is attached to the Magic Robe, the Power OFF/ON is under the logo of Magic Robe. Simply hold the logo of Magic Robe and the Logo will light up in White. When the logo turns blue it indicates the battery is going low and red is needs charging.

 

 

TURN ON YOUR MAGIC ROBE!

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

The weave is comprised of 70% premium cotton and 30% Celliant fibers.

Increases Blood Flow

 

Increases oxygen level in blood

 

 

What’s something exciting, we’ve designed the Magic Robe using our innovative Linkweave. This is what makes it visually unique while providing the ultimate in comfort and durability. 

 

 

 

BETTER SLEEP + FASTER RECOVERY: Celliant energy penetrates into the muscle and tissue to promote a temporary increase in blood flow and local circulation, which can lead to better sleep, faster recovery, increased energy/stamina & improved strength. Celliant can also help regulate body temperature for a more comfortable night’s sleep

SOFT & SILKY-SMOOTH COMFORT: Premium long-staple cotton and patented Celliant yarns, in a luxurious sateen weave, creates a soft, silky-smooth and wrinkle-resistant fabric that looks and feels amazing.

FDA-DETERMINED/CLINICALLY PROVEN: The FDA has determined that Celliant Products are medical devices as defined in section 201[h] of the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act and are General Wellness Products. Celliant is scientifically proven and the most clinically tested infrared textile technology in the industry. 

 

 

 

Infrared is well known within the medical community, where it has been used to modulate sleep, protect against stress, and ease joint stiffness. However, there has never been an easier  way to incorporate a better  & healthier  way of everyday life. 

 

 

To that end, we put it in a unique form that is accessible to everyone, anywhere and anytime!

 

 

 

 

Magic Robes smart application controls all massaging functions and more! The Magic Pad has sensors that reads all health signs and is Bluetooth operated with application Our application reads the following
1. Heart rate
2. Body temperature
3. Oxygen saturation
4. Blood pressure
5. Respiration

Magic Robe app will be available for download March 1, 2020

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Pre-ordering of Magic Robe is starting from January 10, 2020. Magic Robe is offering a whopping 30% discount on pre-ordering and FREE global shipping. Not just this, if you follow us on social media, you will get an additional 10% discount. So, what are you waiting for? Pre-order now and follow us on social media to get 40% discount with free worldwide shipping. Social media links are given at the end.

 

 

 

Magic Robe took more than an year to idealize and develop it's prototype. Magic Robe is our brainchild so we spent all our energy to make it a reality. Prototype went through several testing stages where physiotherapists, chiropractors, dermatologists, product designers, engineers and technicians tested Magic Robe on their scientific parameters. We are so happy to announce that Magic Robe qualified all the tests in first go. Those who used Magic Robe for months during testing phase, loved it very much. In other words, Magic Robe prototype is a huge success!

Now, it's time to manufacture Magic Robe on commercial scale to make it available for everyone. Pre-ordering of Magic Robe is starting from January 10, 2020. Pre-orders will help us to collect money few days advance so we can set up things for the commercial manufacturing facility of Magic Robe.

story:
Never slip on ice and hurt yourself again! I bring you the gift to beat the wrath of mother nature, once and for all, step by step.

We all hate slipping on ice. It hurts both body and ego, but for some reason we can land a robot on a flying rock in space but we can't stop slipping on ice? Well not anymore! For with a simple bit of complex genius and innovation I have found a way to fix the world of this problem once and for all, but I need your help. I only have half the prototype done so I need some cash for another shoe. As it will be to complete the prototype all I can offer you is first dibs on the final product (estimated October 2019, depending on how successful this is) but you can also sleep well knowing that you have made your footprint (get it?) in shoe science and walking technology.

If I succeed the financial needs I ask for I will put all extra money into my science work of trying to find out just what ice is, where it comes from and why it finds its way onto our streets. It's science, but for humanity.

My biggest challenge so far was finding the right kind of salt (Cornish) and only having one shoe. My biggest fears are faliure and type 2 diabetes.

I'm just a small town boy with big city boy ideas. I hope to safely change the world through science and shoes.

*DISCLAIMER*

I only need 20 bucks to finish my prototype but I cannot request any less than 500 here, so all extra money will be invested in the science behind why ice is ice. I also lost the original prototype so I now need to buy a pair of shoes to complete it, but this can be done on the original 20 euro goal, I think. 23 tops.
story_txt:
Never slip on ice and hurt yourself again! I bring you the gift to beat the wrath of mother nature, once and for all, step by step.
We all hate slipping on ice. It hurts both body and ego, but for some reason we can land a robot on a flying rock in space but we can't stop slipping on ice? Well not anymore! For with a simple bit of complex genius and innovation I have found a way to fix the world of this problem once and for all, but I need your help. I only have half the prototype done so I need some cash for another shoe. As it will be to complete the prototype all I can offer you is first dibs on the final product (estimated October 2019, depending on how successful this is) but you can also sleep well knowing that you have made your footprint (get it?) in shoe science and walking technology.
If I succeed the financial needs I ask for I will put all extra money into my science work of trying to find out just what ice is, where it comes from and why it finds its way onto our streets. It's science, but for humanity.
My biggest challenge so far was finding the right kind of salt (Cornish) and only having one shoe. My biggest fears are faliure and type 2 diabetes.
I'm just a small town boy with big city boy ideas. I hope to safely change the world through science and shoes.
*DISCLAIMER*
I only need 20 bucks to finish my prototype but I cannot request any less than 500 here, so all extra money will be invested in the science behind why ice is ice. I also lost the original prototype so I now need to buy a pair of shoes to complete it, but this can be done on the original 20 euro goal, I think. 23 tops.

story:
This campaign has closed,

We'd love to see you at our store, blog, or on facebook,

http://thouart3d.tictail.com/

http://thouart3d.wordpress.com/

http://www.facebook.com/thouart3d


Greetings and Welcome,

We're Thou Art 3d, and we're a three person team dedicated to making your dreams a reality. We want to bring 3d printing right to your doorstep. You dream it, we create, print and send it to you.

We've got so many ideas, the list seems endless, so heres a slice;

 Custom, Unique and Unusual glass charms(no more trying to remember which bead was yours)

 Jewellery worth playing with (gears, bearings, puzzles, games and who knows what else we'll think of)

 Paperweight Trinkets, designed just for you (We started thinking of a dancing chef teddy bear, and we haven't stopped since)

 Custom Tabletop gaming pieces (Always wanted to design your own? We're keen to do it. Want a wall believably built by orcs? We're there.)

 Lost/Broken Game Pieces (Lost that little guy? Broken off that hat? We can help. Personalized Pieces? One of our favorites!)


What is it we need?

At the very start of Thou Art 3d we started working out exactly what we need to make this plan a reality. 

 Designer

 Tabletop Gaming Guru

 Product Tester

3d Printer

 Plastic Filament

 Modelling Software (Solidworks)

 Safety Gear

 Tools 

Idea Stream

 The Enthusiasm

We've checked off everything except for the software and for that we need your help. Why Solidworks? Solidworks is a market leader in 3d modelling, and its use in 3d printing is a proven track record. 

We've gotten several quotes for Solidworks, and this is how we will be using your pledges;



How does work?

Crowdfunding not something you do everyday? Here's the concept, you as a collective of awesome people pool your resources, with ours and together we aim for a goal. When we say pool resources, the process goes like this, you click the contribute button, choose what perk (or you can choose to not have one if you really prefer) and then you give your money to the Indiegogo system. Then, if we achieve our goal, Indiegogo gives your money to us. This is a security feature for us all- we can't take your money and run, and you can't promise us and then leave us stranded. 

You may well be asking what happens if we don't make the goal? Your money will be refunded to you, because we can't offer you the perks without the software to create them. So please, don't forget to contribute and share so we can make this a reality! Since we're also well invested into this project-having already funded the list itself, we'll also invest more ourselves to help cover the goal if we get close, because we really want to bring you the services of Thou Art 3d!

Not quite convinced you want to wait? We've also decided to put our money where our ideas are, and all sales of our chain maille from now, until the end of the campaign will also be added to the campaign. Thats all labour costs as well! So feel free to check out our store and see how you feel about our Chain Maille Creations! www.thouart3d.tictail.com

Referrals Competition! 

Thou Art 3d is running a Referrals Competition! The person who refers our campaign to the most people will win a specially made chain maille basket, (given our campaign succeeds) !

To enter all you need to do is;

1) Make a free Indiegogo account

2) Visit our campaign (while logged in)

3) Use the sharing tools to tell everyone you know about our campaign

4) We'll keep track and the account holder with the most referrals, at the end of the campaign, will win the basket!



Speaking of Perks

Want some more details before you send in your hard earned cash? Makes sense to us, so here's more about each perk. Your question not answered, or want to see something else included? Feel free to drop us a line!

Everyone who contributes will also receive an exclusive invitation to view our online store weeks before everyone else, with a 15% discount on every product!


 Set of 6 Mug/Glass Charms

We concluded we weren't the biggest fans of beads on loops, so we started work on designing new and interesting sets of glass charms, (so you can find your glass, and not someone else's). We'll print you the 6 all in one colour, or in multiple, the choice is up to you, and then we will send them on those familiar metal loops, so you can easily hook them onto drinking glass stems, or the handles of your favourite mugs.

Current planned themes include Smileys, Musical Instruments, Assorted Punctuation, Cheers in many languages, and so many more to come! Each theme will have 6 different but related designs, for example the Punctuation theme would have ?, !, @, %, ..., (). The smileys would be :-), ;-), :-P, :-D, :-O, B-).

Your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $7 for shipping, so you can get your charms in good time.


Our designer has created some renderings for you, so you can see what we exactly what we mean, this is the Smileys set!


     

 Chain Maille Bracelet

True story, we also love to work in chain maille. So we thought we would offer you a lovely discount for your support. We'll offer you a choice of three weaves, and 12 colours, all in anodised aluminium. Why aluminium you might ask? Its lighter (by about three times), doesn't rust like say steel (so yes you can swim or shower while wearing it), and the colour is anodised into the surface, not painted on.

Our store will also include our chain maille works, so you can get a necklace to match (or anything else you can think of) in our exclusive store opening as well. The 15% discount applies to all products, chain maille included!

The 12 colours (At the close of the campaign, we'll check in with you so you can choose) are Black, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Violet and Pink.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

The 3 weaves are Box, Persian, and Trizantine, shown in black and silver.

Box

Persian

Trizantine

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $5 for shipping, so you can get your bracelet in good time.


     

 Voucher for 10% Off

This is fairly self explanatory, we'll send you a code, which will give you 10% off all products you order (sadly shipping can't be discounted) for six months. Thats all orders, no matter how many you make, no matter how big the order. When we say 6 months, we mean from the public opening of the store, so you're looking at mid 2014, leaving you plenty of time!

Shipping all over is included, since we can email you the code!

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support! This 15% will stack with your 10% so during that sale you will get 25% off!


     

 Twin Bangles

You've seen friendship bracelets, and best friend necklaces? Well this deal means you can have a pair of identical twins, or mix and match for the perfect style! We'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to find out what design you want, we'll have a pile of designs you can choose from, or you can send us one. Want to check we can do it before you pledge? Drop us a line, we'll be more than happy to check it out!

Your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $10 for shipping, so you can get your twin bangles in good time.


Those pile of designs we're promising? Here are a few for your perusal!

But first, heres a stack printed!


And the renderings;

And because we dearly love a challenge, 


     

 Double Printed Pendants

Not really a bracelet person? We've got pendants too! These will ship with black ribbon so you can wear it as soon as it arrives, knotted especially so you can have it any length. Got a suggestion for a design? We'd love to hear it! Choose this perk and you get to choose from our stunning array of designs, currently planned to include a functional ball bearing, a pile of cash, various smiley faces, a few musical instruments, assorted punctuation, and if our designer gets her way, a string of gears, all set to turn and mesh just for you! 

Two Pendants printed just for you in your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $5 for shipping, so you can get your pendant in good time.


Here's a few of that stunning array of designs for your enjoyment;

A fully functional ball bearing- jewellery worth playing with!

Also totally functional gears, they turn and they mesh- you could play all day!



     

 Glowing Box Light

So we took a look at night lights one day, and noticed that there really isn't much variety. Which got us thinking that when you look through plastic sheets at light, you can see creases. Now creases aren't the best fun, but we work with 3d printing, so we can do so much more. So we plan to print a box (modular in design so you can mix and match the designs), containing a couple of white LEDs to shine through plastic, displaying designs, which would otherwise be invisible. Currently we're dreaming about retro games, to show off your geekier side, and for you wordsmiths, hide some quotes and phrases, revealed by the power of light!

Your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $15 for shipping, so you can get your box in good time.


     

 Custom Word Puzzle

Look from one side see one word, look from the other, see a different word, look from anywhere else, see a crazy mass of shapes. Which is a little bit of a puzzle for your brain, but thats not the best part, its also a puzzle, and only when you fit the pieces together can you read those words at all. We're thinking you could choose classic opposites like love and hate, or even better give a nod to that couple you know, with his name on one side and hers on the other.

Your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $15 for shipping, so you can get your puzzle in good time.


So we felt we should show you just what we mean by 'Custom Word Puzzle,' if you look at it you generally get something a little like this, and you can just read the words (Thou Art 3d...). 

If you look from the left, and right you can see the words clearly;


But wait, There's more! This design is also a puzzle, all those letters? Those are the tops of the pieces;




 Voucher for 25% Off

This is fairly self explanatory, we'll send you a code, which will give you 25% off all products you order (sadly shipping can't be discounted) for six months. Thats all orders, no matter how many you make, no matter how big the order. When we say 6 months, we mean from the public opening of the store, so you're looking at mid 2014, leaving you plenty of time!

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support! Your 25% voucher will stack with this 15% off, for a massive 40% during the exclusive sale!

Shipping all over is included, since we can email you the code!


     

 Can't Decide?

One of every 3d printed perk, and a 25% voucher. Thats six Glass Charms, Twin Bangles, one Printed Pendant, one Glowing Box Light, one Custom Word Puzzle, and a 25% off voucher.

Buying in a group like this saves you $12

Your choice of colours in plastics are Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White.

Additionally, we will be opening our store, exclusively for you, and offering you 15% any additional products, as a special thanks for your support! Your 25% voucher will stack with this 15% off, for a massive 40% during the exclusive sale!

Shipping within Australia is included, if you happen to live somewhere else, please add $40 for shipping, so you can get your stash in good time.


The Team

Our designer comes from a background of teaching and technical support for Solidworks (the modelling software), certified in both, as well as general use. She started working in 3d design and modelling way back in high school, and hasn't stopped since, even doing an engineering degree to bolster her skills. 

Our product tester comes from a creative side of life, enjoying everything from sketching to sewing, so she bounces ideas, and double checks them right from the start. 

Our tabletop gaming guru comes from years of games, and so knows what gamers want, as well as the all important rules.


The Time Plan

We've been working on this for a while, and the plan has changed and morphed until it stabilized and we turned it into a flow chart.

We mention sending you a survey so we can find out what sizes, colours, styles, and everything else you want for your perks.

We haven't been able to stop our Designer working on ideas, and scribbling concepts down on practically every surface since she came on board. Right now she's working on more ideas then we can fit here from army-themed walls and buildings with our Tabletop Gaming Guru to 3d puzzles and jewellery with our Product Tester.

So here is the plan;

So we've now updated the plan to include the use of a trial of Solidworks throughout the campaign, so you can see how serious we are! Also this means you can see an example of the perks!


The Future

After the campaign, we will sell mainly through our online store as we build up our product base, to include all those offered here, as well as a whole lot more. From there we plan to expand into selling at markets.

Our plan is also to offer custom 3d printing, so if you've lost that button, dial, zipper pull, handle or basically anything, please feel to drop us a line at  thouart3d@gmail.com !


Spread the Word

Don't feel you can flash the cash? Want to do more? It would mean so much to us if you share our campaign with your friends, family, acquaintances, and anyone else you can think of. It will help our campaign even more if you use the Indiegogo sharing tools, (the more you share, the closer we get to the top of the list of campaigns).

We've started a blog, so you can keep updated with our designer's progress, both during and after the campaign, please check it out at http://thouart3d.wordpress.com 

Thanks again for your support, it means the world to us, and we can't do it without you!

everything from sketching to sewing, so she bounces ideas, and double checks them right from the start.

tabletop gaming guru comes from years of games, and so knows what gamers want,
as well as the all important rules.

The Time Plan
We've been working on this for a while, and the plan has changed
and morphed until it stabilized and we turned it into a flow chart.
We mention sending you a survey so we can find out what
sizes, colours, styles, and everything else you want for your perks. 
We haven't been able to stop our Designer
working on ideas, and scribbling concepts down on practically every surface
since she came on board. Right now she's working on more ideas then we can fit
here from army-themed walls and buildings with our Tabletop Gaming Guru to 3d
puzzles and jewellery with our Product Tester.
So here is the plan;


So we've now updated the plan to include the use of a trial of Solidworks throughout the campaign, so you can see how serious we are! Also this means you can see an example of the perks!

The Future
After the campaign, we will sell mainly through our online store as we build up our product base, to include all those offered here, as well as a whole lot more. From there we plan to expand into selling at markets.
Our plan is also to offer custom 3d printing, so if you've lost that button, dial, zipper pull, handle or basically anything, please feel to drop us a line at  thouart3d@gmail.com !

Spread the Word
Don't feel you can flash the cash? Want to do more? It would
mean so much to us if you share our campaign with your friends, family,
acquaintances, and anyone else you can think of. It will help our campaign even more if you use the
Indiegogo sharing tools, (the more you share, the closer we get to the top of
the list of campaigns).
We've started a blog, so you can keep updated with our designer's progress, both during and after the campaign, please check it out at http://thouart3d.wordpress.com 
Thanks again for your support, it means the world to us, and we can't do it without you!

story:
^ Matt Hughes and his team building / volunteering at the Rancho 3M Christian orphanage and school.

 

   We at 42aFurnace aim to be an engine of Christian change, 30% of our net-profits go to Christian missions, and all of our shirts have Biblical themes flowing through them! Young men are the largest demographic missing from Churches today, on top of that many outsiders (and some insiders) view Christianity as a weak and feminized religion. Both of these are dangerous misconceptions that need to be addressed. 42aFurnace is in reference to Shadrach, Meshach, Abednego and the Son of God that saved them in Daniel chapter 3. Three men with extraordinary courage and conviction, who chose to be thrown into a blazing furnace rather than worship a false god. There is a need for Christian clothing that men can identify with and want to wear, our shirts are amazing tools to start conversations and spread God's word. Additionally if you want to give one as a gift every shirt has John 3:16 written in the collar.

Vision: Fulfilling the great commission and glorifying God through Christian clothing by empowering both missionaries and the common man.

   I know these shirts are not cheap. The expensive all-over printing method and choosing the highest quality 100% cotton 100% made in the USA shirts are both factors to the price point. Please understand that even if this project goes through at the minimum unlock levels 42aFurnace will still lose money. Our mission is to empower Christians, spread Gods word and be an engine to generate funds for Christian missions. We welcome you to join us in the furnace. God bless - 42aFurnace team.


100% made in the USA


   Remember to check back for Indiegogo Specials! Once you have bought a shirt you get $10 off each subsequent shirt purchased for yourself! avaliable only during the Indiegogo campaign, including any newly unlocked shirts! Keep up to date at www.facebook.com/42aFurnace  and on Twitter @42aFurnace

                                          Size chart at the bottom of this page.

  

Please be aware that theses pictures are mock-ups, the printed design may be slightly different and the colors may not be as vibrant as you see on screen.

^ We would be ecstatic if you would use this Facebook banner but please copy and paste this message and link into the images description:

Get this T-shirt here  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/42afurnace-christian-clothing--43/x/3898752

Please be aware that theses pictures are mock-ups, the printed design may be slightly different and the colors may not be as vibrant as you see on screen.

^ We would be ecstatic if you would use this Facebook banner but please copy and paste this message and link into the images description:

Get this T-shirt here  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/42afurnace-christian-clothing--43/x/3898752

Please be aware that theses pictures are mock-ups, the printed design may be slightly different and the colors may not be as vibrant as you see on screen.

^ We would be ecstatic if you would use this Facebook banner but please copy and paste this message and link into the images description:

Get this T-shirt here  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/42afurnace-christian-clothing--43/x/3898752

Please be aware that theses pictures are mock-ups, the printed design may be slightly different and the colors may not be as vibrant as you see on screen.

^ We would be ecstatic if you would use this Facebook banner but please copy and paste this message and link into the images description:

Get this T-shirt here  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/42afurnace-christian-clothing--43/x/3898752

Please be aware that theses pictures are mock-ups, the printed design may be slightly different and the colors may not be as vibrant as you see on screen.

^ We would be ecstatic if you would use this Facebook banner but please copy and paste this message and link into the images description:

Get this T-shirt here:  http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/42afurnace-christian-clothing--43/x/3898752 

 

 

Shipping Information

   Indiegogo is an amazing site, but one thing they don’t have is a shopping cart. What this means is that we need you to fill out your shipping information in this particular way. When making an order please type out your full name, then in the same line (in brackets) list the T-shirt name followed by the size you would like. Please do not include any numbers for any reason, if you want to get two XXL fishing shirts and a M crusader shirt please right it out as shown. (fishing XXL) (fishing XXL) (crusader M) (crusader L)

   Remember please do not use any numbers when entering your order, simply write out each shirt order in its own brackets one after the other. The name bar will not run out of space.

These are pre-shrunk shirts, while saying that, I’m sure you could shrink them a little more if you tried hard enough.

 

There are always some risks

   Possibly the biggest is that the color you see on your screen is different to your neighbors which is different to the person down the street. Unless all of our monitors were color calibrated to the same specifications our monitors will all display colors differently. On top of this light (from your monitor) often shows up more vibrantly than ink (printed onto the t-shirts) and in a worste case senario it might fade slightly. What this means is if you’re wanting a specific pantone number blue for your shirt to be ... we're all out of luck. Buuuuuuuuuut if you don’t mind your shirt being a great looking blue and not a specific blue number for example “Pantone 281C”, then we’re back in business and heading forward.

   The next Issue is that when a screen print is made it stays the same size when printing onto shirts sized from small to XXL. Sounds a little shocking doesn’t it? This phenomenon is industry wide and is solved with an ingenious trick, the artist designs a shirt with all the fundamental artwork fitting onto a small, but with lots of cool additional artwork around it to fill up a XXL. Below is a picture of a very cool Christian band we sponsor called Kutting Ties, these guys are wearing our Crusader shirt in sizes medium all the way up to triple extra large. It’s the exact same screen print but with extra art on the larger sizes. This means that the mock up might be slightly different to the shirt you get, but it will still be an awesome shirt.

   When you get a newspaper and you hold it against your nose you can see that the pictures are made up of thousands of little dots, this isn’t an issue because you’re never reading a newspaper from that short of a distance. Throughout the industry screen printing any kind of gradient or gentle tonal variation is done in this same way, but again since no one walking by you is going to have their eyes that close to your body no one will be able to see the dots.

   For a screen printer to be able to run a belt-printer in their facility means that they are in the big leagues, these are the same people who do printing for all the big names when they get their printing done in America. While it is very unlikely, if there was a surge of orders when we make ours the delivery date could be pushed back a week or two.

In Conclusion

   There have only been two times in my life that have been called by God to do something, the first was when my sister was in trouble, the second was this. In face of all the struggles and failures I hope to be as courageous as Peter was to get out of the boat and walk on water. I’ll sink just like he did and Jesus will have to catch me too, but for those seconds when he was called and took those steps of faith something extraordinary happened.

   42aFurnace is a unique expression of faith that is wholly intended to glorify God and spread his name, hopefully all of us aspire to say “I have brought you glory on earth by completing the work you gave me to do” John 17:4

                                  Please share this page with your friends, family and anyone you can think of,                                                                   Thank you for your support, God bless – Robert Bailey

story:
NOTE: For conversion of Euros (€) into GBP or USD, please use the following link: https://goo.gl/5qyzCt. We ship to USA & Canada as well.


VeganCare is a cosmetic brand that cares for those who care. Our products are appropriated for everyone that cares about animals, including vegans and non-vegans. We never use animal ingredients and none of the products was or will ever be tested on animals. You´re the only one who will test them! And we are sure you will love them!

They are also adequate for those who search healthy and organic cosmetics. We always take care to select ingredients from organic farm production, entirely free of pesticides in its making.

Plus, we also have a variety of products (e.g. such as our solid shampoos) which are recommended for travelling, as they are practical to carry with you on a trip.

 

 

 

 

VeganCare was created by Sofia, an Engineer from Portugal. Along the years, she developed and improved several prototypes for cosmetics and hygiene products. As a vegan herself, she made sure all products incorporate her life philosophy, and thus they are of course completely free of animal ingredients and have never been or will ever be tested on animals.

Nuno Alvim is the head of marketing and commerce in VeganCare Cosmetics. He has been a long-term activist engaged in human, environmental, and animal rights causes. He is also the board director of the Portuguese Vegetarian Association.

Our team of experts has developed a total of 27 prototype products,  mostly tested in collaboration with LEPABE , a laboratory at the Faculty of Engineering of the University of Porto (FEUP), in Portugal.  These include solid shampoos, hair creams, lipsticks, toothpaste, exfoliants, and many more.

 

 

OUR MAIN PROTOTYPE

The Solid Shampoo

 

 

How does it work?

VeganCare´s vision is of a world without animal suffering. We deeply believe in the idea that people can be beautiful and take care of themselves, using cosmetics, without supporting any cruelty to animals. We strive for the end of animal testing, by producing alternatives that are made with love, with no animals involved.

We also want to support organic farm industry, and an agriculture free of pesticides, thus promoting human health and the planet sustainability.

You can help us to bring this vision to life.

 

 

 

 

A closer look at some of the perks...

 

 

 

Want to offer it to someone?

Currently, we are planning to market some of our products in phases, starting with our solid shampoos. We also want to open our creative lab, scale production, and open an online store, so we can make the products available all around the globe, and available to you.

 

 

 

A community that supports us, to whom we are thankful!

 

We want to invest in a product that is more than just about it´s usefulness or profit, it´s about values and a philosophy of life. That´s why we came to Indiegogo, where we know we can find an enthusiastic and engaged community of people that care for the animals, for the environment, and their health.

Crowdfunding is an unique way of community investment, of involving everyone in bringing a project to life. Thanks to the kindness of thousands of people across the globe, which can back our campaign, we can raise the necessary funds to get VeganCare started. Together we can change the world for better. Thank you for supporting this campaign!

  • Tell your friends and family about our campaign and products, in your social media! Even if you cannot financially contribute, you´ll be helping us tremendously, and we will be very thankful!
  • Subscribe our Newsletter, on our Website, and you will receive updates and promotions in the future;
  • Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, we will stay in touch with you!
  • Share!  Help us spread our campaign using one of the buttons below.

 

When will you ship the perks?

As soon as the campaign is over, we will begin taking care of all shipping logistics. If you live in Europe, it will take a few weeks; outside EU, it may take about a month. We expect to have all the perks delivered until the mid of May.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do. Shipping is free for Portugal. Inside the EU, shipping costs will be automatically added, which vary according to country. Outside the EU (USA, Canada, Australia, other), customs may apply if you order a larger perk; in the case of small perks, only shipping applies.  We ship to more than 120 countries at this moment, please check the shipping section.

How do I pick the suitable solid shampoo for my hair type?

When you add a perk to your cart, you will be notified, just before payment, to choose the shampoo according to your hair type.

How to use a solid shampoo?

You can rub the solid shampoo trough the wet hair until the desired foam is obtained. Then you massage the scalp and, in the end, rinse off with water. That simple!

If I have any discount voucher now, when do I be able to place order on your store?

We plan to have our online store up and running before July. Even if there is a delay, the discount vouchers will be valid for at least one year after the online store's opening.

Are you certified organic?

We’re working on it. Currently it´s not feasible for a small company like ours, but with your support, we will be able to do it! 

Are you certified vegan?

Not yet, but we are also looking forward to obtain our certification, likely from UK´s Vegan Society.

 

With the support of

(com o apoio de)

story:
I began learning to make shoes about 4 years ago. I spent hours learning about all the details of fine footwear. The next time I went to to the mall to buy a pair of shoes I was shocked. The shoes at the mall were held together by glue, the leather was awful and they were disposable one season shoes. On top of that they were $120! I then went to a store that sold shoes up to my standards of quality. They were $500 to $1200 ! I was upset, it seemed like quality footwear in the mid-price range was non existent. I asked myself how this was possible? Could it possiblly cost hundreds of dollars more to make proper shoes? I decided to find out for myself. I took my now extensive knowledge of footwear and went to work.

I wanted

- A classic design

- A goodyear welt (for re-soling)

- Cork filling (for comfort and smell)

- Real quality leather

- Thick leather soles

- A soft leather lining

- A hand Made product

When all was said and done I had to look at price. Just as I expected these boots did not cost hundreds and hundreds of dollars to make. Why was nobody selling these? I asked around and found out that everybody wanted quality footwear they could have for years to come but they would never pay $600. I was fed up with the market for shoes. People had been taken advantage of because they didn't know any better. The $120 shoes were not worth $120 and the 600$ shoes were not worth $600. If nobody was going to give people a better option then it would have to be me.

1. Goodyear welt

Most shoes (even designer) hold the upper boot to the sole using only glue. These shoes can not be resoled and will be worn down within a year. We use a good year welt. It is a strong stitch that physically connects the upper to the sole. When the sole becomes worn you can have new soles put on for about 30 dollars. Which is a lot better than going to the mall to buy another $120 pair of shoes. 

2. Appearance

We often see boots that claim to be quality. Rarely does the appearance of these boots remain fashionable for years. What good is having a boot that will last years if it goes out of style in 2 years? We avoided this by choosing a timeless design. The balmoral boot we designed is a simple single tone brown with one line of brougeing. This boot was fashionable in the mid 1800's and will be fashionable well into 2020.

3. Cork Filling

A detail that the eye can not see is the cork filling in a shoe. The natural cork material is more expensive than alternatives and almost never used in big retail shoes.  Cork is a natural material that absorbs odour and moulds  to the shape of the foot. If you have never had a cork filled shoe then you will have to feel it to believe it.

3.Leather Sole 

A leather sole is unheard of in a big retail shoe. It is simply too expensive. Only on fine footwear will you ever see a thick leather sole. An experienced eye will look to the sole to see if a shoe is expensive. Our sole is a beautiful piece of very thick leather like the sole's seen on Savile Row. 

4. Lining

A fine leather shoe would be ruined by a fabric lining. Despite that many big retailer still use fabric inside shoes. Leather is softer, more durable and a natural odour absorber. The soft and smooth calf in our boots is not visible to the outside world but the wearer will appreciate it's comfort.

5.Leather Upper

Many leather shoes in big retail use "leather" that has been purchased from a textile merchant. Our leather comes from a tannery. The hides arrive in the shape of a cows hide, not a large uniform square. Our leather is perfect for waxes, polishing and aging. The leather will form a wonderful patina and look better after a year of use.

6. Hand Made

Leather was once a living thing. It has flaws and unique character. Only a trained craftsmen can stretch stitch and cut leather according to each hides unique characteristics. For that reason hand made is an absolute must.

 

Manufactured in India
story_txt:
I began learning to make shoes about 4 years ago. I spent hours learning about all the details of fine footwear. The next time I went to to the mall to buy a pair of shoes I was shocked. The shoes at the mall were held together by glue, the leather was awful and they were disposable one season shoes. On top of that they were $120! I then went to a store that sold shoes up to my standards of quality. They were $500 to $1200 ! I was upset, it seemed like quality footwear in the mid-price range was non existent. I asked myself how this was possible? Could it possiblly cost hundreds of dollars more to make proper shoes? I decided to find out for myself. I took my now extensive knowledge of footwear and went to work.
I wanted
- A classic design
- A goodyear welt (for re-soling)
- Cork filling (for comfort and smell)
- Real quality leather
- Thick leather soles
- A soft leather lining
- A hand Made product
When all was said and done I had to look at price. Just as I expected these boots did not cost hundreds and hundreds of dollars to make. Why was nobody selling these? I asked around and found out that everybody wanted quality footwear they could have for years to come but they would never pay $600. I was fed up with the market for shoes. People had been taken advantage of because they didn't know any better. The $120 shoes were not worth $120 and the 600$ shoes were not worth $600. If nobody was going to give people a better option then it would have to be me.
1. Goodyear welt
Most shoes (even designer) hold the upper boot to the sole using only glue. These shoes can not be resoled and will be worn down within a year. We use a good year welt. It is a strong stitch that physically connects the upper to the sole. When the sole becomes worn you can have new soles put on for about 30 dollars. Which is a lot better than going to the mall to buy another $120 pair of shoes. 
2. Appearance
We often see boots that claim to be quality. Rarely does the appearance of these boots remain fashionable for years. What good is having a boot that will last years if it goes out of style in 2 years? We avoided this by choosing a timeless design. The balmoral boot we designed is a simple single tone brown with one line of brougeing. This boot was fashionable in the mid 1800's and will be fashionable well into 2020.
3. Cork Filling
A detail that the eye can not see is the cork filling in a shoe. The natural cork material is more expensive than alternatives and almost never used in big retail shoes.  Cork is a natural material that absorbs odour and moulds  to the shape of the foot. If you have never had a cork filled shoe then you will have to feel it to believe it.
3.Leather Sole 
A leather sole is unheard of in a big retail shoe. It is simply too expensive. Only on fine footwear will you ever see a thick leather sole. An experienced eye will look to the sole to see if a shoe is expensive. Our sole is a beautiful piece of very thick leather like the sole's seen on Savile Row. 
4. Lining
A fine leather shoe would be ruined by a fabric lining. Despite that many big retailer still use fabric inside shoes. Leather is softer, more durable and a natural odour absorber. The soft and smooth calf in our boots is not visible to the outside world but the wearer will appreciate it's comfort.
5.Leather Upper
Many leather shoes in big retail use "leather" that has been purchased from a textile merchant. Our leather comes from a tannery. The hides arrive in the shape of a cows hide, not a large uniform square. Our leather is perfect for waxes, polishing and aging. The leather will form a wonderful patina and look better after a year of use.
6. Hand Made
Leather was once a living thing. It has flaws and unique character. Only a trained craftsmen can stretch stitch and cut leather according to each hides unique characteristics. For that reason hand made is an absolute must.
 
Manufactured in India

story:
Design History

I searched for years to find a wallet that would be as small as possible, carry everything I needed, and still look good. In my search I only found wallets made of plastic, nylon, elastic, and metal. They were small but never made of leather in a simple, timeless style. The smallest leather wallets I could find were designed with heavy leather or so much extra structure built into them that they couldn't carry much, and they still weren't small enough.

Blak Bambu Dimensions

So I eventually started to design my own wallet. I had a few major goals for the design. I wanted it to be:
 • Made of high quality leather.
 • The smallest form possible.
 • Able to carry business cards (without marking them up and wrecking the corners).
 • Able to carry at least 8 credit cards.

2 exterior quick access pockets


5 interior pockets

 • 2 pockets for credit cards (can hold 2 cards in each)
 • 2 pockets for business cards (can hold ~5 business cards each)
 • 1 full-length pocket for receipts, ID cards, folded cash (can hold 4 additional credit or ID cards)


Fine leather and bamboo

When you're designing a slim wallet, choosing the right materials is very important. I sourced the thinnest leather I could and decided to use a bamboo material for the lining. Bamboo was chosen since it's lighter and not as bulky as leather, it's more durable than cotton, has a luxurious sheen something like silk without being too slippery, and doesn't look cheap like polyester. I also chose not to use much interfacing, glue, and other structure-building materials within the wallet, since the cards you put into it create all the structure it needs.

Early design drawings

The first prototype next to the final wallet

Production Plans

After producing prototypes, improving on the design, and testing for a full year, the Blak Bambu wallet is ready for production. I need your help to offer Blak Bambu to everyone who wants a small, classy wallet. Your contribution will be used to produce the first run of wallets.

I have a great relationship with a capable manufacturer who is ready to start fulfilling orders as soon as the campaign is complete, and they have the capacity to produce as many perk wallets as we can imagine. I also have great advisors with experience developing, producing, and ensuring quality within their products who will be helping the process move as smoothly as possible.

Once the campaign is complete it will take approximately two months to have all of the wallets crafted, packaged, and shipped to backers. We expect shipping to occur no later than early April 2014. Of course, we will be striving to ship the perks sooner than that if at all possible.

Stretch goal (not the final design)

If the campaign doubles its goal everyone who contributes $55 or more will receive a code with their perk wallets that they can use on the BlakBambu.com site for a free magnetic money clip that will complement the Blak Bambu wallet design (the design for the money clip has not been finalized yet, though). Please note that the cost of shipping will not be included for the money clip.

Please Share!

Thank you for checking out Blak Bambu. Please share the link to this page with your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, and even by email. Every bit of exposure will help to get this project successfully funded and help us reach our stretch goal!

Thank you so much for your support!

Troy Meier
Blak Bambu

story:
Please note that credit cards will be refunded if the campaign does not reach its goal.

We are two guys from Boston that love everything about watches. The history, mechanical intricacy and aesthetics of fine watches appeal to us so much that we decided to create our own watch brand.

Our design goals were set to create the finest watch that could be built with the best value. We encourage you to compare our "Charles River" diver to other watches to see that our watch ranks superior in features, materials, design, warranty and customer service.


We’ve married a durable, mechanical automatic movement with a design that is built to withstand the rigors of every day use, in and out of the water. Combine that with a design aesthetic that is unique, and we believe you’ll be proud to wear the Boston Watch Company's "Charles River" on a daily basis.

The "Charles River" utilizes a unique sandwich type "bolted" construction (diagram below) that enhances water resistance the deeper it gets, along with a durable, scratch proof, sapphire, 120 click bezel to time your dive. The best C3 Super-LumiNova “lume” is applied to the hands and indices, allowing you to read the time at night and below the water’s surface.

The bracelet incorporates solid ends and solid links that are held together with screws instead of pins for durability, and a diver's clasp with a safety to make sure it doesn’t slip off your wrist during your demanding activities.

The movement is the Citizen/Miyota 9015 which is a modern, mechanical automatic design that incorporates technology accumulated from decades of research and development by one of the leading watch manufacturers in the world.

We are so proud of our city that we decided to name our company the Boston Watch Company. Rich with history, education, architecture, the influence of the ocean and great people, the city of Boston reflects our motivation for naming our first offering the "Charles River."

One of our strongest motivations for starting the “Boston Watch Company” is our pride in our city. Even if you are not from Boston, the “Charles River” reflects our appreciation of the beginnings of our country and its patriotic spirit echoed by people throughout the United States.

The "Charles River" was designed in conjunction with our dear friend, Fred Amos from Bernhardt Watch Company. Fred has been designing and manufacturing watches for decades and is widely known in the industry as offering the best value in watches, customer service and servicing of watches in the business. The Boston Watch Company has partnered with Mr. Amos to design consult, build and service the Charles River. If you purchase a "Charles River" watch and it is ever in need of service, we will be here to take care of you.

We hope you'll enjoy your Boston Watch Company “Charles River” watch as much as we did designing it.

http://www.bostonwatchusa.com/

Technical Specifications:

Case:

316 Stainless Steel

41mm in diameter, 14 mm tall, lug width of 20mm

Bolted Construction for ultimate water resistance under adverse conditions

Water resistant to 300 Meters

Crown:

Screwed down and signed

Bracelet:

316L stainless steel Oyster bracelet with solid links, solid end links, screwed links and diver's extension clasp

Movement:

Citizen/Miyota 9015 automatic / mechanical, 28,800 beats per hour

Dial:

C3 Super Lumi-Nova applied to minute, hour, second hand and indices, providing maximum legibility in less than ideal lighting conditions

Date indicator located at 4:30

Crystal:

Domed Sapphire with anti-reflective coating on inside of crystal

Bezel:

Durable sapphire 120 click ratcheted bezel with luminous pip at 12, designed to time your next dive or, let you know when it's time to feed the meter.

story:
Hi Indiegogo supporters, our names are Damian & Betsy Barton, proud parents of 2 boys, Jasper (6) & Ryder (4) and our company is Paciplay, a design studio committed to creating innovative products for babies and children. 

How you can help

We are introducing 2 new products in addition to our first successful signature product paciplay, a 2-in-1 silicone pacifier holder and teether. These next 2 new products that we have been extensively developing are teethers for infants and a very innovative pacifier aptly named paciStay. We have invested a lot of our own resources and just need final support to raise funds for production.

First, who we are

Betsy Barton

Betsy Barton graduated from St. Michael's College with a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology. By day, she has spent the past twelve years working to improve the lives of women and children through organizations committed to cancer prevention and research. Inspired by the health and safety of their young sons, she works closely with Damian to design innovative products that are functional, modern and most importantly, entirely non-toxic.

Damian Barton

An Australian native, father of 2 and award winning industrial designer. Damian has designed products ranging from furniture and lighting, to pens and wrist watches....and baby products since becoming a parent!

Our inspiration, Jasper & Ryder now aged 6 & 4 


Product #1 - PaciStay  Pacifier

paciStay silicone pacifier - note the integrated suction cup on the front. This acts as a safety finger pull (required) and a suction cup. This will be an industry first if we can bring it to market after having successfully developed, tested and prototyped it with a renown U.S. based pacifier manufacturer. 

The suctioning ability allows paciStay pacifier to be stored vertically to many familiar places allowing easy accessibility and help maintain hygiene by keeping it off the ground and away from dirty surfaces. Importantly paciStay has a low profile orthopedic teat for proper teeth and jaw development.

 

Product #2 - Teethers

Tiara Silicone Teether


 

Biker Silicone Teether



These are actual finished prototypes and we now simply need to produce a production mold for each and an initial inventory run.

                                                                      

                                                                Blue | Pink GIFT Box sets


What is completed so far on Teethers

- prototypes and final designs are complete using our proven manufacturer

- packaging design is complete

- marketing materials are complete

What is left to do

- produce 2 production molds (takes approx 4 weeks)

- production run for packaging (approx 2 weeks)

- produce a small batch for testing and quality control

- production run and inventory 

- fulfill orders to YOU

 

What is completed so far on Pacifier

We are proud to be partnering with a renown pacifier manufacturer headquartered in Germany with facilities here in the U.S. to develop paciStay.

- working prototypes are complete

- packaging design is complete

- marketing materials are complete

What is left to do

- Finalize pacifier design for production efficiency

- produce a 4 cavity production mold (takes approx 4 weeks)

- production run for packaging (approx 2 weeks)

- produce a small batch for testing and quality control

- production run and inventory 

- fulfill orders to YOU

 

Proof of concept

We exhibited our teether and pacifier prototypes at the largest juvenile show in October '13 for buyer and customer feedback. The responses were super positive with many wanting to place orders then and there!


 

Our history and First product:

Paciplay, a 2-in-1 pacifier holder and teether (available now) & part of select contribution perks!


In an industry first, we combined 2 functions and created a teething pacifier holder. We also innovated this category by using FDA approved silicone as the primary material, a much safer and hygienic material.

 

Within 3 short years of launching paciplay, we are selling worldwide as well within the U.S. including some big box retailers. (hard work does pay off). With your support for the new teethers and pacifiers, we will then have 3 innovative products in circulation strengthening our brand and providing babies and parents around the world with great products. You truly will be a part of our overall success.


                   

 Our BIGGEST fans with our first product paciplay, a 2-in-1 silicone                    pacifier holder and teether



We all know that babies love to put almost anything in their mouths to ease teething  pains and even if an infant does not use a pacifier, paciplay can still be used as a clip on teether.


Our responsibility

As a manufacturer of infant products, our responsibility is to provide the safest and best products possible. We are therefore required to pass stringent laboratory testing and certification before we can hit the shelves. All of our products are BPA & Phthalate Free, non toxic and bacteria resistant. 

                                                         

 Please contribute!

We are so close to launching 2 new and exciting products. After 2 years of R&D they are ready for production. With your contributions this can become a reality and help comfort babies around the world. The factories are ready, our buyers are ready and so are we.     

Q & A

Shipping cost to Canada & Internationally.

  • Please add $10USD for shipments to Canada 
  • add $15USD for all other countries out of North America
  • We welcome you to mix and match your color and design choices,                         eg the $40 perk comes with 2 teethers so you can choose 1 of each or 2 of the same teether. After your contribution is received, we will personally contact you to verify your preferences.
  • Gift boxes will arrive as a beautifully wrapped, decorative package
  • We know girls love to ride bikes too and hope to eventually introduce a gender neutral color for the biker teether also.  
  • Our website is www.paciplay.com 
  • We understand not all children use pacifiers (though a lot do). This is a personal choice and we simply want to provide the BEST pacifier option to parents and children should they choose to use them.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Also dont forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Gift boxes will arrive as a beautifully wrapped, decorative package


We know girls love to ride bikes too and hope to eventually introduce a gender neutral color for the biker teether also.  


Our website is www.paciplay.com 

We understand not all children use pacifiers (though a lot do). This is a personal choice and we simply want to provide the BEST pacifier option to parents and children should they choose to use them.

story:
DIRTY DAPPER VALENTINES EDITION

We're raising some money to fund our phase II of Dirty Dapper soap line. Here at Dirty Dapper, we believe that our men should also be spoiled for Valentines. That's why we created a Valentines Edition gift so you can give him something he wants -the gift of naughty. Your man is gonna love it!

What You Get

We need to reach our $550 goal so we can package amazing products in phase II. Each Valentines Edition gift comes with the MAN-SCRUBBER burlap case, Dirty Dapper weekend bars and the naughty message for him to find. If we don't reach our goal, unfortunately, no one gets their Valentine Edition gifts.

THE SCENTS: Activated Charcoal, Clean Bar and Dead Sea Mud

The MAN-SCRUBBER burlap case is our signature case, that acts both as a great travel case for his Dirty Dapper soap AND great for scrubbing his skin. You can hang it in the shower to dry.

Feel Good With Dirty Dapper Soap:

We are high quality, eco-friendly and never wasteful. Our products are:

  • All-natural
  • All-in-one (use for shampoo, face wash and body)
  • Travel-friendly
  • Eco-friendly

Our Story

It started out with a lady with a traveler's heart, being frustrated when it came to shopping for toiletries for her travel trips. There were those big crappy soap bars with gross ingredients and fumbling around with multiple toiletry bottles. Lightblub! She wanted to create an all-in-one soap that she could feel good about using - making it a travel-friendly size and made with all-natural high quality ingredients. Then Dirty Dapper was born. A sexy brand for people to feel sexy about being good to the environment and to their skin.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of dapper lads who could use some lovin' or help a friend out with a naughty Valentines gift idea, please share on your facebook and help us reach our goal. We love you long time.

- Dirty Dapper Team "Keeping your body clean, your mind dirty"
story_txt:
DIRTY DAPPER VALENTINES EDITION
We're raising some money to fund our phase II of Dirty Dapper soap line. Here at Dirty Dapper, we believe that our men should also be spoiled for Valentines. That's why we created a Valentines Edition gift so you can give him something he wants -the gift of naughty. Your man is gonna love it!

What You Get
We need to reach our $550 goal so we can package amazing products in phase II. Each Valentines Edition gift comes with the MAN-SCRUBBER burlap case, Dirty Dapper weekend bars and the naughty message for him to find. If we don't reach our goal, unfortunately, no one gets their Valentine Edition gifts.
THE SCENTS: Activated Charcoal, Clean Bar and Dead Sea Mud
The MAN-SCRUBBER burlap case is our signature case, that acts both as a great travel case for his Dirty Dapper soap AND great for scrubbing his skin. You can hang it in the shower to dry.
Feel Good With Dirty Dapper Soap:
We are high quality, eco-friendly and never wasteful. Our products are:

All-natural
All-in-one (use for shampoo, face wash and body)
Travel-friendly
Eco-friendly

Our Story
It started out with a lady with a traveler's heart, being frustrated when it came to shopping for toiletries for her travel trips. There were those big crappy soap bars with gross ingredients and fumbling around with multiple toiletry bottles. Lightblub! She wanted to create an all-in-one soap that she could feel good about using - making it a travel-friendly size and made with all-natural high quality ingredients. Then Dirty Dapper was born. A sexy brand for people to feel sexy about being good to the environment and to their skin.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you know of dapper lads who could use some lovin' or help a friend out with a naughty Valentines gift idea, please share on your facebook and help us reach our goal. We love you long time.
- Dirty Dapper Team "Keeping your body clean, your mind dirty"

story:
Short Summary 

Hello!  I'm Jewel, an Entrepreneur from the beautiful Bahamas where I grew up influenced very much by the amazing Art Community.  A couple years ago I was lucky enough for the opportunity to pursue a passion I’ve desired for over 10 years.

I have now started a new career as a Fashion Designer and have been building my brand for the past 2 years.  It is a luxury swim & resort wear brand for women.  This brand is greatly inspired, by my island.  The lifestyle… that sun, sand, & sea.  The ocean breeze of this Paradise I call HOME!

In this time I have dedicated my energy and all resources to this project.  I have created a collection of beautiful, pieces, which embody strength, classic style and luxury.  With this collection I am proud to honor women who exemplify strength, leadership and courage.  It is important for me that my brand embodies these qualities and as a Designer, attention to fit and quality pieces are very important.

It is my dream to finally show pieces from my collection in the Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week Swim next year 2013 in Miami, FL.  At this show I will finally have the exposure I so desire to grow my brand and expose it to the world.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get:

I humbly ask your assistance in helping me achieve my goal to raise $85,000.00 as I continue on my journey to Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week SWIM!  This amount will go towards producing the sample pieces for the collection as well as the fee to participate in Fashion Week.

Let’s face it – benefits matter. We have benefit packages that will knock your socks off!  By contributing to this campaign, you will receive among MANY other perks, an invitation to our show at Fashion Week, a Visit to the set of the Ad Campaign and a trip to The Bahamas!!! 

Note: All claimed perks will be given after the campaign. 

The Impact:

In this effort I would like my brand to also serve as a launching pad for other persons from my country to the Fashion World.  As it is a small community here in The Bahamas, there is not a massive outlet locally for persons who desire careers in this creative field. I would like for my brand to be this outlet!

Other Ways You Can Help:

PLEASE… be so kind as to spread the word by copying and pasting the link to our campaign page at the top and post to your social media pages as well as to your e-mail contacts.  Please also LIKE our Face Book page where you will find lots of updates.  Remember, every bit counts!  

Many thanks! 

 

See you on the Runway!

  

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Please e-mail: JewelSwimwear@gmail.com

 

How do I make a donation if I don't own a credit/debit card?

Simply send an e-mail to the above address for instructions. 

 

When will I recieve my desired Perk?

All Perks will be sent at the end of the campaign.
