story:
Summary

The idea for Serial Siren sprang from our founder who grew increasingly tired of constantly digging in her purse to find various colors of lip cosmetics. She sought to create a better solution and Serial Siren was born.

Founder Biography

Our founder is a marketing professional specializing in exceeding corporate lead, sales and revenue targets by up to 79 percent. She has an MBA and twenty years of marketing experience in Fortune 500 corporations and advertising agencies in San Francisco, Los Angeles, Boston and Phoenix. More about her available here.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Serial Siren is a great idea and we've funded the first two waves of prototypes. However, we need the marketplace to prove there is enough purchase interest to fund the manufacturing. We have 10 products scheduled and need $6,700 to fund the manufacturing of all 10 prototypes.
  • What consumers will get: products that solve their problems and make their lives more organized, enjoyable, composed and productive. Please purchase today via "Perks" on the right. ----->
  • What advertisers will get: a collaborative, professional partner that can help cross-sell their products. Please purchase today via "Perks" on the bottom right. ----->

Risks & Challenges

If we don't make our goal of $6,700, we plan to use whatever funds and information the marketplace has provided to prioritize which of the 10 products make it first to market.

Spread the Word

Love our product prototypes? Help spread the word to get the manufacturing funded!

  • Use your email or social media accounts to get the word out to friends, family, coworkers and more. Help generate interest in the marketplace by sharing our campaign.
  • Check out the Indiegogo share tools - they make sharing our campaign quick and easy!

Prototype Photos

Below are four photos from our LIPSTICK collection. The interior grid system keeps lip cosmetics findable, contained, protected from grinding, and color coded for easy color selection. The interior mirror and magnetic closure facilitate an application process that is functionally ideal. Additional photos and the HYBRID collection available for viewing at https://www.serialsiren.com/shop-1.

story:
Everybody has a laptop, tablet or phone that they can't put anywhere. Pockets are full, key scratching the phone, tablet falling out, or You have to hold it in Your hands, laptop shoulderbag hurts Your back... MYQ clothes were created to solve these problems one device at the time, from laptop to smartphone. You can carry your mobile device and stay active and "hands free" without loosing access to Your device. And the cherry on top - it's all You, every product has a unique personal QR code which You can link to whatever You want. 

Based on real life problem, designed by professionals, developed in most IT-friendly environment, tested by world class athletes!

So, what we have to offer and why we're here:

  • At first we did Laptop backpack. This is ready and on sale. For more information visit our homepage.
  • Now we're ready for production faze of Tablet Hoody and Smartphone T-Shirt. Prototypes ready and tested, we need Your support to start the production.
  • Our Tablet Hoody and Smartphone T-Shirt are quite complex to manufacture. Therefore we have prepared choices for manufacturing. We can either manufacture these clothes in EU (Estonia), with guaranteed high quality, but also higher price. We can also manufacture in Pakistan, which has more risks on the quality but it's considerably cheaper. If You like our idea enough to support it, we'll let You decide where the initial manufacturing will be done.

What We Need & What You Get

Developing the new Tablet Hoody and Smartphone T-Shirt has been fun, but it's also been expensive process. In order to validate our idea and start up the mass production we're looking for at least 4000€, which allows us to produce first 50 T-Shirt and 50 Hoodies in Pakistan. If the funding exceeds the minimum requirement, our plans are as follows:

  • Below 4000 EUR funding - well....we failed. We'll return all the money for our backers and start to guessing in our decisions and life choices :)
  • 4000 EUR + funding.....things are looking up but we're are not all there yet. All the packers will receive products made in Pakistan, even to those who backed the EU (Estonia) production.
  • 10300+ EUR.... well guys, you have class - high quality produced in EU (Estonia) clothes can be ordered and every backer will receive the product produced where wanted.

The Timeline

In case of 100%+ funding our plans are:

  • After 30 days the funding phase will end.
  • The production will take 4-6 weeks;
  • With some luck and helpful postal workers, backers can find their brand new hoodies and t-shirts under their Christmas trees :)

The Impact

The situation we're in is following:

  • We have already produced product (Laptop backpack) which is on sale
  • We have developed 2 new products which are ready for mass production
  • We have production agreement with EU and Pakistan factories for production (we know how much does it cost and how much time it takes)
  • In case of full funding we can start up the mass production earlier than expected. 

Risks & Challenges

Since the hard work is done - products are fully developed and tested, IT-systems are ready, logistics are in place, our notable risks are:

  • Manufacturing process. Due to complexity there might be delays in manufacturing. These are all problems expected in first patch of products, but we have professional clothes designer in our team to work out these problems.
  • Our main concern is producing in Pakistan. There is serious concern about quality and production delays due to political situation, but we have backup plan to switch manufacturers form Pakistan to China. 
  • If You want less risk, back the EU (Estonia) option, there we can physically oversee the production and everything else is already done by us.

Other Ways You Can Help

If You can't contribute or want to risk with it, but like the idea, then please let others know:

  • Share this page.
  • Like us on Facebook
  • Tell Your friends about it
  • Even if You don't like the idea, let us know what's wrong with it or what is missing, so we could do something more suitable for you.

Your Size

After contribution we ask the size you need by email. We can offer xxs, xs, s, m, l, xl, xxl. 

Information about the products

  • First, check out the gallery to see the pictures and comments about the offered products
  • Detailed information about all products can be found on our webpage

story:
The Hot Cover


Background

Our team is made up three college-athletes with entrepreneurial spirit, ready to take our idea into production.


Bradley Davis

A Nashville, TN native that brings his business and sales background to the team.


Stephen Soriano

Born and raised in Readington, NJ. He brings the product design and business background to the team.

Max Zandstra

This West Coast descendent from Washington state, brings his creative skills and unique ideas to the team. 


What is The Hot Cover?

  • This innovative product is the first surface heated hot tub cover that helps melt ice and snow allowing for easier access during the times when you want to enjoy it most.
  • Our cover is made with an electronic heating element woven throughout that can be turned on and off.
  • The cover is battery operated.
  • Allow 30 minutes for heating elements to help melt away any unwanted ice or snow.

                               



Why We Need Your Help!

In order for our team to continue the design and production process, we are seeking donations to help us purchase more supplies and materials needed to create The Hot Cover.

Money would go towards:

  • Heating elements
  • Insulated coil
  • Cover material
  • Tools


What You Get!

Listed are some of the unique perks you receive if you help donate to our project! 

  • $1 -- A simple thank you from our team. Every penny counts!
  • $10 or more -- A unique sticker of our logo to help represent our product
  • $30 or more -- One of a kind t-shirt that helps promote The Hot Cover
  • $199 or more -- A chance to receive The Hot Cover at a special discounted price
  • $299 or more -- The Hot Cover from the first run of production
  • $7,000 or more -- A trip that allows you to meet the creators while enjoying some time off in the great city of Louisville, KY, and receiving your Hot Cover in person


Spread The Word

Whether you have decided to donate or not, we would greatly appreciate your help promoting our product! 

  • Check out our Twitter @TheHotCover
  • Share our link -->  igg.me/at/the-hot-cover  and spread the word! 


THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
We are all about   

Unique Style  All of our handmade iPad and card cases feature bold patterns and vibrant colours that stand out from the crowd.

 

 Highest Quality   Every Lotus Wonders product is exquisitely hand tailored from the finest fabrics by Cambodian women

 

 

Investment in Women   By purchasing an iPad or card case, you are supporting sustainable livelihoods for women and their families, and contributing to the Wonder Fund for community development.

 

Movement   By choosing Lotus Wonders you are joining a movement that brings together savvy consumers to support women in the developing world.

 

 Genuine   Our founder, Mehrak Mehrvar, spent the past 13 years advocating for women’s rights in different countries including Afghanistan, Cambodia,Indonesia and Iran. She started Lotus Wonders when she saw first hand the transformation that can occur when women artisans in the developing world are connected with western markets.

 

Sustainable   Lotus Wonders pays above fair wages AND we contribute an additional 20% beyond those wages to community development through the Wonder Fund so that everyone in the community benefits from your purchase.  Everybody wins!

 

 

We know that if we raise the economic well-being of women, their families and communities will be lifted up with them. As part of the Lotus Wonders business model, we will train women and develop their long-term economic prospects  by providing them with sustainable, more than fair wages.  

 Beyond providing work opportunities and income, we will also be contributing an extra 20% of their wage to a community fund, the Wonder Fund, that will invest in local projects that the women and their communities decide are most needed.

Is a source of water the most important need for them?  Do they need bicycles for the children to get to a school some distance away?  Heck, do they need a school in their village?  Do they need to improve some housing, some roadways, a power source?  The women themselves will be in charge to decide what is best for their village.

In doing this, the women develop their role as community leaders and the work opportunities benefit more members of the village - touching more and more lives. 

The Wonder Fund turns an investment in women into an investment in the whole community.

 

 

We have finalized our prototypes and made our samples with the help of women in the first village in Cambodia who tailor and handcraft our products, and secured all of the fabrics and materials needed.

NOW WE JUST NEED YOU TO SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN so we can launch our first product line and begin to change lives, ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME!

 


  

Lotus Wonders is an ethical lifestyle and fashion brand.  It’s a social enterprise.  It’s a movement investing in women.  It’s about bringing economic empowerment to women in the developing world, 

ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME!

 

 

Card Cases 

Size: 5” x 3” x 0.8”  

Material: cotton and cardboard

Meticulously made with beautiful bold patterns and bright colours, this card case is sure to be a conversation starter.  This tiny perfect box opens to reveal a finely finished compartment for your cards and enough room to hold your cash or all those cards you’ve collected from others.  A must-have accessory for the stylish woman.  Comes in various colours. 

 

 

iPad Cases   

Size: 11” x 12”

Material: cotton

Made with bold patterns and bright colours, this padded case is handmade and beautifully finished with the utmost attention to detail.  With a stylish flap fastened and a magnetic metal snap, this case keeps your iPad secure and your glamour intact.  Comes in various colours.

 

 

These are our amazing, bold colours to choose from. Pick the ones that fit your lifestyle! You will be sent a link to choose colours shortly after the campaign ends! 

We have put the order for all these beautiful colours and expect them to be delivered to our production team in Cambodia shortly. We will update you on the campaign page as soon as they arrive.

 

 

 

Hi Indiegogo!   I started Lotus Wonders after more than 10 years of working in Cambodia as a women’s rights advocate with major international development agencies including UN and most importantly the Cambodian Women's Rights Movment . I always tell people, I am a daughter of land of Persia, I live in the maginificant land of Canada but I was fortunate to be spiced and inspired by the land of Khmers, Cambodia.Lotus Wonders is a story of my FRIENDSHIP with Cambodia, Cambodian Women,Cambodian People, and my Passion for Women's Empowerment! 

Land Evictions is at the present one of the most significant problems that Cambodia faces and Women increasingly are at the center of the resistance to forced evictions in their communities. The centrality of women in land evictions can be seen through the fact that home -the center of their lives- is under attack.

I first hand came to know how hundreds of thousands of women have lost their jobs and their ability to provide for their families as they have been forced to move from their land to make room for modernization and large-scale farming.   

Many of these women and their families are existing on less than $2 a day. Something needed to be done, so we started Lotus Wonders to help and to do our share.  We are creating business and job opportunities for women affected by land evictions.  We believe that we can rally individuals into a movement that links these skilled seamstresses in Cambodia with western markets -  consumers like you who want unique and beautifully made accessories.

I hope you will join the movement to invest in women and their communities.  When you purchase a Lotus Wonders product, YOU help us take one step further towards our goal : Women's Economic Empowerment, One Village at a Time.

  

 

 

The Heart and Soul.  

Mehrak Mehrvar (center right): The founder of the company and the passion behind the cause, she is always smiling and loves talking about the women of Cambodia. An effective change agent driven to make a real impact, she never settles for anything less than the best.

In 2012, Mehrak has been recognized as a recipient of The international Alliance for Women (TIAW) World of Difference 100 Awards. Each year TIAW awards honors 100 women who have made an impact on the economic empowerment of women through a wide range of endeavors.

 The Women’s Champion.  

Stephanie MacKendrick (bottom left): With two decades fighting for women’s advancement in Canada and internationally, Stephanie is sharing her wealth of experience to help guide the movement and support our cause.

 The Design Guru.  

Mamak Mehrvar (top right): On the ground in Cambodia sourcing the most beautiful fabrics and applying her discerning eye to create appealing Lotus Wonders products.

 The Business Wizard.  

Saeed Sahami (center left):  The business mind and strategist of the team, he ensures that our efforts have the maximum impact on our artisans. He is always finding new ways to support the cause and make our dreams a reality through a viable and profitable business model.

The Marketing Maven.  

Brian Donley (bottom right): inspired by the cause, Brian works to engage the community and spread the word about our products and what they can mean for the women of Cambodia.

 

 

 

The Lotus flower has been adopted by women as a peaceful symbol of resistance in Cambodia to land evictions. It perfectly embodies the beauty of the country and our products too.  

Cambodia is also known as the Land of Wonders and that's where the name comes from.  

   

 

If we are successful in this campaign, our sales team will take the product to major retailers across North America and Europe. Your support in this Indiegogo campaign will help us convince retailers that these products are highly marketable.

Once we have retail distribution, we will be able to establish the next Lotus Wonders village teams, hire and train the next group of women affected by land rights issues and fully equip more workplaces. We intend to make an impact by continuously expanding our efforts so that women can achieve economic indpendence throughout the developing world, ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME.

 

 

Launching Lotus Wonders iPad and card cases is just the first step.

Join the movement and help us achieve economic empowerment for women, One Village at a Time.  Spread the word and let's make this world colorful together!

 

 

facebook.com/lotuswonders 

 

 



@lotuswonders

 

 

 

instagram.com/lotuswonders

 

 

 

 

 pinterest.com/lotuswonders

 

 

 

    Our website:   www.lotuswonders.com 

 

     

                If you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact us :

 

     E-Mail:   info [at] lotuswonders [dot] com

 

 

Risks and challenges

1. Workforce

We have developed our supply line in the first village and we are ready to produce and ship your orders, however if we get a HUGE number of orders there may be delays in shipping your items. We have put in place some backup plans for when we get your OVERWHELMING support, including the use of another group of skilled and trained women in Cambodia with disabilities. So don’t worry about ordering another Perk (really... we don’t mind!).

 

2. Fabric

The fabrics used in Lotus Wonders products come in many different colours and patterns. We've picked our favorite colours and have ordered enough to fulfil MORE than just the orders needed to reach our goal. However, we may run out of particular colours if every single person orders the same colour, or we may get so many orders that we have to buy more fabric. There is a slight chance that we may not be able to secure the same colour again if it runs out, but we will be communicating such issues with you transparently and do everything we can to get you your top choice of colour! 

 

 FAQ

1. When and how can I choose which colour I will receive?

Shortly after the campaign is over, we will send you a link to our website where you can pick the colour you like most.

2. When will I receive my case(s)?

We will do our best that the products are ready to be shipped before mid October. However, we hope the shipment starts earlier.

3. What if I forget to pay my shipping costs during my contribution?

You can log in to your Indiegogo account, check the shipping cost that applies to your perk and your shipping address, and then click on "Contribute Now" to the right of the pitch video. Enter the amount there and follow the payment process as you did before. If you used the same Indiegogo account as before, you don't need to contact us to verify the payment as we will automatically merge your two payments in our system. If you made a payment with another Indiegogo account, please contact us for further instruction.

4. What is Fair Wage and what is Minimum Wage?

The minimum wage in Cambodia was $61/mo until a few months ago. Earlier in May 2013, Unions were fighting to increase it to $120 * but could not succeed in the last round of negotiations and finally settled down for $80. What we considered as a fair wage is the amount that Unions were asking for and therefore we intend to set Lotus Wonders' wage to be at least 10% over $120 to ensure a fair practice. This will set our wage 65% more than what all big multi-national companies pay to their workers.

 * http://www.opendevelopmentcambodia.net/news-source/the-cambodia-daily/hun-sen-seeks-garment-factory-vote/

 

5. Is Lotus Wonders a charity?

No. We are a for-profit business incorporated federally in Canada. We consider ourselves a social enterprise.

A social enterprise is a business that exists to make a direct positive social impact on the world. It is innovative and unique because:

  • A social enterprise aims to make a profit, and then use these profits to support its social goals.
  • A social enterprise also provides products that further these social goals.
  • A social enterprise unlocks other ways to make a difference through your consumer choices and actions.When a consumer purchases a product from a social enterprise, he or she makes a tangible, positive impact.

Social enterprises differ from for-profit businesses that merely promote social responsibility. While these businesses often support social change through their policies of corporate social responsibility, the company’s first goal remains to make a profit. A social enterprise, on the other hand, takes social change as its primary objective, and uses its profits to reach it

Louts Wonders' Adivisory Borad Members: Jennifer Dawson, Leah Eichler, Gretchen Van Riesen. 

 

 

Our special thanks and a massive hug to:
 
Bahram Radan and Pouneh Rouhani (RadRou Inc.) and Shadan Saber (Bazaar Marketing & Communications, Inc.) who became part of the Lotus Wonders Movement by donating their professional services! 
 
 
 
For the stunning video.
 
 
  
 
For the superb social media campaign
 
 
 
Thank You and Thank You to : 
 
Shadan, Shellianne, Sopheap, Susan, Zabine, Gretchen, Leah, Jennifer, Pouneh, Bahram, Stuart, Pantea, Hamid, Dilhani, Setareh, Andrew and Afsaneh ! 
 
This would have not been possible without all your passionate works.
story_txt:
We are all about   
Unique Style  All of our handmade iPad and card cases feature bold patterns and vibrant colours that stand out from the crowd.
 

 Highest Quality   Every Lotus Wonders product is exquisitely hand tailored from the finest fabrics by Cambodian women

 


 
Investment in Women   By purchasing an iPad or card case, you are supporting sustainable livelihoods for women and their families, and contributing to the Wonder Fund for community development.
 
Movement   By choosing Lotus Wonders you are joining a movement that brings together savvy consumers to support women in the developing world.
 
 Genuine   Our founder, Mehrak Mehrvar, spent the past 13 years advocating for women’s rights in different countries including Afghanistan, Cambodia,Indonesia and Iran. She started Lotus Wonders when she saw first hand the transformation that can occur when women artisans in the developing world are connected with western markets.
 
Sustainable   Lotus Wonders pays above fair wages AND we contribute an additional 20% beyond those wages to community development through the Wonder Fund so that everyone in the community benefits from your purchase.  Everybody wins! 
 
 


We know that if we raise the economic well-being of women, their families and communities will be lifted up with them. As part of the Lotus Wonders business model, we will train women and develop their long-term economic prospects  by providing them with sustainable, more than fair wages.  
 Beyond providing work opportunities and income, we will also be contributing an extra 20% of their wage to a community fund, the Wonder Fund, that will invest in local projects that the women and their communities decide are most needed.
Is a source of water the most important need for them?  Do they need bicycles for the children to get to a school some distance away?  Heck, do they need a school in their village?  Do they need to improve some housing, some roadways, a power source?  The women themselves will be in charge to decide what is best for their village.



In doing this, the women develop their role as community leaders and the work opportunities benefit more members of the village - touching more and more lives. 
The Wonder Fund turns an investment in women into an investment in the whole community.

 
 
We have finalized our prototypes and made our samples with the help of women in the first village in Cambodia who tailor and handcraft our products, and secured all of the fabrics and materials needed.
NOW WE JUST NEED YOU TO SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN so we can launch our first product line and begin to change lives, ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME!
 

  
Lotus Wonders is an ethical lifestyle and fashion brand.  It’s a social enterprise.  It’s a movement investing in women.  It’s about bringing economic empowerment to women in the developing world, 
ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME!
 
 




Card Cases 
Size: 5” x 3” x 0.8”  
Material: cotton and cardboard




Meticulously made with beautiful bold patterns and bright colours, this card case is sure to be a conversation starter.  This tiny perfect box opens to reveal a finely finished compartment for your cards and enough room to hold your cash or all those cards you’ve collected from others.  A must-have accessory for the stylish woman.  Comes in various colours. 
 


 
iPad Cases   
Size: 11” x 12”
Material: cotton

Made with bold patterns and bright colours, this padded case is handmade and beautifully finished with the utmost attention to detail.  With a stylish flap fastened and a magnetic metal snap, this case keeps your iPad secure and your glamour intact.  Comes in various colours.


 
 


These are our amazing, bold colours to choose from. Pick the ones that fit your lifestyle! You will be sent a link to choose colours shortly after the campaign ends! 
We have put the order for all these beautiful colours and expect them to be delivered to our production team in Cambodia shortly. We will update you on the campaign page as soon as they arrive.
 


 
 


Hi Indiegogo!   I started Lotus Wonders after more than 10 years of working in Cambodia as a women’s rights advocate with major international development agencies including UN and most importantly the Cambodian Women's Rights Movment . I always tell people, I am a daughter of land of Persia, I live in the maginificant land of Canada but I was fortunate to be spiced and inspired by the land of Khmers, Cambodia.Lotus Wonders is a story of my FRIENDSHIP with Cambodia, Cambodian Women,Cambodian People, and my Passion for Women's Empowerment! 
Land Evictions is at the present one of the most significant problems that Cambodia faces and Women increasingly are at the center of the resistance to forced evictions in their communities. The centrality of women in land evictions can be seen through the fact that home -the center of their lives- is under attack.
I first hand came to know how hundreds of thousands of women have lost their jobs and their ability to provide for their families as they have been forced to move from their land to make room for modernization and large-scale farming.   
Many of these women and their families are existing on less than $2 a day. Something needed to be done, so we started Lotus Wonders to help and to do our share.  We are creating business and job opportunities for women affected by land evictions.  We believe that we can rally individuals into a movement that links these skilled seamstresses in Cambodia with western markets -  consumers like you who want unique and beautifully made accessories.
I hope you will join the movement to invest in women and their communities.  When you purchase a Lotus Wonders product, YOU help us take one step further towards our goal : Women's Economic Empowerment, One Village at a Time.
  
 
 
The Heart and Soul.  
Mehrak Mehrvar (center right): The founder of the company and the passion behind the cause, she is always smiling and loves talking about the women of Cambodia. An effective change agent driven to make a real impact, she never settles for anything less than the best.
In 2012, Mehrak has been recognized as a recipient of The international Alliance for Women (TIAW) World of Difference 100 Awards. Each year TIAW awards honors 100 women who have made an impact on the economic empowerment of women through a wide range of endeavors.
 The Women’s Champion.  
Stephanie MacKendrick (bottom left): With two decades fighting for women’s advancement in Canada and internationally, Stephanie is sharing her wealth of experience to help guide the movement and support our cause.
 The Design Guru.  
Mamak Mehrvar (top right): On the ground in Cambodia sourcing the most beautiful fabrics and applying her discerning eye to create appealing Lotus Wonders products.
 The Business Wizard.  
Saeed Sahami (center left):  The business mind and strategist of the team, he ensures that our efforts have the maximum impact on our artisans. He is always finding new ways to support the cause and make our dreams a reality through a viable and profitable business model.
The Marketing Maven.  
Brian Donley (bottom right): inspired by the cause, Brian works to engage the community and spread the word about our products and what they can mean for the women of Cambodia.
 
 


 
The Lotus flower has been adopted by women as a peaceful symbol of resistance in Cambodia to land evictions. It perfectly embodies the beauty of the country and our products too.  
Cambodia is also known as the Land of Wonders and that's where the name comes from.  
   
 

If we are successful in this campaign, our sales team will take the product to major retailers across North America and Europe. Your support in this Indiegogo campaign will help us convince retailers that these products are highly marketable.
Once we have retail distribution, we will be able to establish the next Lotus Wonders village teams, hire and train the next group of women affected by land rights issues and fully equip more workplaces. We intend to make an impact by continuously expanding our efforts so that women can achieve economic indpendence throughout the developing world, ONE VILLAGE AT A TIME.
 
 
Launching Lotus Wonders iPad and card cases is just the first step.
Join the movement and help us achieve economic empowerment for women, One Village at a Time.  Spread the word and let's make this world colorful together!

                If you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact us :
 
     E-Mail:   info [at] lotuswonders [dot] com
 
 
Risks and challenges
1. Workforce

story:
The YF18.3 

We at YF watches believe that being different is being bold and inspiring. Our purpose and driving force behind our existence is to empower and celebrate being different. This is why we have designed YF18.3 and we can't wait to share this watch with you and the rest of the world.   

                             ​

TIME TO BE DIFFERENT 

You are different, after all. You are unique, and you need a watch that is unique in its own right. YF watches is the brand for you, and YF18.3 is the watch for you.

TIME FOR A DIFFERENT WATCH

Color, versatility, design: these are the principles that we have embraced as we have created YF18.3, a watch that stands out confidently. For something different and yet something that always fits in, no matter what the occasion may be.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT?

YF18.3 SPECS

THE COLLECTION

ORANGE

WHITE

RED

BLUE

2 Year Product Warranty – All of our watches come with a two-year product warranty against manufacturing defects. This cover issues or failures in the watch that result from defects during production. It does not cover you against normal wear and tear, accidental, damage, scratches, or failures caused by mistreatment.

30 Days Return Policy – If you are not 100% satisfied with the look and feel of your watch, and you have not used, worn, or modified it, you can return it to us within 30 days of receiving your watch for a full refund. 

Free Int'l Shipping – We offer free international shipping. Please note that orders may be subject to import taxes, custom duties and fees levied by the destination country upon arrival. YF watches has no control over these charges and any additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient of the package. 

INTERCHANGEABLE STRAPS

​ 

• Quick Release Spring Bars: All our straps are equipped with quick release spring bars so you can switch your style in seconds with one easy step using only your finger. Simply slide the spring bar into place - no need for additional hardware or tools.

• Ultimate Comfort: The YF18.3 straps wears cool and doesn’t retain moisture so your wrist won’t get sweaty. Our soft silicone strap is comfortable, waterproof, and perfect for casual, dress, active and sports wear, and all weather.

• Durable & Waterproof: Our silicone strap is designed from 100% waterproof & washable silicone rubber, which is superior to PVC bands, to preserve the longevity of your watch band.

SMOOTH

TEXTURED

CHOOSE YOUR PERK

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to expand the production of YF18.3 and bring our versatile, colorful watch to people everywhere. Business leaders, athletes, artists: this watch is for everyone, and the more widely we can promote it, the smoother the next few months will go for us.

To follow through on all of our most ambitious plans for YF watches, we are looking to raise $15,000 USD which will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing YF18.3 on a large scale. As a sign of our gratitude to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering YF18.3 at an exclusive discount through this Indiegogo campaign.

Pick your color and make YF18.3 yours today!

Risks & Challenges

If we run into any logistical difficulties while we are scaling up our operation, we will be sure to keep all of our contributors in the loop, remaining transparent about the progress that we are making. Manufacturing and distribution may change once we are taking on a larger volume of orders. What will not change is our shared devotion to world-class watches that bear the YF watches name on them. Quality is our driving motivator, near and dear to our hearts. You can count on that.


When you purchase your own YF18.3, you are not only purchasing a watch: you are joining a community. The YF watches brand is bringing together unique people all around the world, celebrating the joys of personality – second by second, minute by minute, and hour by hour.

Be a part of the YF watches movement today!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for YF watches and YF18.3 by sharing a link to the campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We want to introduce our brand and our latest watch to everyone because we are confident that this is a watch that transcends all of the fads and all of the criteria that seem to define the watch industry at the moment. Breaking away from the rules, YF18.3 is about doing your own thing.

It’s time for something different. If you agree, then this is your opportunity to say so.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

 

Share Our Campaign 

THANK YOU

We want to introduce our brand and our latest watch to everyone because we are confident that this is a watch that transcends all of the fads and all of the criteria that seem to define the watch industry at the moment. Breaking away from the rules, YF18.3 is about doing your own thing.
It’s time for something different. If you agree, then this is your opportunity to say so.
We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.
 
Share Our Campaign 




THANK YOU

story:
We'd like to dedicate this project and namesake to Bella Gina, a brilliant Chihuahua who inspired the name of our first handbag with her love for life, free expression, uncontained joy and endless energy. Thank you for inspiring us Bella. You are the original UNRULY GIRL! :)

 

"The Bella is the world's first and only freestanding designer handbag with an integrated tablet window, embedded rechargeable battery supply, interior light and glowing external spine, so you have the power to go go go!"

 

The Bella shown in "Bossy Blue" w/ tablet flap in the closed position.

When we began development of the UNRULY GIRL handbag, the goal was to create a fashionable, attractive purse with great technology and cool features tucked neatly inside, without sacrificing visual appeal. The result is the beautiful Bella - 100% girly on the outside and super nerdy on the inside. :)

Bella Features

The Bella combines high-fashion, a tablet window and a rechargeable battery supply - all in one pretty package!

The Bella bag is the first and only free standing designer handbag with a built in tablet window for the freedom to work, surf the web or enjoy entertainment anywhere you go, with no fuss or wasted space. 

 

Access your tablet on the go!

The Bella is designed for use with the Apple iPad, or the Samsung Galaxy 10.1. You choose the model that fits your tablet! *Tablet not included. **Tablet model will be requested at end of funding.

The internal acoustics of the Bella accentuate your tablet speaker for a sweet mobile music experience!

The Bella shown with the tablet flap in the "Ready To Play" position.

The Bella is a fully functioning purse with a large interior to hold everything you need, and there's a bright light inside so you can find exactly what you're looking for. Just open the bag and it turns on!

The brightly lit interior of the Bella.

And, just for fun, flip the internal light switch to "Fashion" mode to activate the glowing outer spine and make an illuminating statement. You don't need a reason to show off!

Illuminated spine for fun & fashion. Or attracting a taxi. :)

Inside the Bella, we've provided a "wired" cozy pocket that lets you connect and charge your phone directly from the internal battery encased within the base of the Bella. There are multiple internal USB ports to charge your tablet and other mobile devices too!

A padded cozy pocket keeps your phone safe while charging inside the Bella.

Connect any USB phone or tablet cable to the internal USB connectors and charge up!

This means you get hours of portable charging power for all of your devices, regardless of where you find yourself. You can even charge your tablet while you're using it!

At night, just plug-in and charge the battery supply embedded inside the Bella for all-day power to go. Any USB compatible device can then be plugged into Bella's internal or extrrnal USB ports to recharge. Now this gives a whole new meaning to take charge!

The Bella is handcrafted in the USA from high grade leather and a lightweight aluminum spine with a waterproof rubber sole to keep moisture out.

Made in the good old USA!

Waterproof, rubber shoe-style sole. A bag with a sole! :)

The Bella has an adjustable strap for just the right position!

The Bella is available in these four fun colors: "Brainy Black", "Bossy Blue", "Grouch Geen" and "Perfect Pink". Choose the color that best matches you. Or enjoy them all on different occasions, because one purse is never enough! *Your choice of Bella color(s) will be requested at the end of funding.

Choose from four fun and fancy flavors!

"Brainy Black"

"Bossy Blue"

"Grouch Green"

"Perfect Pink"

The "Bella" from UNRULY GIRL is the future of designer handbags, where fashion and technology seamlessly merge with style.

Hello technology, please meet fashion!

Please help us fund this project so we can bring more fun, function and fashion to the world! 

Thank you!

 

The Bella by UNRULY Girl.

Risks and challenges

The Bella will be produced in four manufacturing stages.
1) The aluminum frame/base and all metal components will be produced with the support of our product engineering firm.


2) A mold for the branded rubber sole will be developed and castings will be made.


3) The completed frame+base+sole will be provided to a well-established handbag and shoe manufacturing facility in West New York state. Their team of skilled men and women will hand assemble and stitch the Bella to completion.


4) All Bella bags wil be delivered to our office in Portland, OR where they'll be inspected for quality, then shipped to you!

Our goal is to ship product within 90 days from receipt of funding on indiegogo.

Questions and Answers

Q) Does the tablet come with the Bella?

A) No. You provide your own tablet.

 

Q) What kind of tablet will work in the Bella?

A) There are two versions: Apple iPad or Samsung Galaxy 10.1. (choose one)

 

Q) Do you make a Bella bag for the Apple iPad Mini?

A) We are currently designing the "Baby Bella" clutch for iPad Mini. Stay tuned for an announcement by visiting the UNRULY GIRL website and signing up for our mailing list.

 

Q) What kind of phone can I charge in Bella's phone pocket?

A) Any phone that has a USB charging cable. 

 

Q) How do I charge the internal battery?

A) Bella comes with a USB to Edison charging cable. Simply insert the USB connector into the base of the bag, then you can plug into any wall outlet.

 

Q) How do I know when the battery is charged?

A) There is a battery level indicator on the spine of the bag, just above the power button.

 

Q) Can you charge/power devices from the USB on the outside of the bag?

A) Yes. The USB in the base of the Bella is bi-directional. You can plug-in and charge the Bella, or power a separate device.

 

Q) Is the Bella heavy?

A) The weight of the Bella is comparable to other "standard handbags". By incorporating a lightweight aluminum spine, the Bella has substantial structure without additional weight.

 

Q) Can I still listen to audio from my tablet?

A) Yes. You can either plug-in headphones or listen with the tablet speaker. The Bella was designed to retain and accentuate excellent sound quality from your tablet when mounted in the window.

 

Q) How do I plug my headphones into the tablet?

A) There's an access slot on the side of the bag. With the tablet cover flap open, feed the audio cable through the slot and plug it into your tablet.

 

Q) How difficult is it to remove the tablet from the bag?

A) It's easy! Just flip open the tablet cover flap, unsnap the tablet sleeve inside and remove the tablet. Tada!

 

Q) How do I make the spine light up?

A) Just push the power button on the spine of the Bella to activate the power supply. Inside the bag you'll find a small switch beneath the upper spine. Flip it into "Fashion" mode to activate the outer spine light.

 

Q) Can I clean the Bella's rubber sole?

A) Yes, that's part of it's beauty! Just use a mild detergent with warm water.

 

Q) How do I plug my tablet's charging cable into the internal battery?

A) There's a trap door and compartment in the floor of the Bella. Inside you will find multiple USB connectors. Here you can plug-in any USB compatible cable and route it to your tablet. Store the excess cable in the floor compartment.

 

Q) How do I plug my phone's charging cable into the internal battery?

A) There's a trap door and compartment in the floor of the Bella. Inside you will find multiple USB connectors. Here you can plug-in any USB compatible cable and route it to your phone or device. Store the excess cable in the floor compartment.
story_txt:
We'd like to dedicate this project and namesake to Bella Gina, a brilliant Chihuahua who inspired the name of our first handbag with her love for life, free expression, uncontained joy and endless energy. Thank you for inspiring us Bella. You are the original UNRULY GIRL! :)

 
"The Bella is the world's first and only freestanding designer handbag with an integrated tablet window, embedded rechargeable battery supply, interior light and glowing external spine, so you have the power to go go go!"
 

The Bella shown in "Bossy Blue" w/ tablet flap in the closed position.
When we began development of the UNRULY GIRL handbag, the goal was to create a fashionable, attractive purse with great technology and cool features tucked neatly inside, without sacrificing visual appeal. The result is the beautiful Bella - 100% girly on the outside and super nerdy on the inside. :)

Bella Features

The Bella combines high-fashion, a tablet window and a rechargeable battery supply - all in one pretty package!
The Bella bag is the first and only free standing designer handbag with a built in tablet window for the freedom to work, surf the web or enjoy entertainment anywhere you go, with no fuss or wasted space. 

 

Access your tablet on the go!
The Bella is designed for use with the Apple iPad, or the Samsung Galaxy 10.1. You choose the model that fits your tablet! *Tablet not included. **Tablet model will be requested at end of funding.

The internal acoustics of the Bella accentuate your tablet speaker for a sweet mobile music experience!

The Bella shown with the tablet flap in the "Ready To Play" position.
The Bella is a fully functioning purse with a large interior to hold everything you need, and there's a bright light inside so you can find exactly what you're looking for. Just open the bag and it turns on!

The brightly lit interior of the Bella.
And, just for fun, flip the internal light switch to "Fashion" mode to activate the glowing outer spine and make an illuminating statement. You don't need a reason to show off!

Illuminated spine for fun & fashion. Or attracting a taxi. :)
Inside the Bella, we've provided a "wired" cozy pocket that lets you connect and charge your phone directly from the internal battery encased within the base of the Bella. There are multiple internal USB ports to charge your tablet and other mobile devices too!

A padded cozy pocket keeps your phone safe while charging inside the Bella.

Connect any USB phone or tablet cable to the internal USB connectors and charge up!
This means you get hours of portable charging power for all of your devices, regardless of where you find yourself. You can even charge your tablet while you're using it!

At night, just plug-in and charge the battery supply embedded inside the Bella for all-day power to go. Any USB compatible device can then be plugged into Bella's internal or extrrnal USB ports to recharge. Now this gives a whole new meaning to take charge!
The Bella is handcrafted in the USA from high grade leather and a lightweight aluminum spine with a waterproof rubber sole to keep moisture out.

Made in the good old USA!

Waterproof, rubber shoe-style sole. A bag with a sole! :)

The Bella has an adjustable strap for just the right position!
The Bella is available in these four fun colors: "Brainy Black", "Bossy Blue", "Grouch Geen" and "Perfect Pink". Choose the color that best matches you. Or enjoy them all on different occasions, because one purse is never enough! *Your choice of Bella color(s) will be requested at the end of funding.

Choose from four fun and fancy flavors!

"Brainy Black"

"Bossy Blue"

"Grouch Green"

"Perfect Pink"
The "Bella" from UNRULY GIRL is the future of designer handbags, where fashion and technology seamlessly merge with style.

Hello technology, please meet fashion!
Please help us fund this project so we can bring more fun, function and fashion to the world! 
Thank you!
 

The Bella by UNRULY Girl.
Risks and challenges
The Bella will be produced in four manufacturing stages. 1) The aluminum frame/base and all metal components will be produced with the support of our product engineering firm.
2) A mold for the branded rubber sole will be developed and castings will be made.
3) The completed frame+base+sole will be provided to a well-established handbag and shoe manufacturing facility in West New York state. Their team of skilled men and women will hand assemble and stitch the Bella to completion.
4) All Bella bags wil be delivered to our office in Portland, OR where they'll be inspected for quality, then shipped to you!
Our goal is to ship product within 90 days from receipt of funding on indiegogo.
Questions and Answers
Q) Does the tablet come with the Bella?
A) No. You provide your own tablet.
 
Q) What kind of tablet will work in the Bella?
A) There are two versions: Apple iPad or Samsung Galaxy 10.1. (choose one)
 
Q) Do you make a Bella bag for the Apple iPad Mini?
A) We are currently designing the "Baby Bella" clutch for iPad Mini. Stay tuned for an announcement by visiting the UNRULY GIRL website and signing up for our mailing list.
 
Q) What kind of phone can I charge in Bella's phone pocket?
A) Any phone that has a USB charging cable. 
 
Q) How do I charge the internal battery?
A) Bella comes with a USB to Edison charging cable. Simply insert the USB connector into the base of the bag, then you can plug into any wall outlet.
 
Q) How do I know when the battery is charged?
A) There is a battery level indicator on the spine of the bag, just above the power button.
 
Q) Can you charge/power devices from the USB on the outside of the bag?
A) Yes. The USB in the base of the Bella is bi-directional. You can plug-in and charge the Bella, or power a separate device.
 
Q) Is the Bella heavy?
A) The weight of the Bella is comparable to other "standard handbags". By incorporating a lightweight aluminum spine, the Bella has substantial structure without additional weight.
 
Q) Can I still listen to audio from my tablet?
A) Yes. You can either plug-in headphones or listen with the tablet speaker. The Bella was designed to retain and accentuate excellent sound quality from your tablet when mounted in the window.
 
Q) How do I plug my headphones into the tablet?
A) There's an access slot on the side of the bag. With the tablet cover flap open, feed the audio cable through the slot and plug it into your tablet.
 
Q) How difficult is it to remove the tablet from the bag?
A) It's easy! Just flip open the tablet cover flap, unsnap the tablet sleeve inside and remove the tablet. Tada!
 
Q) How do I make the spine light up?
A) Just push the power button on the spine of the Bella to activate the power supply. Inside the bag you'll find a small switch beneath the upper spine. Flip it into "Fashion" mode to activate the outer spine light.
 
Q) Can I clean the Bella's rubber sole?
A) Yes, that's part of it's beauty! Just use a mild detergent with warm water.
 
Q) How do I plug my tablet's charging cable into the internal battery?
A) There's a trap door and compartment in the floor of the Bella. Inside you will find multiple USB connectors. Here you can plug-in any USB compatible cable and route it to your tablet. Store the excess cable in the floor compartment.
 
Q) How do I plug my phone's charging cable into the internal battery?
A) There's a trap door and compartment in the floor of the Bella. Inside you will find multiple USB connectors. Here you can plug-in any USB compatible cable and route it to your phone or device. Store the excess cable in the floor compartment.

story:
Toyish Projects

We are a boutique design team based in HONG KONG that specializes in lifestyle products. We are bored with conventional designs, so we aim to design in an experimental manner. We believe that functionality and aesthetic should coexist and create awesome products. 

http://www.toyishprojects.com

www.facebook.com/toyishprojects

Self-Assembly Leather Coin Bags


The Self-Assembly Leather Coin Bags are made with premium graded vegetable tanned leather, and with brass screws and buttons provided. With the instruction guide provided in the package, customers can have their unconventional DIY leather toys without any special skills and extra time. The procedure is simple and quick. It is definitely the best DIY gifts for holidays and for everyone, at all ages.


Toyish Slotting VS Hand Stitching

Leather goods have always been luxurious goods because of the involvement of leather craftsmanship. However, with our design, the final cost is reduced and you can gain more than you thought.


Less Time: Slotting only takes you 3-5 minutes. The whole process is simple and quick.

Less Tools: Only your hands, 1 piece of Toyish Projects designed leather, 2 pairs of brass screws and buttons! No preparation is needed! Unlike conventional hand stitching, you may need needles, wax threads, tooth prickling iron, etc…..

Easy and User-friendly: No special skills on leather is required when you hand on it. With the simple instruction guide, everyone can finish it without getting any troubles and help, even kids and elderly.

Experience: While others are using hand-stitched leather goods, your Toyish bag will be the special one. It will be a good way to start a conversation with this innovative design and share your DIY experience to friends that its actually simple and stylish.

Less Cost: As we save the input of the leather craftsmanship and unnecessary tools, the final cost is lower. However, the quality can still be superior.


It is enough volume to hold your cards, notes and coins securely. You can put anything you want inside, for instance, your earphones, keys,etc.


It is unique and stylish that matches your every daily outfits. Furthermore, SELF collection 2014 includes purses, clutches, tote bags, card holders. With fine leather and awesome colour combination, that makes your looks more impressive.


Material

- Vegetable tanned leather  (Black, Olive, Natural)

-  PU lining (Black)

-  Brass screws and buttons

-  User-friendly instruction guides


Toyish Projects Production Plan

-  Research & Design

Doing design in an experimental manner means that we need to undergo lots of researches and trials. We aim to investigate the possibilities among different materials, to break through the conventional designs, to maintain the compatibility of functionality and aesthetic.


-  Distribution

Self-Assembly Leather Coin Bags are affordable. The final cost is less as the involvement of leather craftsmanship is reduced. We do not think there is positive relationship between the price and the quality. Toyish Projects wish to sell the high-quality leather goods at a more reasonable price at different lifestyles stores.


Previous Work

http://www.toyishprojects.com

www.facebook.com/toyishprojects


Risks and challenges

As we start from small, we need resources and financial support for mass production and promotion for the SELF collection.

Colours shown on the screen may vary from the actual product. 

For future development, Toyish Projects will continue doing researches and design with different techniques and materials. During the preparation period, we need to source the best materials, make lots of prototypes, go through tests and trials. With small quantity of order, the production cost in factories is comparatively higher. That means we need money and your generous support to keep going.

Please pledge and support us ! 

After pledges us, we would appreciate that you “like” and “share” our project to your friends on facebook and twitter.Your support is triple!!

If you are a retailer or a distributor, we would love to hear from you.

We would be grateful if you contact us with any comments, ideas or questions.

story:
Huge thanks to all!

Sadly we did not meet the goal in time. In short we had the money for the armor and katana (with customs fees and tax) but no money for the studio time, the foot soldier outfit or for the perks like making fine art prints, custom posters or printing the postcards or shipping all the stuff. Or for the perks tax.

We had a nice run so all is good. Life is not about fails and wins but it is of doing different things and getting experiences :)


Best,

J

story:
Horror, Gore, and Zombies!

 

Hi, my name is Dean Jones (no, not of Walt Disney fame!), and I'm trying to start my own line of a zombie t-shirt brand, Victus Mortuus (living dead).  This particular line is based on the seven deadly sins: wrath, greed, sloth, pride, lust, envy, and gluttony.

 

It's my hope to share these with you and raise $5000 to cover the cost of materials and shipping, and to help me start my t-shirt design business.  I have many design ideas that I am eager to promote in the future.

 

I have been passionate about my art for years, and your support will help me realize a lifelong dream.

 

You can view each of the 7 t-shirt designs at the gallery section of this page.

It's my hope to share these with you and raise $5000 to cover the cost of materials and shipping, and to help me start my t-shirt design business.  I have many design ideas that I am eager to promote in the future.
 
I have been passionate about my art for years, and your support will help me realize a lifelong dream.
 
You can view each of the 7 t-shirt designs at the gallery section of this page.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • We are ROCKDEEP INC. (www.ROCKDEEPINC.com) and we started out with several concept sneakers on KickStarter a few years ago which went great for those who train and wanted a premium sneaker / sneaker boot at a great price point under $100

  • This go round after requests from so many people who supported our first endeavor we focus on those who want footwear strictly for work purposes.  Bartenders, hostesses, back of house, front of house, hospitality, security personnel and others who just want a great shoe.  This shoe will also pique the interest of those who dress casually in other industries like tech and education.
  • If this campaign achieves success much like my first one it will allow us to do more specialty footwear in the future.  Our plans will focus on disabled and mentally challenged individuals who want comfortable footwear that have easy on easy off capabilities but aren't cheap in material or function.

Our potential with each campaign aims to reach further and dig deeper into what we can do.  You can help yourself while assisting us in getting to that point.

What We Need & What You Get

The Fun Stuff:

  • Like every campaign we are transparent throughout from A-Z letting you know the process as well as expectations..
  • We learned from our past campaign the perks were the product. Timely, functional and great price-point. Those who back this campaign will get discounted pricing on this particular choice of shoes that we are offering.
  • If we don't reach our goal you will get your pledge back and the only thing lost is our investment into making such a great product.
  • You will have two choices. 
  • The ROCKDEEP RAX XAR

 ROCKDEEP SOLSTICE.

  • The SOLSTICE will be offered in ALL black but had to be done with colors for development reasons, but will have subtle things within the shoe when you see it up close.

The Impact and Your Help Is Needed

Why you are crucial to this project:

  • This project will need at LEAST 2000 people to pledge or 2000 pairs to be purchased in all
  • Why? Because when you work with factories there are minimum order requirements in order to keep the production costs low.  Without the ability to make 2000 pairs, we can not reach our goal.
  • We honestly think if everyone globally assists in sharing this project we will more than exceed our goal.
  • ROCKDEEP INC. isn't a fly by not company, having done our first crowdfunding on KickStarter it propelled us to a growing company that has made great strides in only two years.
  • We put our companies name on the line that you not only LOVE these products you will wish you had purchased a few pairs (which at the price we offer you'll be able to do).

Risks & Challenges

In keeping with our transparency we will be creating a Facebook group exclusively for those who pledge.  (https://www.facebook.com/groups/ServiceIndustry...)
This will show the process all the way through.  Complete and utter transparency.

Our only risk to this is it going far beyond what we imagined it.  We have done wear testing, we have done development of both offerings and all that is left is to produce them.  

We only see one obstacle or struggle and thats not having FULL participation of EVERY single person supporting this assisting us spread this all over the world via your social media platforms.  We won't be enough. Our reach wont be as far and wide as those who support us.  With that we need you from start to finish

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If for any reason you can't back this project you can help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Share share share and do more sharing.  Tell everyone you know and tell them to do the same. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and or share from our social media platforms.

OFFERINGS and THINGS TO KNOW:
We are offering two pairs of shoes. 

  • The ROCKDEEP SOLSTICE and the ROCKDEEP RAX XAR
  • Both are mesh and made of non-slip soles. 

The ROCKDEEP SOLSTICE will be offered at the low price of $50 plus shipping


The ROCKDEEP RAX XAR will be offered at the low price of $65 plus shipping

Both can be washed in cold water and air dried and put back on and ready for more wear without any damage to the shoe.

WHAT ELSE HAVE WE DONE SINCE OUR FIRST KICKSTARTER?

Check it out...Over 80 styles and thousands of colors.  We have our initial backers to thank.

 

OTHER PICS OF THE SOLSTICE AND XAR

story:
Our Story

Hello Indiegogo family! We are JoeyPac™, an accessories & apparel design brand based in Los Angeles, CA. We're so excited to share our first product, the 2L Venture Bag, and with your valued support, we'll continue to create FUNctional products for you to enjoy on your errands & endeavors.

Now that we've moved into production after our successful Kickstarter campaign (http://kck.st/3veF2AF), we're looking to keep our momentum by offering our product here! Using Indiegogo's inDemand platform allows you to continue placing orders while the bags are being produced, letting our small operation focus on marketing and getting our website polished. Our Kickstarter marked the official launch of our brand, so we're extremely appreciative that you're interested in our journey this early on!

 

 

The Venture Bag is a carefully reimagined fanny pack/bum bag/sling bag with functionality to free your pockets of the modern essentials, and features that make charging your device easier. Its 2L capacity is the perfect size to wear every day and also accompanies you on any outing. All three colorways will make you want to venture out, and our eye-catching liner designs will make you look within...

Our meticulous attention to detail forced us to consider all things while developing this bag; practicality, quality of materials, aesthetics, and most importantly, how the bag makes you feel. We hope we've made something you can thoroughly enjoy and proudly wear.

  

(Above: An all black outer and watercolor + neon-noir-inspired liner makes up our 'After Midnight' colorway.)

 

(Above: Taking you back to the '90s with our 'Retrograde' colorway!)

 

(Above: Our 'IncogNeato' colorway was inspired by camouflage and we added some color pop with safety orange features!)

 

 

Why JoeyPac?

Well, to put it simply, JoeyPac has those feelings of nostalgia that we love, and just don't get from many other brands. It's what we associate our brand with that gives us that lasting impression: adventure, no matter how small! There's just something about confidently hopping out your front door knowing your contents are secure inside a bag you're happy to wear, and that you're ready for whatever's ahead!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Design Features: 

2-liter capacity

11in. x 5in. x 2.5in. 

Dedicated, padded rear cell phone pocket with zipper

Water-resistant treated oxford nylon shell

Waterproof zipper

Dual branded zipper pulls

Adjustable straps (with 7" of molle webbing)

Elastic band for excess strap

Fidlock magnetic buckle

Liners with custom artwork

6" stash pocket

2 card sleeves

Mesh pocket

Rubber pass-through eyelet

Velcro Wall (reversible & removable)

(Above: While it can be fun for you and your friends to get lost together, we don't encourage that within your Venture Bag, so we've included a Velcro Wall to prevent that from happening to your items. It's reversible for a slightly different layout and removable to fit larger items more easily.)

 

 

MOBILE CHARGING:

With our built-in features of a designated cell sleeve, mesh pocket to house your power bank, and thru-port, leaving your device connected and charging in your JoeyPac is made simple. Wanna check a text? Just pull your phone out of the cell sleeve and keep your phone plugged in to keep a charge. With our phones constantly running out of battery or being stuck in a place with no outlets - we wanted to have a pack that helps you be as nomadic as you want. We've all been there– festival lines, concerts, hiking, camping at the beach or in the mountains, or just out on a stroll, and all of the sudden your device is on 1%... *whomp*whomp* well, all you have to do is provide your trusty power bank & cable, and the Venture Bag keeps it organized for you.

 

 

OUR IDEOLOGY:

It's simple, we set out to design a fun product and brand that helps you feel great; about your next adventure, knowing your contents are safe & organized inside a bag that suits you, knowing your mobile device is charged/easily accessible, and most importantly, feel great about those moments; big and small. So, go ahead and get out there, take your JoeyPac with you, and watch that whole sunset, see the last song, take the long way back, stargaze just a little bit longer!

JoeyPac – "Venture out. Look within..."

 

Thank you for your support! 

 

Risks & Challenges

– Launching a business during a global pandemic is a challenge in and of itself, but we've remained patient and vigilant during the process, which has fueled our excitement to share it with you even more!

– Because of Covid related issues, there may be delays in shipping, however, our manufacturer has been prompt and transparent throughout, so we don't expect that to be a problem.

– Unfortunately, refunds will not be accepted after pledges are collected from this campaign.

– If any problems do arise, we will notify you immediately here on IndieGoGo and our social media pages:

IG @JoeyPac.Official https://www.instagram.com/joeypac.official/

FB /JoeyPac.Official https://www.facebook.com/JoeyPac.Official

Twitter @JoeyPac_ https://twitter.com/JoeyPac_
story_txt:
Our Story
Hello Indiegogo family! We are JoeyPac™, an accessories & apparel design brand based in Los Angeles, CA. We're so excited to share our first product, the 2L Venture Bag, and with your valued support, we'll continue to create FUNctional products for you to enjoy on your errands & endeavors.
Now that we've moved into production after our successful Kickstarter campaign (http://kck.st/3veF2AF), we're looking to keep our momentum by offering our product here! Using Indiegogo's inDemand platform allows you to continue placing orders while the bags are being produced, letting our small operation focus on marketing and getting our website polished. Our Kickstarter marked the official launch of our brand, so we're extremely appreciative that you're interested in our journey this early on!
 

 
The Venture Bag is a carefully reimagined fanny pack/bum bag/sling bag with functionality to free your pockets of the modern essentials, and features that make charging your device easier. Its 2L capacity is the perfect size to wear every day and also accompanies you on any outing. All three colorways will make you want to venture out, and our eye-catching liner designs will make you look within...
Our meticulous attention to detail forced us to consider all things while developing this bag; practicality, quality of materials, aesthetics, and most importantly, how the bag makes you feel. We hope we've made something you can thoroughly enjoy and proudly wear.
  

(Above: An all black outer and watercolor + neon-noir-inspired liner makes up our 'After Midnight' colorway.)
 

(Above: Taking you back to the '90s with our 'Retrograde' colorway!)
 

(Above: Our 'IncogNeato' colorway was inspired by camouflage and we added some color pop with safety orange features!)
 

 
Why JoeyPac?
Well, to put it simply, JoeyPac has those feelings of nostalgia that we love, and just don't get from many other brands. It's what we associate our brand with that gives us that lasting impression: adventure, no matter how small! There's just something about confidently hopping out your front door knowing your contents are secure inside a bag you're happy to wear, and that you're ready for whatever's ahead!
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
Design Features: 
2-liter capacity
11in. x 5in. x 2.5in. 
Dedicated, padded rear cell phone pocket with zipper
Water-resistant treated oxford nylon shell
Waterproof zipper
Dual branded zipper pulls
Adjustable straps (with 7" of molle webbing)
Elastic band for excess strap
Fidlock magnetic buckle
Liners with custom artwork
6" stash pocket
2 card sleeves
Mesh pocket
Rubber pass-through eyelet
Velcro Wall (reversible & removable)

(Above: While it can be fun for you and your friends to get lost together, we don't encourage that within your Venture Bag, so we've included a Velcro Wall to prevent that from happening to your items. It's reversible for a slightly different layout and removable to fit larger items more easily.)
 

 
MOBILE CHARGING:

Wanna check a text? Just pull your phone out of the cell sleeve and keep your phone plugged in to keep a charge. With our phones constantly running out of battery or being stuck in a place with no outlets - we wanted to have a pack that helps you be as nomadic as you want. We've all been there– festival lines, concerts, hiking, camping at the beach or in the mountains, or just out on a stroll, and all of the sudden your device is on 1%... *whomp*whomp* well, all you have to do is provide your trusty power bank & cable, and the Venture Bag keeps it organized for you.
 

 
OUR IDEOLOGY:
It's simple, we set out to design a fun product and brand that helps you feel great; about your next adventure, knowing your contents are safe & organized inside a bag that suits you, knowing your mobile device is charged/easily accessible, and most importantly, feel great about those moments; big and small. So, go ahead and get out there, take your JoeyPac with you, and watch that whole sunset, see the last song, take the long way back, stargaze just a little bit longer!

story:
See how you can customize your bag:

 

You would love your journey more with AphroAdonis Traveller. Its traveling in style. Made to contain all your belongings in one chamber and with old school belt closure, suspended from ultralight aluminum frames. Be it weekend travels or overseas it fits to all your travel needs and that to in style.


Key Features:

Top handle with 7 inch drop

Lightweight aluminium rod

Front belt styling

Top belt closure

Interior zip pocket and Smartphone pocket

Top belt fastener inside

Dimensions:

L20 x H11.5 x D8.0 (Inches)

The rare vintage. One of the most loved & sought after bag reinvented. Travel smart with AphroAdonis Vintage Legacy. Carry it as a cabin luggage or be it arriving on the belt, people wouldn't resist to know who owns that classic bag. Designed to carry all your valuables for a business or leisure trip. A collectible piece of craftsmanship to cherish forever.

Key Features:

Top Lock closure

Top frame mounted briefcase handle

Lightweight frame opening

Adjustable shoulder handle with 16 inch drop

Interior zip pocket and Smartphone pocket

Zip closed shoe compartment below

5 studs supporting the bottom

Dimensions:

L16.5 x H14.5 x D9.5 (Inches)

Set out to travel the world with your AphroAdonis Globe Trotter, a must have for those who travel frequently. A multi pocket laptop traveller with 9 pockets for easy access to all your frequently used belongings including a 4" gusset as well.


Key Features:

2 compartments

8 multi utility pockets 

4 pockets with zip closure in front

2 pockets with magnetic button closure in front

2 pockets with snap button closure one on each side gusset

One across back pocket

Interior zip pocket and smartphone pocket

1 Laptop compartment

1 Ipad / notebook / document compartment

4 Card slots

2 Pen slots

1 Keyring holder 

Adjustable shoulder strap with 20 inch drop

Dimensions:

L15.5 x H11.5 x D4.0 (Inches)
 

Luxury at workplace, its AphroAdonis Professional. True to its name, understated, calm, silent but at the same time a super performer, a true professional. Great to carry your laptop and work essentials. It gets better with experience, just like you.

Key Features:

Double front loop strap with snap button embellishment

One front pocket with zip closure

One across back pocket with magnetic closure

Interior zip pocket and Smartphone pocket

1 laptop compartment

1 ipad/ notebook /document compartment

4 card slots

2 pen slots

1 Key ring holder 

5.5 inch short handle drop

Adjustable shoulder strap with 20 inch drop

Dimensions:

L15.75 x H11.25 x D2.5 (inches)

*NOTE: Products not available in White

 

The AphroAdonis Classic tote for all your vintage memories. Step into the luxurious world, specially hand crafted for you as per your wish to fit your needs. The tote that is always in style.

Key Features:

Top magnetic button closure

Dual panel details on body

Rivet embellishment for handle reinforcement

10 inch handle drop

Smartphone pocket and zip pocket interior

Dimensions:

L12 x H11.25 x H5.5 (Inches)

An all purpose zip round wallet.

Key Features:

Zip closure

12 card slots

2 long note pockets

1 zip pocket inside

2 divided compartments

Dimensions:

L7.5 x H4 x D0.75 (Inches)

A personal zip round pouch, handy elongated zip round pouch for personal utilities / stationeries.

Key Features:

A handy elongated zip round pouch for personal utilities / stationeries 

Top stitch details

Top zip closure

Dimensions:

L7.5 x H3 x D2 (Inches)

Hold the love of nature in your hands. Its AphroAdonis First love. It is beauty, elegance, attitude, mutual attraction, all combined together just like first love, which stays there forever in your life.

Key Features:

Top flap with rose details

Magnet closure

Top handle

Smartphone pocket and zip pocket interior

1 back pocket with zip closure

Adjustable shoulder sling with 24 inch drop

Dimensions:

L10 x H10 x D3 (Inches)

story:
This is a crowd founding campaign, which  is lounched to be able to finance the production of my last collection “L’ète Indien”.

I´m asking for 6000 euros to pay the factory in New Delhi that will make the clothes. It will be a total of 250 pieces, plus the export fees and transport.


WHAT YOU’LL GET FROM SUPPORTING COZARLLADO?

You will get COZARLLADO’s clothes for the value of your collaboration according to the retail price but with a special discount. For example: if you give us 25 euros, you will get one piece which will be sold for 40 euros at the stores.  All of the clothes are made in natural fibers like cotton, linen and silk, with embroidered beads and sequences.  The prices at the stores will vary between 40 and 150 euros.  You can see the clothes in the pictures and if you like them it’s like buying them in advance and for a much better price.

Contributions will be refunded if we don’t meet the goal.

This production will be very important because it’s the first time COZARLLADO produces in a large scale and overseas, making the most of our experience in India during two years.  There has been other previous collections but always in small quantities, produced in Madrid with a lot of selling success in exclusive boutiques in Madrid.

It’s important to say that when you wear COZARLLADO you can really feel the quality and comfort of its fabrics and shapes.  Plus, you know you are wearing something which is ethical and exclusive.  The experience of luxury without ostentation.

You can also help us by sharing our project with you friends, by spreading our message.  You can use the sharing tool by Indiegogo.  Not only money is important.  If you feel identified or you sympathyse with what we are talking about, please give us an opportunity.  We will all win.


Esto es una campaña de "crowd founding" para conseguir financiación para producir la colección “L’ètè Indien”.  

Necesitamos 6000 euros para poder pagar a la fábrica de Nueva Delhi donde me proporcionan todo lo necesario para poder realizar la producción. En total serán unas 250 prendas, más los gastos de envío y tasas de exportación.  

¿QUÉ CONSEGUIRÁS AL AYUDARNOS?

Si nos ayudas a continuar con muestro proyecto te recompensaremos con prendas de la colección por el valor de tu contribución y de acuerdo al PVP pero con un descuento muy especial.  Por ejemplo, si tu aportación es de 50 euros, recibirás una prenda cuyo PVP en las tiendas será 80 euros.  

Todas las prendas están hechas en tejidos de fibras naturales como algodón, lino y seda, con bordados de lentejuelas y pedrería.  Su PVP en las tiendas oscilará entre los 40 y los 150 euros.  Puedes ver las prendas en las fotos y si te gustan es como si estuvieras comprándolas por adelantado y con un gran descuento.

¿QUÉ PASARÁ CON LOS FONDOS RECAUDADOS EN CASO DE NO LLEGAR A LA META?

Las contribuciones serán reembolsados ​​si no cumplimos con nuestro objetivo.  

También puedes ayudarnos dando a conocer nuestro proyecto a tus amigos y difundiendo nuestro mensaje a través de las redes sociales y utilizando la herramienta de compartir de Indiegogo.  No sólo el dinero es importante para ayudarnos.  Si te sientes identificada o simpatizas con lo que proponemos, danos una oportunidad.  Todos saldremos ganando.
