story:
Stand out from others by wearing the colors of his favorite team, the most beautiful T-shirts, best album covers, or the most beautiful works of art ?     Now it's possible!


DOÑO, North American brand meaning chameleon in Fulani (west african language), invents a new concept : sneakers with interchangeable facades.

This innovative project is already very popular all over the world : USA, Canada, Europe, South Africa, Australia, and especially in Asian countries !


"People have something in common: they are all different" (Robert Zend)

DOÑO is a small start-up with two longtime french friends who matured this project several years. We traveled the world to study carefully the global market, and we open our office in Montreal, Canada. There from the beginning works with many professionals (communication experts, fashion designers, streetwear shop managers, sneakers addicts ...)

Innovative Cobranding

The sale of products is recommended by a community of online experts (premium brands, sneaker addicts, artists, celebrities), which will offer their favorite visuals simply tweeting with the hashtag #imaginefeaturingDono. Via social media, everyone can give its opinion and reviews on proposed collections to whether or not the buzz over social media via twitter, facebook, tumblr, instagram, google+ ...

Premium Limited Edition

We work with finest brands. When we would like to release a collab  with a brand or a shop, the products are handcrafted in European workshops. People will find our collections in physical shops and online the most advanced worldwide.


To start our first production, we need your support for the manufacturing in Portugal and France, and for the marketing.

Pre-order specifying your size, color sneaker, and selected masks.

Size :  USA-CANADA ( 7 to 12 )  EUR ( 39 to 46 )  UK ( 6 to 11 )  JP ( 25 to 29,5)


THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT ALL AROUND THE WORLD !

 "Classic !"    SAN FRANPSYCHO (San Francisco)
"Hahaa Awesome"    PIXEL PANDA (Netherlands)
"Fresh Concept!!! & the sneakers are too fresh"   SPACEFELLAZ (South Africa)
"Nice!"   FAKE (Belgium)
"That would be sweet!"    LA FOOTBALL LEAGUE (Los Angeles, United States)
"Looks great!!"    INOUWEE (Denmark)
"A cool and very original idea"    THIRDWORLD APPAREL (United Kingdom)
"the idea is great--super original."   RAQUEL  (New York City, United States)
"Wicked! We'll keep an eye out"    DICED (United Kingdom)
"крутяк!"    IM SIBERIAN    (Russia)
"Very great concept to have interchangeable sneakers."    WISLAZ (Bali)

Our Project is follow by finest brands & shops :
Ssur (new york), Captain Street (tokyo), Kaotiko (barcelona), The Sole Supplier (uk), Bob Brand (japan), Meet The Dealers (nyc), Radii (colombia), Esp (osaka), New Era (europe), Link (japan), Dope Jewelry (hong-kong), Diamond Destiny (bali), Karmaloop (uk), Le Leon (paris), Premier Fits (usa), Eikei (montreal), Le Flah (japan), Halvo (scandinavia), Fakka (netherlands), Jewellery Kings (australia), Navarah (glasgow), Berlinair (germany), Gearbottle (united states), The Unempire (melbourne), Subciety (japan), Onelock (japan), Come & Calle (chili), Tough Cookie (paris), Ms Tillas (chili), Suite 160 (las vegas), Wheat City (kansas city), Sacrebleu (france), The Nextdoor (france), The Hip Store (leeds), Claudia & Paolo (italy), Upper Echelon (united states), TNSFGS (australia), La Bong (netherlands), La Bledardise (france), The Sure Store (melbourne), Foot Collector (japan), Pannotia (united kingdom), Millionneiress (new york), Mojo Snowboarding (germany), Benevict (indonesia), Machete (canary islands), Ant (amsterdam), Africa Is The Future (france), MrDheo (portugal), Enstrumental (chicago), Fuck Art And Kiss (france), Empty (spain), The Lux Brands (united states), Manna (manchester), BodhiCouture (indonesia), Stook (spain),  ...

story:
KING PIN

It's the Key holder that lives on your belt.  It takes all the weight off the bottom of your pocket and transfers it to your belt.  It also helps to prevent key bulge in your pocket so all your keys lay perfectly flat in your pocket. The quick release function means you have instant access to your keys.  

The attachment pin disappears so when you're not using the system your keychain stays clean and simple. Since it is connected to your belt it can never fall off like other clip style systems. The quick release mechanism holds tight onto your keys. Both tabs have to be pulled back to release the keys. 

BACKER TIP

We got a great tip from a backer.  Always loosing your access badge at work? King Pin can help you keep it secure. Those cheap plastic ones IT gives you always break.

Extra pins are available for extra sets of keys. 

At Tallac House we believe products should do one thing and do it really well. We spend the time to make sure it functions great and is long lasting.  This is our third Kickstarter project.

Learn more about us at TALLAC HOUSE

Get your King Pin today.  

Hey got extra sets of keys can I get addtional Pins?  Yes, after you add your perk there is an "Add On" perk so you can get extra pins.

 

TUCKED IN

SPECFICATIONS

  • Size:  5 3/4" Long x 1 7/8" Wide or 146mm x 47.5mm
  • Weight: 1.5 oz or 43 grams
  • Nylon Webbing: 3" Long x 1.5" Wide or 76mm x 38mm
  • Aluminum body:  Gun Metal Color
  • CNC Stainless Steel Pin
  • Black Oxide Brass Grommets 

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

A small stainless pin is attached to the key ring. The main body with spring loaded arms engages with the pin and prevents it from coming out. You pull forward on the two side tabs to release the pin. Both tabs have to be pulled for the pin to be released so your keys are super safe with King Pin.

HOW DOES THE STRAP HOLD UP TO WEAR?

We tested the strap by using it everyday for one year. Prototype below:  

HOW STRONG IS IT?

The King Pin is overbuilt and had over a year of in-field testing.  Also the main body of the King Pin has been used for years in backpack applications. The stainless pin only gets better looking with age.  Can handle 30 pounds of water no problem.  We do not recommend that you walk around with a 3 gallon jug hanging from your belt.

Risks and challenges

We have completed all testing. There is a costed BOM and all manufacturing has been secured. A detailed time line has been created. Since the pin is CNC machined the tooling risk has been elminated. 

We have done the following to reduce the risks on the project: 
1: The quick release part has been in production for sometime. 
2: The pin is from CNC lathe Factory USA based. We can drive to them. 
3: Price's quoted for all parts 
6. First Article inspection before production run. 
7. We will be onsite at the factory when the parts are being made. 
8. CAD drawings of the parts and complete documentation. 
9. Full understanding of the production process. 
10. King Pin has been field tested for over a year.

story:
ANNOUNCEMENT: 

1) We will also continuing our Pre-Order on our MMI Watches Website @ https://www.mmiwatches.com/collections/turret-300m-dive-watch-1

 

2) TURRET 300M Now Available In SWISS SELLITA SW200 (LIMITED TIME) Or SEIKO NH35 Movement.

SUPER EARLY BIRD FOR SEIKO NH35 @ 28% OFF -USD287  (LIMITED SLOTS) RRP USD399.

SUPER EARLY BIRD FOR SELLITA SW200 @ 28% OFF - USD431 (LIMITED SLOTS) RRP USD599 (LIMITED TIME).

 

3) Turret 300M wiil be upgrade to SuperLumiNova C1 Grade X1 / Old Radium Grade X1 as standard specification for FREE-OF-CHARGE.

Full Lume Dial remains BGW9 Standard Grade.

Backers NEED NOT top up or ADD ON for the X1 upgrade.

 

3) UNLOCKED - Turret 300M Stainless Steel Bracelet will be upgrade to Screw Pin as standard specification for FREE-OF-CHARGE.

In August 2019, we, MMI Watches Singapore launched our pioneer project on Kickstarter and was successfully funded. Now, we are proud to announce launch of our second campaign, Turret 300M. 

 

Turret 300M, dive watch design concept is inspired by an “Iron-Clad” naval warship, U.S.S Monitor.

Its warship technology was state of the art during its era, which transformed and revolutionized naval warfare till today.

U.S.S Monitor new design iron-hulled ship structure was totally different from the early “Iron-Clad ship at that time.

It neither had a masts nor Port/Starboard (Left/Right) line of cannons.

A 360-degree rotatable large cylindrical turret with 2 internal cannons was mounted in the middle of the ship. While other warships needed to maneuver to its target in line with its onboard port/starboard cannons to fire. U.S.S Monitor could instantly rotate its turret and fire instantly at its enemy.

Beside the turret, U.S.S Monitor had other innovative inventions onboard its ship, including a new compact steam engine and a below deck head (toilet) that could flushed below the water line. These naval warfare technology and inventions were the most advance during its era.

 

Similar to The U.S.S Monitor, we, MMI Watches, try our best to inject innovative design elements into our watches. When most watchmakers play it safe when it comes to watch design, we want every part of the watch’s design to be unique and stand out from the rest.

For Turret 300M, we injected 3 innovative design elements into the watch. Special Date Display, Ion Plated (IP) Stainless Steel Bezel and Turret Style Watch Case:-

 

SPECIAL DATE DISPLAY:

 

For those who got bored of conventional date display on their watch, have a look at our “New Date Display” design. This design made it both functional and more aesthetically pleasing.

 

ION PLATED (IP) STAINLESS STEEL BEZEL INSERT:

Another experimental project by MMI Watches. We tried using a Ion Plated (IP)Stainless Steel Bezel Insert on Turret rather than a traditional Anodized Aluminium Bezel Insert. Once again we were astonished by the end result. The effects came out far better than we anticipated.

The Blue Stainless Steel Bezel Insert changes its colour from LIGHT BLUE - BLUE - DARK BLUE - BLACK depending on the environment lightings. The reason for using Stainless steel, as it is much stronger than Aluminium and less brittle than Sapphire and Ceramic. 

Ion Plating (IP) is physical vapour deposition process, where surface required to be plated is bombarded forming a Titanium Nitride layer.

Ion plated surfaces are five to eight times more durable and resistance to corrosion and wear. When Ion Plating is combined with Stainless Steel, the result is a heavy-duty item that withstand the rigors of daily use.

 

TURRET STYLE WATCH CASE:

Most traditional dive watches have its rotating bezel mounted flat onto the watch case. For Turret 300M, we mount the rotating bezel slightly beneath into the watch case, like the U.S.S Monitor Turret.

With this design, the rotating bezel is protected by the 4 angular sides of the watch case and at the same time the rotating bezel is prevented from accidentally move or rotate. This is especially important when you use the bezel as timing instrument for your dive.

THE DIAL : OLD MEETS NEW

The Turret 300M dial is given an ultra fine horizontal brushed finish, which is identical to previous debut model, Dumbo 500M. With this textured finish, the dial is able to present two tones, dark and brillant effects, depending on the enviromental lighthings.

We have also injected a new innovative “Date Display” to the dial, giving it a functional and more aesthetically pleasing look.

 

TURRET MOVEMENT

 

Why SW200 and NH35 movements?

The answer is obvious - the best of both worlds (28.8kph/4Hz & 21.6kph/3Hz).

They are the most reliable, versatile and robust movements on the market. Both companies have long history in watch movements manufacturing, which they have perfected over the years.

 

1) SELLITA SW200

This movement needs no introduction as SW200 is well known to every watch lover. The SW200 is precise, reliable and robust. Its quality and reliability are comparable to ETA 2824, some may even say SW200 is better.

 

2) SEIKO NH35

Another popular movement used in many dive watches. NH35 is well known for its reliability. It can outlast Swiss movement with minimum or no servicing.

 

Swiss Super-LumiNova®

We understand the importance of the dials and markers on the watch face and bezel. They have to be legible under water and in low light conditions.

Full night legibility of our watches is achieved by using the best phosphorescent pigment on the market, Swiss Super-LumiNova®. Our watches are coated with Swiss Super-LumiNova® C1 Grade X1 / Old Radium Grade X1 / BGW9 STD.

There 4 collection for all backers to choose from.

Blood Red & Ocean Green will be produce specially for Kickstarter / Indiegogo Backers and MMI Watches Website Customer Pre-Order Only.

 316L STAINLESS STEEL PACKAGE:

 

 Package Include:

1 x Turret 300M (With Steel Bracelet)

1 x  PU Leather Watch Roll

1 x Tropic Rubber Strap

1 x Warranty Card (1 Year)

 

DLC PACKAGE:

 

 Package Include:

1 x Turret 300M (With Brown Genuine Leather Strap)

1 x  PU Leather Watch Roll

1 x Tropic Rubber Strap

1 x Warranty Card (1 Year) 

All prices stated on the Rewards Section is inclusive of shipping charges. However every backer is responsible for their respective country custom / import duty tax, VAT or GST.

I am Victor Wee, the founder of MMI Watches.

MMI Watches is an independent watch company based in Singapore. MMI stands for Modernization, Modification and Innovation, which are our company’s design philosophy and belief in watch making.

“Modernization”

Transforming traditional watch making with a modern touch.

“Modification”

Redefine watch making and design.

“Innovation”

Constant injection of new ideas and methods to improve watch design.

“Traditional Watch, Non-Traditional Design”

MMI Website: http://www.mmiwatches.com

MMI Watches Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mmiwatchessingapore

MMI Watches Group Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1179308125604038/

MMI Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mmiwatches/

MMI Twitter: https://twitter.com/mmiwatches

story:
I started The Level Collective over 3 years ago, inspired by my love for travel and the outdoors and my frustration with the generic, unethical fast fashion industry. I collaborate with artists and makers from across the world to create ethical outdoor supplies.

A backpack is one of the most distinctive and personal pieces of apparel that you can own. You use it everyday, it travels everywhere with you, your trusty companion.

As someone who is creative and outdoorsy, it's always frustrated me that I couldn't find a day pack that performed well but looked great too.

Most backpacks seem to be either; technical bags that perform well, but are plasticky, look ugly and are cluttered with endless toggles and buckles, or they are fashion bags that have decent style but lack substance for the outdoors.

I wanted to create something made from natural fabrics that perform well against the elements, but also looks great in the wild or in the city.

Something minimalist, yet well equipped.

I wanted to create something that’s made ethically and that is hand crafted in the UK.

Something Beautifully Adventurous.

Now I need your help to bring my idea to life and make the first small run of the Winnats Roll Top backpack.

Back this pack!

Founder & designer

Minimalist design with highly waterproof Halley Stevensons waxed cotton outer shell from Scotland.

Adjustable cushioned straps, extra lumbar support, Stainless steel buckles and British leather buckle loops.

 Dual water bottle side pouches.

Stash pocket with chunky zip, storm cover and waxed cotton inserts. Finished with red US-made Paracord zip pull.

British vegetable tan leather grab handle and buckle loop – hand cut in Derbyshire, UK.

Lined with highly waterproof 600D polyester canvas, and detailed with the famous Halley Stevensons waxed cotton outer shell certification woven label.

 

Our very own custom designed stainless steel closure buckle; laser cut, shaped and polished in Sheffield, UK.

Inner 13'' laptop sleeve.

British vegetable tan leather logo patch - hand-cut and embossed in Derbyshire, UK.

 

Capacity: 15 litres

Width: 26cm  Height: 45cm  Depth: 13.5cm

Weight: 860gms

 

 

Mustard 

For full product details and more photos, take a look at the Winnats Roll Top Mustard on our website.

Forest

For more photos and full product details and images, take a look at the Winnats Roll Top Forest on our website.

 

Navy

For full product details and more photos, take a look at the Winnats Roll Top Navy on our website.

'Wild One' 

For full product details and more photos, take a look at the Winnats Roll Top 'Wild One' on our website.

Stargazer (all black)

For full product details and more photos, take a look at the Winnats Roll Top Stargazer on our website.

Thanks to everyone who has encouraged me and given helpful feedback as I've gone through the design process!

An extra HUGE thanks to Matt Bell for his epic skills in filming & producing our Kickstarter video :)

story:
Are you a nature lover? So are we. 

 

We know that original jewelry is a must have for every person who wants to look good. When we were making ACORN, we set ourselves 4 points to achieve.

 

1. Make it elegant

2. Make it original

3. Make it from natural materials

4. Make it by hand

 

Here is the result of our work, the ACORN. The ACORN is elegant handmade necklace, which is made from glass and the real acorn. Help us get this amazing nature necklace to production and show other how much you love fashion. Your very own ACORN comes with bronze plated necklace so you can have it still with you.

 

What more to tell?

THE NATURE HAVE NEVER LOOKED BETTER

story:
Hello there, welcome to Grainz!

Here at Grainz we are passionate about two things; looking good, and giving back to the environment.  Thats why we offer stylish shades that come with a tree seed for you to plant.  We do this to help give back above and beyond what we took to make our sunglasses.  This gives YOU the chance to see the difference you are making and help sustain our renewable resources.   Giving you the seed instead of planting a tree for you gives you the chance to feel connected to the movement we are trying to start.

This campaign is not only important to get this brand started, but its also important to help our environment.  We want to start a movement of forward thinking, that is why we will also donate a portion of our profits to help advance the use of renewable resources.  You can help us do all of this by backing us with these great early prices.

Each pair of sunglasses is named after the tree seed it comes with

The Hawthorn

The Alder

The Aspen

The Juniper

 

 

Since we are a young company there are sure to be some small bumps along the way, but we are already working towards flattening them out by preparing.  The major obstacles we see are with shipping, because as we move closer to the holidays shipping can throw us some unforeseen challenges.  We are ready to tackle these challenges and get you looking good in your new Grainz sunglasses as soon as possible.

story:
Welcome to the Ji Ji Kiki Indiegogo campaign!

A 'lil bit about Emma & Ji Ji Kiki

Ji Ji Kiki is an independent online store which sells cute and vintage inspired clothing, jewellery and accessories.
 
Ji Ji Kiki started in part whilst at university, when I sold vintage items on a certain auction site to help fund my studies (and keep me in gig tickets and books!).
After I graduated I set up jijikiki.com and I began selling my own line of handmade, vintage inspired jewellery alongside vintage pieces and have since then expanded into selling jewellery handmade by other indie designers, clothing, bags and accessories and a small homewares range..

I am a one person business, which is fantastic as it means I can provide a personal service to each and every customer, but does mean that in order to take Ji Ji Kiki to the next level I need to look to funding and this is where you come in!

What Ji Ji Kiki Needs & What You Get

I want to make Ji Ji Kiki the best place to go to get cute and vintage inspired clothing. The funding I receive will go towards two different parts of the business; increased ranges of products and website functionality.

I adore vintage inspired fashion and currently stock a small range of dresses. Due to customer demand I would love to expand my range of clothing to sell other products (tops and skirts) as well as being able to stock a range of clothing beyond the current sizes we offer.

One part of the funding will be used to purchase new items and increase the product ranges currently available, to be able to offer all my customers dresses, tops and skirts.

 

The second part of the funding will go towards website development, to be able to offer users a better browsing and purchasing experience with, amongst other features, a mobile website, wishlist feature and easier navigation.

Perks!

I really do appreciate any help you are able to give to help Ji Ji Kiki and there are different items (or 'perks') on offer as my way of saying 'thank you'! Everyone who donates will get a shout out on the blog (unless you would like to remain annonymous!).

All of the perks available are listed on the right and there are some pictures below showing the Limited Edition necklace locket, Cosmic Glitter Necklace, tote bag and examples for the Necklace of the Month Club.

Limited edition necklace. Silver plated locket, set with a stunning dark purple glitter glass cabochon, which shows flecks of pink and gold as it catches the light. Finished with a silver star charm and is on a long, 24" silver plated chain.
 
 
Cotton tote bag, screen printed with the Ji Ji Kiki deer.
Currently only available via this Indiegogo campaign!
 
Cosmic Glitter Necklace. Triple linked glass pendants, set with glass cabochons with colourful glitter against a black background.

 

Examples of some of the necklaces that may be included in the Necklace of the Month Club. Exclusively available through this campaign.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you cannot contribute at this time.

If you are not able to donate financially, but would still like to contibute, any way you can help share this campaign would be greatly appreciated.

  • Share this page. Make some noise via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Pinterest...
  • Get the word out about Ji Ji Kiki, use the share tools above (just under the main image) to show your friends our website and join us on Facebook. If they see what we do, they might become inspired to help out.

story:
We've created the most versatile, functional and comfortable activewear products, perfect to wear for your busy lifestyle -- be it high intensity fitness like running and Crossfit, or leisure activities like travel and your everyday routine. 

The key functional feature is the strategic placement and use of the pockets — a pocket built into the waistband designed to securely hold your cell phone, a hidden valuables pocket for cash, card, and keys, plus two standard pockets for all your other needs.

We make all our products using high quality materials with four-way stretch, moisture wicking, quick dry and an anti-bacterial finish to keep your clothes smelling fresh for those post workout activities. All our garments are produced by the same supplier that manufactures for Lululemon Athletica, adidas, Under Armour, Puma, and other big name brands from around the world. So with all this we are guaranteeing you top quality apparel for an affordable price. 

The Reason we started Fact_ Activewear was because we did not like wearing running armbands because they cut off circulation, cause chaffing, and are very uncomfortable. We spent months researching and wear testing multiple brands but never found anything we liked. After learning there's a demand for activewear with pocket functionality we created Functional Apparel Catered To ____running, crossfit, yoga, beach, travel, life, you____. 

 

FOR MENS APPAREL CHECK OUT WWW.FACTACTIVEWEAR.COM

 

The Malibu shorts are fully equipped with all the features needed for your everyday activities. The strategically placed smartphone pocket in the lower back waistband and hidden valuables pocket designed to keep your cash, card, and keys safe. The woven four-way stretch fabric is made from ultra lightweight polyester/spandex for a perfect balance of performance and comfort, while also being extremely durable and anti-pilling. 

 

 

 

 

After nearly a decade in activewear product development, working with some of the largest activewear companies in the world, Fact_ founder and sports enthusiast Scott Mayers has spent months designing and developing the most functional multi-activity products.

Through Scott’s experience, he has created strong relationships with top quality manufacturers that produce for the biggest activewear brands in the industry. With this, we've combined our industry experience and the best materials and construction techniques in the world to bring you Fact_, your new favorite activewear brand. 

In the international market you will see similar products selling for 30-50% more expensive due to high cost of overhead and athlete endorsements. Fact_ is providing you the opportunity to purchase high quality products at competitive price.

Follow us for more information. 

 

FOR MENS APPAREL WITH ALL THE SAME FEATURES AND MORE, CHECK OUT

WWW.FACTACTIVEWEAR.COM 

 

PLACE YOUR ORDER NOW AND RECEIVE THE FIRST WEEK OF SEPTEMBER.

story:
How do you carry your iPhone 6+/ 7+ ?

How do you carry Galaxy S8 + ?

Does your iPhone 7+ fit in your front pocket?

How do you get rid of the pocket bulge?

How do you carry your EDCs?

The pants bulge of the smartphone and wallet , agreed all the stylists and fashion advisors, is "unsightly", "terrible", "silly", "un-stylish", something to get rid of from the pants style. 

How to correct, how to remove the bulge? Their prescription is : "don't put the smartphone or the wallet in the front pockets, especially  the wallets should be put in the back pocket".  We do not agree with the advise because various medical studies proved anything put in the back pockets hurts your pelvis bone and eventually your spine, your back.

Other advice is to carry the separate bag. Yes, some men do carry a bag or murse what they call.  I tried and several times forgot to take it back when leaving. That means it is not good solution for all.

The Bulge-Free Pocket Pants, RenoPocket Chino is the most satisfactory answer for the questions and problems of the pocket bulge so far.

How?

 

 Bulge-Free

RenoPocket Chino carrys your big/+ smartphone comfortable and light, removing the 1st bulge (that of the smartphone).

BEFORE

 

AFTER

 

The smartphone sits at the zippered,upper inside compartment of the front pocket horizontally, lifted from the bottom of the pocket hanging vertically.

As the phone stays close to the abdomen,  the look of forward bulging , the feeling of the thigh sticking and feeling of pull down weight is removed or lessened.

The smartphone in the above photos and illustrations is the 6.3”  Galaxy Mega (167.6 x 88 x8.0 cm/205gr), what-they-call Super Phablet, with size 34 chino.  5.5” iPhone7+(158.2x77.9x7.3cm/188gr) or 6.2” Galaxy s8+ (159.5x73.4x8.1cm/173gr) will be snug in this inner pocket.

Even with smaller smartphone, you will feel the difference of  looks and the weight.    

 

Wallet Bulge-Free

RenoPocket Chino carrys your old, hearty wallet safe and  light, removing the 2nd bulge (that of the wallet).

BEFORE

 

AFTER

 

 

 

EDC Organizer

RenoPocket chino organizes the EDC (Every Day Carry) essentials in the partitioned compartments.

BEFORE

AFTER

 

  1: smartphone        2: key     3: handkerchief   4: wallet                  5: passport & name-card-holder     6: earphone

RenoPocket Chino has 8 pockets, 6 in the front and 2 in the back. That is, each front pocket has 2 more pockets inside.  We don’t recommend to use back pockets, as doctors advise that putting anything in the back pockets harms your health.

RenoPocket Chino arranges the EDC essentials in the compartmented 6 front pockets preventing entanglements, scratch, poking as well as mixing and stacking bulge.

Illustrations are showing general concept and details will be adjusted in the design and manufacturing process.

 

Other Features

Fabric: High Quality  100% Cotton  20's High Density Twill

 Main Fly Zipper: YKK

Straight Fit:

Straight fit  allows some room to absorb the bulge of the smartphone and other EDC essentials.

 

RenoPocket Shorts

You want short, light pants but, with the EDCs in the pocket, you still feels overloaded, overweighted. Then, RenoPocket shorts is the answer.

 

Colors:  

                        black                                        khaki                                         dark blue    

 

The color shades may change according to the different monitor and your brightness control. Please bear in mind the color of your imagination and the color of the delivered chino can be little different.

 

SIZE:

Front rise sits little higher to lift the upper inside pocket.

Please remember the size of the pants and the size of the waist is not same.  As you realize the sizing is different from brand to brand. We found some brands use the size of the waist as the size of the pants, but many other brands used different sizing, usually label size is little smaller than real measurements.

We follow the practice of the latter. Before deciding your size, we recommend you to measure your real size and compare with your present pants size.

 

RenoPocket Shorts:

Same size as chino but inseam: 11 in (28cm)

 

Problems:

When you see the pants in the show window, they do not show how you will look if you put on that pants. The pants look just smart and handsome when they do not carry any EDCs in their pockets.

But EDCs are not the matter of style or choice, they are the matter of survival, indispensable.

The moment I put those EDCs in the pocket, the pants look different, I feel different.

In the meantime, the smartphone gets bigger and bigger while the pants pockets remain same and people have been asking each other how/where you are carrying your big smartphone. Some kind of outpockets or hidden pockets are installed, but still the smartphone bulges, sticks and rubs to the thigh, pulls down like a weight.

Wallet (even not very fat bifolder) bulge has been another headache of the pants style for long time. You can find pages of discussions on how you should tackle this problem. These days, many people seem to find the solution with the slim, minimalist wallet and there are hundreds of brands and products in the market.

If the pants are the least, last and non-separable 2nd skin of the men, the pants pockets are also the least, last and non-separable transport tool of the men.  That is the reason, we believe, the pants pockets should carry smartphone, wallet and EDC essentials as comfortable, convenient, light as possible.

RenoPocket Chino is the answer and the solution to these problems. By spreading the thick EDC essentials in a wider space and dividing in the partitions, bulging is removed or lessened, mixing, poking, scratching and entanglements are prevented. You can use the old, hearty wallet with least bulge.

There are maybe  other ways, too.

But if you want your hands and shoulders free, if you don’t want to carry a separate bag, if you don’t want to push the protruding bulge forward, there are not many choices.

 

Refunds

We reserve the right to issue or deny any requested refunds. If we issue a refund, we will deduct 10% if the amount had already been taken from your pledge as the fees for the payment processor and Indiegogo.

 

International Backers

We ship internationally to select countries.

All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. In some countries, the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can not ship another package  to you or issue a refund. Please check the import procedure and expenses of your customs and postal service  carefully before you pledge.

Risks and challenges

Our factory is well experienced in manufacturing the world brand pants. We don’t see any problems if our order meets their minimum requirements. For any unexpected issues, we promise to be transparent and we will let you know on any possible delays.

story:
Thank you for taking the time to check out our indiegogo page. We truly appreciate all of the support!


The Heritage wood watch

A PASSION FOR TIME AND A MIND SET TO CREATE SOMETHING NEW, WE CAME UP WITH OUR ALL NATURAL WOODEN WATCH WICH IS INSPIRED FROM OUR HERITAGE. 

What We Need & What You Get

To put our watch through to the manufactures we need your help:

  • We need a minimum support and funding om 5000 dollars to fund this project.
  • You will be the first to get your hands on our Heritage watch well below retail price!
  • We have our prototypes ready and now we need your support to help us fund the first production of the watch.


The Design Process

When we started designing our watch, we had 3 goals in mind:

  • Affordability - keep the price affordable for everyone
  • Quality - best quality in every aspect of the watch
  • Heritage - inspired from pure Heritage

After talking to various suppliers and manufacturers, we found that we would still be able to achieve the affordability goal and still be able to use the best raw material and movements: hand crafted bamboo case, oil stained leather band, Swiss movement. We were really excited that we wouldn’t have to compromise on quality, and so, we hit the sketch pad right away!



To achieve versatility with our design, we decided that it was best to keep the case size reasonable. We found that a 45mm case was the perfect case diameter, not too large and bulky yet not too small so you can't see the time. It is also a perfect size for both women and men!

 

Another critical element of versatility was the strap. We got the inspiration from the northern parts of Sweden. A crafted oil stained leather band that looks great out of the box, but even better as the band ages and years pass by. The feel of the band is smooth and thin, it forms to your wrist the more you were it. 


We decided to go with a stainless steal buckle for best quality and durability. Our brand name have been lasered on to the buckle and gives the watch a unique and nice look from underneath. On the back of the case we decided to share with you our story and passion of this project.      



The Final Design

Specifications

  • Case diameter: 45 mm
  • Case thickness: 9.8 mm
  • 22-25 mm width (strap)
  • Hardend mineral glass (scratch resistant)
  • Stainless steel buckle
  • Swiss movement (Ronda 763) 
  • Case: Bamboo
  • Band: Oil stained leather



We Need Your Support!

We are ready for production, we have the final prototype, the technical drawings, we have the suppliers ready to start production. The only thing missing is the initial order.  By becoming a backer for our project, you help us pay for the first production run, and in exchange you will receive an awesome watch at a highly discounted price!

By pledging today, you are pre-ordering a wooden Heritage watch from the first production run and making sure you receive it as early as possible. You are also locking in the special deal. The first 50 backers will receive a watch for $59 ($40 off the retail price of $99). The other backers will get a watch for $69 ($30 off retail price) or you can receive two of our watches for the price of one retail watch $99 ($99 off retail price) and the last and best deal you can get is 4 of our watches for $149(retail value of $396). All Swedish backers get FREE shipping and international shipping will be an extra $12.

We hope that you love our watches as much as we do and pledge your support in order to receive one of the very first production models from Heritage watches!

Thank you so much for being a part of this project!

All Swedish backers get FREE shipping and international shipping will be an extra $12.We hope that you love our watches as much as we do and pledge your support in order to receive one of the very first production models from Heritage watches!Thank you so much for being a part of this project!

story:
Who am I and what am I trying to achieve?

  • My name is Sami Hilal, I'm 27
  • I was a medic for the US Navy
  • I'm now studying at the University of Washington
  • I am creating transition contact lenses by the use of 3D printers

What will happen to the funds?

  • The funds I acquire well be sent to a 3D printer design center in order to create transition contact lenses.
  • A website will be created so that people can customize what contact lenses styles they want.
  • The lenses will be created by 3D printers
  • These lenses will not correct vision.

The Impact

Our eyes are very sensitive and important to us, yet people fail to fully protect them from sunlight. 

Radiation

Ultraviolet light, specifically UV-B, has been shown to cause cataracts and there is evidence that sunglasses worn at an early age can slow its development in later life. Most UV light from the sun is filtered out by the atmosphere. It is hypothesised that depletion of the ozone layer and a consequent increase in levels of UV light on the ground may increase future rates of cataracts.

Sun glasses protect our eyes from UV-B, however they are too bulky and are a hassle to carry around, they are expensive and can get damaged/stolen easily. My goal is to create a cheap alternative that can be printed at your local Staples and delivered to your home,  hopefully, even printed at your own home in the near future.

story:
Before you begin to learn more about us and our swimsuits, we wanted to acknowledge the purpose of this IndieGoGo campaign. We need your help to make our dream a reality. Starting your own swimwear line isn’t cheap, and unfortunately, we cannot fund this project on our own. At minimum, we want to fulfill your orders, operate online, and at local markets.

We were started by a worshipper of the sun and sea who was always looking for that perfect suit. The idea for our suits spawned from never finding “the one” when it comes to swimwear. When looking for a suit, there are so many options to choose from with varying prices and fabric quality. There was no suit that was well-made for a good price. We wanted to create swimwear that would feel comfortable and high quality for women to strut around. We wanted to create swimwear that is for all women. 

We are a sustainable swimwear company that is all about empowering women in swimwear and in life. Our suits are made for mermaids because we believe that every woman has an inner mermaid. Typically we see mermaids as sassy, confident, sexy, and just an overall badass. Women of all ages and body types should feel as though they are a mermaid when putting on a swimsuit.

All of our suits are made from a sustainable material called ECONYL, which is regenerated nylon. This fabric is created from fishing nets and industrial plastic that is found in the ocean. Although it is recycled from different materials, the fabric has a softness and quality to it, unlike any other fabric we have felt. We truly think that this fabric is the future of the swimwear industry.

Our designs are all about simplicity with a bit of umf. We want you to wear the suit, not the suit to wear you.

We are all about being a bit cheeky when it comes to our bottoms. With that being said, both bottoms have a cheeky cut for you to show off your cheeks. We have two different cuts of bottoms — our high waisted and basic bottoms. 

Our High Waisted bottoms have a waistband on the top with a high hip cut. This gives the bottom a little sexiness to it. 

Our basic bottom is a great staple to mix and match for any bikini. The cut of this suit is a regular rise cheeky cut with a thin waistband.

Just like our bottoms, our tops are two designs so that you have the opportunity to mix and match to create the look you want. 

Our All Tied Up top is a square neck cut with ties on the top to adjust the strap length. This top offers an ample amount of coverage for your chest, without having to sacrifice style. There are no clasps or ties on the back so that you can comfortably relax in it. 

Our Knotty top is a classic triangle top with a small knot in the middle. This top has a little less coverage than our All Tied Up top, but still provide you with a comfortable amount of coverage. This style has adjustable straps with no clasps or ties on the back.

Swimsuits: You’ll be one of the first people to receive a bikini from us. You’ll have the option to get our High Waisted bottoms with our All Tied Up top in noir (black) or our Cheeky bottoms with our Knotty top in blanche (white). 

Stickers: Our stickers will surely make the perfect addition to your water bottle or laptop sticker collection. When you purchase one here, you’ll get both of our mermaid tail and logo stickers. 

Tote Bags: While you’re making your way to the beach or pool, you’ll need something to hold all of your belongings in. Our 100% cotton totes will make a great addition to your daily adventures. 

Hats: Whether you’re running around town or spending some time by the pool, our hats will provide you with the protection you need while you’re out in the sun.

Supporting us in other ways also helps a great deal. Some ways that can truly help us are:

  • Liking and following us is a great way to stay connected and get any updates from us.  
  • Liking and sharing our posts make a huge impact for any small business. We encourage any interaction with any post we make! Sharing this page to your friends and family means a lot of us, as well. 
  • Telling your friends and family over the phone, text, or in person is greatly appreciated.

story:
INTERNATIONAL VERSION 

                                                           

                                                                    

Art and fashion to wear…this is Rico Rules!                  

Every single graphic of our sweatshirts and t-shirts reflects the passion for movies, music and art, in order to let us to express who we are and everything we like.                                                  

Many experts take care of the manufacturing of our products, which is completely made in Italy. They have worked hard to give you the perfection.

 

The idea of Rico Rules was born during the first months of  2013 and at beginning it was just for fun. It came from two guys, Federico (Founder) and Brunella (Art Director)  who want to share their passion with the world. They merged their creativity and started this project. The concept was to express what they like through a t-shirt.  Federico’s passion for fashion, cinema, music, street art and all that sports like surfing and skating has been mixed with Brunella’s passion for photography and drawing. 

In developing the idea, they realized that Rico Rules could have been a way for a lot of people to express themselves. The project has been developed also thanks to the contribution of a lot of friends: they helped a lot in quality of artists, photographers and models. So the result is that a community made of people with same passion is born. After more than a year of hard work we have developed a high quality product completely made in Italy, with some particularities such as the microfiber label.

All t-shirts and sweatshirts have a special functional label in microfiber you can use to clean your sunglasses. That's cool! You can use it when you are on the beach or whenever you want. But if you want, it also can be removed it from the shirt.  

Both men and women’s t-shirt have been studied in detail and they have cuffed sleeves and a slim fit to let you be always fashionable.


Our 2014 collection will have : men and women’s t-shirt and unisex sweatshirts. All the products are made 100% by high quality cotton. The entire  manufacturing process, from fabrics choice,  cutting, to the final printing, is completely made in Italy. Serigraphy has been used as printing tecnique; it provides brilliant and durable colours. 

Have a look to all the photos in the Indiegogo gallery related to our project.

Here the picture of the graphics you can choose. Click here to see the high resolution picture.

Note: the name at the bottom of each picture is just to identify artwork and it won’t appear on the final printing.


Here the picture of the graphics you can choose. Click here to see the high resolution picture.

Note: the name at the bottom of each picture is just to identify artwork and it won’t appear on the final printing.







After you chose you perk we will send you an e-mail. You have to answer to the email we will send in order to indicate models and size you prefer.



Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our T-shirts and sweatshirts, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear Rico Rules:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. You can select a perk that you prefer.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute extra over and above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above. 

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. We will use these funds to process the first production run, bringing the project to life.

4) We aim to deliver your first t-shirt or sweatshirt at the beginning of October, 2014.



You can add the shipping cost to the perk's contribution, or by making a different free contribution.

For example, if you live in Canada and you selected perk "A Rico Rules             T-shirt", the contribution field will display € 20. To add € 7 for postage, you'll have to manually type in € 27.
If you are going to choose more perks, you can add the TOTAL postage to one of the contributions.


To know the amount of the postage to add for your area, please refer to the maps below.











REMEMBER THAT YOU HAVE TO ADD MANUALLY THE SHIPPING COSTS!

You can choose the amount for the donation and write it in the donation. 

We expect to fulfill all received pre-orders by October 2014.





When will my product be ready?

We are targeting begin of October for delivery for all finished goods. We will post updates as our campaign progresses but are confident that we will meet our target delivery time.

When do I get to pick my size? 

We will send you a mail once the campaign has been completed where you can pick your desired size and model.

Is there a deadline for answering the mail?

7 days after sending out the mail, we will review the mails results and go into production for those who have already submitted their responses. If you have not submitted by this time, you will be grouped into the next production batch and may have to wait longer for your products. 

Will i need to pay customs duties or taxes for my shoes?

Inside the UE, no. For international orders, you may face local import duties. Rico Rules is not responsible for knowing these duties. The duties/taxes will be paid at the expense of the recipient via the courier or other service that is requested.

I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?

Yes you can. Please email to support@ricorules.com with subject title: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.

I forgot to add the shipping costs. What to do?

You can add the postage for all of your perks with a single free contribution. You can also add the total postage to another perk's contribution, modifying the selected perk's amount. In any case, be sure to use the same account you used for the first contribution(s)



Rico Rules is the result of a year of hard work, passion, sacrifices, enthusiasm and motivation. We are proud of what we have created and we hope you will support us in developing our project. The aim is to create a real community of people with same interests and passions. 

We are going to refine the final details, take care of the manifacturing , manage the shipments ad give you more products to chose in the next months.

We worked so hard to give you a high quality product. Now it’s up to you! Please, support us, talk about us with your friends, be part of our community.



We are not afraid of being followed, in fact we love it. We love answering all your questions, comments, positive or negative. Please do not hesitate to follow us or contact us at 

 ciao@ricorules.com                    to join us

 info@ricorules.com                    for general info

 support@ricorules.com            for support



   

                  

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.


Federico and Brunella






VERSIONE ITALIANA

                                                      

                                                   

Arte e moda da indossare, questo è Rico Rules!                   

Ogni singola grafica delle felpe e delle t-shirt traduce su un capo d’abbigliamento la passione per il cinema, per la musica e per l'arte in generale, con lo scopo dichiarato di esprimere ciò che siamo e tutto quel che più ci piace.                                                  

La produzione, rigorosamente made in Italy, è affidata ad esperti del settore ed è curata sempre nei minimi dettagli, affinché la qualità del prodotto sia impeccabile.


L’idea di Rico Rules nasce quasi per gioco durante i primi mesi del 2013 e nasce dal desiderio di due giovani ragazzi, Federico (Founder) e Brunella (Art Director) di dare voce alle loro passioni. Insieme, i due, uniscono la loro creatività e iniziano a dare vita a Rico Rules. L’idea di base era appunto quella di esprimere attraverso una semplice t-shirt i loro interessi e il loro stile. I due mescolano la passione di Federico per la moda, il cinema, la musica, la street art e quegli sport dallo stile unico come il surf e lo skateboard a quelle per la fotografia, l’arte e il disegno di Brunella. 


Mentre lavorano si rendono conto che le loro passioni e il loro stile erano condivisi da un gran numero di amici che in qualità di artisti, fotografi, modelli vengono invitati a dare il loro contributo al progetto. Si va formando così una vera e propria community di persone che condividono gli stessi interessi e lo stesso stile. Dopo più di un anno di duro lavoro il risultato finale è un prodotto interamente italiano di alta qualità, con alcuni particolari veramente innovativi quali l’etichetta in microfibra.  



Tutte le T-shirt e felpe hanno una speciale etichetta in microfibra che puoi usare per pulire, in tutta sicurezza, i tuoi occhiali da sole.  Non è fantastico? Puoi usarla quando sei al mare o in qualsiasi altro momento. Se però dovesse infastidirti puoi sempre rimuoverla facilmente e portarla sempre con te separatamente. 

sia la t-shirt maschile che femminile sono curate nei minimi particolari, inoltre presentano delle maniche risvoltate e una vestibilità slimfit per essere sempre alla moda.



La nostra collezione 2014 presenta due modelli di t-shirt: femminile e maschile. Le felpe invece saranno unisex. Entrambi i prodotti sono in cotone 100% di alta qualità. L'intero processo, dalla scelta dei tessuti, al taglio, alla stampa finale è interamente MADE IN ITALY . La tecnica di stampa adottata è la serigrafia che assicura colori vivaci, duraturi nel tempo e lisci al tatto. 

Guarda tante altre foto nella gallery indiegogo di questo progetto.


Di seguito sono raffigurate le grafiche maschili tra cui poter scegliere. Per vedere le foto in una risoluzione maggiore clicca qui. 

Attenzione: il nome in nero alla base di ogni grafica è solo a scopo identificativo e non è parte integrante di essa.

Di seguito sono raffigurate le grafiche femminili tra cui poter scegliere. Per vedere le foto in una risoluzione maggiore clicca qui.

Attenzione: il nome in nero alla base di ogni grafica è solo a scopo identificativo e non è parte integrante di essa.



Per coprire dei costi iniziali e un minimo di pezzi per la produzione delle nostre t-shirt e felpe, abbiamo bisogno del tuo supporto per far si che il progetto abbia inizio. Ecco come puoi fare per aiutarci ed essere il primo ad indossare Rico Rules:

1)  Seleziona un perk dal lato destro dello schermo per iniziare il pre-ordine. Seleziona quello che più ti piace

2)  Continua alla pagina successiva ed inserisci tutte le informazioni relative alle spedizioni e ai dettagli dipagamento. Nota che qualora volessi dare un contributo maggiore di quello stabilito dal perk puoi farlo tranquillamente, come mostrato nella figura di seguito sotto.

3)  Completa il pagamento via Paypal  o usando la tua carta di credito/debito. Useremo queste donazioni per dare inizio alla prima produzione.

4)  L’obiettivo sarebbe quello di inviare i primi prodotti agli inizi di Ottobre 2014



SPESE DI SPEDIZIONE

Cliccando sulla donazione scelta potrete modificare l'importo del contributo. Ricordate in questa occasione di aggiungere manualmente i costi di spedizione!

Ad esempio, scegliendo il perk "A Rico Rules T-shirt", il campo donazione riporterà €20. Aggiungendo i 7 euro per la spedizione in Italia di una t-shirt, bisognerà scrivere manualmente: € 27.

I costi di spedizione sono specificati nelle tabelle che troverete poco più giù.


Nella stessa pagina vi saranno chiesti i dati per la spedizione. Inseriteli e cliccate su "Continue".


Questa pagina vi informa che la nostra è una "Fixed Funding Campaign", ovvero se non dovessimo raggiungere l’obiettivo di 30'000 € la vostra donazione vi sarà interamente restituita! Proseguite cliccando su "GO TO PAYPAL".



Adesso potete selezionare "Italy" come paese, ed "Italiano" come lingua, per compilare agevolmente tutti i campi obbligatori.


Ricordate, se non siete interessati a creare un account PayPal, di deselezionare la casella "Salva questi dati su un conto Paypal". Proseguite cliccando su "Rivedi e continua"


                                 

                                            

Dando l'ultima conferma, avrete contribuito alla realizzazione di Rico Rules!




Prevediamo di spedire tutti i preordini entro l'inizio di Ottobre 2014.






Prevediamo di spedire tutti i preordini entro l'inizio di Ottobre 2014.




Quando saranno pronti i prodotti?

La data prefissata per l’inizio delle spedizioni è Ottobre. Ti terremo aggiornati sui progressi della nostra campagna ma siamo sicuri di poter rispettare i tempi previsti.

Dove posso selezionare la taglia e il colore?

Ti invieremo un’e-mail al completamento della campagna. Potrai scegliere la taglia e il modello che desideri.

C’è una scadenza per rispondere alla mail che mi invierete?

7 giorni dopo l’invio della nostra mail, rivedremo tutte le risposte ed inizieremo la produzione per tutti coloro che hanno già risposto. Se non hai risposto entro i 7 giorni la tua richiesta verrà inoltrata per la seconda produzione e probabilmente dovrai attendere un po’ in più per avere i nostri prodotti.

Dovrò pagare qualche tassa doganale per il mio prodoto?

Non per i paesi facenti parte dell’UE. Per ordini internazionali, potrebbe capitare di dover pagare delle tasse doganali. Rico Rules non è responsabile riguardo questo aspetto. Le tasse saranno a carico dell’acquirente e potranno essere pagate tramite il corriere o altri servizi.

Ho digitato il mio indirizzo in modo errato. Posso cambiarlo?

Certo! Manda un’e-mail a support@ricorules.com con oggetto : ‘Address change’. Grazie

Ho dimenticato di aggiungere le spese di spedizione. Cosa posso fare?

Puoi aggiungere le spese di spedizione per un qualsiasi perk con una “single free contribution” (cliccando su "contribute now"). Puoi anche aggiungere le spese di spedizione totali contribuendo ad un altro perk, modificando la cifra da donare aggiungendo il totale delle spedizioni. In ogni caso, assicurati di usare sempre lo stesso account.


Rico Rules è il risultato di più di un anno di duro lavoro, passione, sacrificio, entusiasmo e motivazione. Noi siamo veramente orgogliosi di ciò che abbiamo creato e speriamo di ricevere tutto il tuo supporto per far crescere la nostra idea e creare una vera e propria community di persone che condividono le stesse passioni e lo stesso stile. 

Abbiamo tantissime idee per il futuro e non vediamo l’ora di poterle realizzarle ma per farlo abbiamo prima bisogno del tuo supporto in questa campagna Indiegogo per far in modo che questo progetto si realizzi. Ma ciò sarà possibile solo e soltanto grazie al tuo contributo a questo progetto. Durante i prossimi mesi lavoreremo ai dettagli finali, organizzeremo la produzione, gestiremo le spedizioni ed amplieremo i modelli da proporti. 

Noi abbiamo fatto tutto il possibile per offrirti un prodotto studiato nei minimi dettagli e alla moda, il prossimo passo spetta a te. Supportaci, diffinodi la voce sui social network, unisciti alla nostra community ed invita i tuoi amici a condividere le loro passioni e ad unirsi a tutti noi. 


Noi amiamo rispondere a tutte le tue domande o commenti, sia positivi che negativi, e allo stesso tempo amiamo interagire con te, quindi non esitare a contattarci o a divertirti con noi sui social network.


ciao@ricorules.com               per qualsiasi opinione su di noi

info@ricorules.com               per informazioni generali

support@ricorules.com       per problemi di natura tecnica e supporto


   


Grazie per aver guardato la nostra campagna! Noi apprezziamo se vorrai supportarci e se vorrai condividerla con i tuoi amici.


Federico and Brunella

on the beach or whenever you want. But if you want, it also can be removed it
from the shirt.  Both men and women’s t-shirt have been studied in detail and they have cuffed sleeves and a slim fit to let you be always fashionable.Our 2014 collection will have : men and
women’s t-shirt and unisex sweatshirts. All the products are made 100% by high
quality cotton. The entire  manufacturing process,
from fabrics choice,  cutting, to the
final printing, is completely made in Italy. Serigraphy has been used as
printing tecnique; it provides brilliant and durable colours. Have a look to all the photos in the Indiegogo gallery related to our project.

Here
the picture of the graphics you can choose. Click here to see the high
resolution picture.Note: the name at the bottom of each picture is just to identify artwork and it won’t appear on the final printing.Here
the picture of the graphics you can choose. Click here to see the high
resolution picture.Note: the name at the bottom of each picture is just to identify artwork and it won’t appear on the final printing.After you chose you perk we will send you an e-mail. You have to answer to the email we will send in order to indicate models and size you prefer.Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our T-shirts and sweatshirts, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear Rico Rules:1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. You can select a perk that you prefer.2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note; if you would like to contribute extra over and above the cost of the perk you have selected, you can change the figure above. 3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. We will use these funds to process the first production run, bringing the project to life.4) We aim to deliver your first t-shirt or sweatshirt at the beginning of October, 2014.You can add the shipping cost to the perk's contribution, or by making a different free contribution.For example, if you live in Canada and you selected perk "A Rico Rules             T-shirt", the contribution field will display € 20. To add € 7 for postage, you'll have to manually type in € 27.If you are going to choose more perks, you can add the TOTAL postage to one of the contributions.To know the amount of the postage to add for your area, please refer to the maps below.REMEMBER THAT YOU HAVE TO ADD MANUALLY THE SHIPPING COSTS!You can choose the amount for the donation and write it in
the donation. We expect to fulfill all received pre-orders by October 2014.When will my product be ready?We are targeting begin of October for delivery for all finished goods. We will post updates as our campaign progresses but are confident that we will meet our target delivery time.When do I get to pick my size? We will send you a mail once the campaign has been completed where you can pick your desired size and model.Is there a deadline for answering the mail?7 days after sending out the mail, we will review the mails results and go into production for those who have already submitted their responses. If you have not submitted by this time, you will be grouped into the next production batch and may have to wait longer for your products. Will i need to pay customs duties or taxes for my shoes?Inside the UE, no. For international orders, you may face local import duties. Rico Rules is not responsible for knowing these duties. The duties/taxes will be paid at the expense of the recipient via the courier or other service that is requested.I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?Yes you can. Please email to support@ricorules.com with subject title: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.I forgot to add the shipping costs. What to do?You can add the postage for all of your perks with a single free contribution. You can also add the total postage to another perk's contribution, modifying the selected perk's amount. In any case, be sure to use the same account you used for the first contribution(s)Rico Rules is the result of a year of hard work,
passion, sacrifices, enthusiasm and motivation. We are proud of what we
have created and we hope you will support us in developing our project. The aim
is to create a real community of people with same interests and passions. We
are going to refine the final details, take care of the manifacturing , manage
the shipments ad give you more products to chose in the next months.
We worked so hard to give you a high quality product. Now it’s up to
you! Please, support us, talk about us with your friends, be part of our
community.We are not afraid of being followed, in fact we love it. We love answering all your questions, comments, positive or negative. Please do not hesitate to follow us or contact us at  ciao@ricorules.com                    to join us info@ricorules.com                    for general info support@ricorules.com            for support                     Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.Federico and BrunellaVERSIONE ITALIANA                                                      
                                                   
Arte e moda da indossare, questo è Rico Rules!                   Ogni singola grafica delle felpe e delle t-shirt traduce su un capo d’abbigliamento la passione per il cinema, per la musica e per l'arte in generale, con lo scopo dichiarato di esprimere ciò che siamo e tutto quel che più ci piace.                                                  La produzione, rigorosamente made in Italy, è affidata ad esperti del settore ed è curata sempre nei minimi dettagli, affinché la qualità del prodotto sia impeccabile.






L’idea di Rico Rules nasce quasi per gioco durante i primi mesi del 2013 e nasce dal desiderio di due giovani ragazzi, Federico (Founder) e Brunella (Art Director) di dare voce alle loro passioni. Insieme, i due, uniscono la loro creatività e iniziano a dare vita a Rico Rules. L’idea di base era appunto quella di esprimere attraverso una semplice t-shirt i loro interessi e il loro stile. I due mescolano la passione di Federico per la moda, il cinema, la musica, la street art e quegli sport dallo stile unico come il surf e lo skateboard a quelle per la fotografia, l’arte e il disegno di Brunella. 





Mentre lavorano si rendono conto che le loro passioni e il loro stile erano condivisi da un gran numero di amici che in qualità di artisti, fotografi, modelli vengono invitati a dare il loro contributo al progetto. Si va formando così una vera e propria community di persone che condividono gli stessi interessi e lo stesso stile. Dopo più di un anno di duro lavoro il risultato finale è un prodotto interamente italiano di alta qualità, con alcuni particolari veramente innovativi quali l’etichetta in microfibra.  




Tutte le T-shirt e felpe hanno una speciale etichetta in microfibra che puoi usare per pulire, in tutta sicurezza, i tuoi occhiali da sole.  Non è fantastico? Puoi usarla quando sei al mare o in qualsiasi altro momento. Se però dovesse infastidirti puoi sempre rimuoverla facilmente e portarla sempre con te
separatamente. 

sia la t-shirt maschile che femminile
sono curate nei minimi particolari, inoltre presentano delle maniche risvoltate
e una vestibilità slimfit per essere sempre alla moda.
La nostra collezione 2014 presenta due modelli di t-shirt: femminile e
maschile. Le felpe invece saranno unisex. Entrambi i
prodotti sono in cotone 100% di alta qualità. L'intero processo, dalla scelta
dei tessuti, al taglio, alla stampa finale è interamente MADE IN ITALY . La
tecnica di stampa adottata è la serigrafia che assicura colori vivaci, duraturi
nel tempo e lisci al tatto. 
Guarda tante altre foto nella gallery indiegogo di questo progetto.

Di seguito sono raffigurate le grafiche maschili tra cui poter
scegliere. Per vedere le foto in una risoluzione maggiore
clicca qui. Attenzione: il nome in nero alla base di ogni grafica è solo a scopo identificativo e non è parte integrante di essa.Di seguito sono raffigurate le grafiche femminili tra cui poter scegliere. Per vedere le foto in una risoluzione maggiore clicca qui.Attenzione: il nome in nero alla base di ogni grafica è solo a scopo identificativo e non è parte integrante di essa.Per coprire dei costi iniziali e un minimo di pezzi per la produzione delle
nostre t-shirt e felpe, abbiamo bisogno del tuo supporto per far si che il progetto
abbia inizio. Ecco come puoi fare per aiutarci ed essere il primo ad indossare
Rico Rules:
1) 
Seleziona un perk dal lato destro dello schermo per iniziare il pre-ordine.
Seleziona quello che più ti piace
2) 
Continua alla pagina successiva ed inserisci tutte le informazioni relative
alle spedizioni e ai dettagli dipagamento. Nota che qualora volessi dare un
contributo maggiore di quello stabilito dal perk puoi farlo tranquillamente,
come mostrato nella figura di seguito sotto.
3) 
Completa il pagamento via Paypal  o
usando la tua carta di credito/debito. Useremo queste donazioni per dare inizio
alla prima produzione.
4) 
L’obiettivo sarebbe quello di inviare i primi prodotti agli inizi di
Ottobre 2014

SPESE DI SPEDIZIONE
Cliccando sulla donazione scelta potrete
modificare l'importo del contributo. Ricordate in questa occasione di
aggiungere manualmente i costi di spedizione!
Ad esempio, scegliendo il perk "A Rico Rules
T-shirt", il campo donazione riporterà €20. Aggiungendo i 7 euro per la
spedizione in Italia di una t-shirt, bisognerà scrivere manualmente: € 27.
I costi di spedizione sono specificati nelle
tabelle che troverete poco più giù.



Nella stessa pagina vi saranno chiesti i
dati per la spedizione. Inseriteli e cliccate su "Continue".Questa pagina vi informa che la nostra è una "Fixed Funding Campaign", ovvero se non dovessimo raggiungere l’obiettivo di 30'000 € la vostra donazione vi sarà interamente restituita! Proseguite cliccando su "GO TO PAYPAL".

Adesso potete selezionare
"Italy" come paese, ed "Italiano" come lingua, per
compilare agevolmente tutti i campi obbligatori.

Ricordate, se non siete interessati a
creare un account PayPal, di deselezionare la casella "Salva questi dati
su un conto Paypal". Proseguite cliccando su "Rivedi e continua"                                                                             
Dando l'ultima conferma, avrete
contribuito alla realizzazione di Rico Rules!
Prevediamo di spedire tutti i preordini entro l'inizio di Ottobre 2014.Prevediamo di spedire tutti i preordini entro l'inizio di Ottobre 2014.Quando saranno pronti i prodotti?
La data prefissata per l’inizio delle spedizioni è Ottobre. Ti terremo
aggiornati sui progressi della nostra campagna ma siamo sicuri di poter
rispettare i tempi previsti.
Dove posso selezionare la taglia e il colore?
Ti invieremo un’e-mail al completamento della campagna. Potrai scegliere la
taglia e il modello che desideri.
C’è una scadenza per rispondere alla mail che mi invierete?
7 giorni dopo l’invio della nostra mail, rivedremo tutte le risposte ed
inizieremo la produzione per tutti coloro che hanno già risposto. Se non hai
risposto entro i 7 giorni la tua richiesta verrà inoltrata per la seconda
produzione e probabilmente dovrai attendere un po’ in più per avere i nostri
prodotti.
Dovrò pagare qualche tassa doganale per il mio prodoto?
Non per i paesi facenti parte
dell’UE. Per ordini internazionali, potrebbe capitare di dover pagare
delle tasse doganali. Rico Rules non è responsabile riguardo questo aspetto. Le tasse
saranno a carico dell’acquirente e potranno essere pagate tramite il corriere o
altri servizi.
Ho digitato il mio indirizzo in modo errato. Posso cambiarlo?
Certo! Manda un’e-mail a support@ricorules.com con oggetto :
‘Address change’. Grazie 
Ho dimenticato di aggiungere le spese di spedizione. Cosa posso fare?
Puoi aggiungere le spese di spedizione per un qualsiasi perk con una
“single free contribution” (cliccando su "contribute now"). Puoi anche aggiungere le spese di spedizione totali
contribuendo ad un altro perk, modificando la cifra da donare aggiungendo il totale delle spedizioni. In ogni caso,
assicurati di usare sempre lo stesso account.Rico Rules è il risultato di più di un anno di duro lavoro, passione,
sacrificio, entusiasmo e motivazione. Noi siamo veramente orgogliosi di ciò che
abbiamo creato e speriamo di ricevere tutto il tuo supporto per far crescere la
nostra idea e creare una vera e propria community di persone che condividono le
stesse passioni e lo stesso stile. Abbiamo
tantissime idee per il futuro e non vediamo l’ora di poterle realizzarle ma per
farlo abbiamo prima bisogno del tuo supporto in questa campagna Indiegogo per far
in modo che questo progetto si realizzi. Ma ciò sarà possibile solo e soltanto
grazie al tuo contributo a questo progetto. Durante i prossimi mesi lavoreremo
ai dettagli finali, organizzeremo la produzione, gestiremo le spedizioni ed
amplieremo i modelli da proporti. 

Noi abbiamo fatto tutto il
possibile per offrirti un prodotto studiato nei minimi dettagli e alla moda, il
prossimo passo spetta a te. Supportaci, diffinodi la voce sui social network,
unisciti alla nostra community ed invita i tuoi amici a condividere le loro
passioni e ad unirsi a tutti noi. Noi amiamo rispondere a tutte le tue domande o commenti, sia positivi che negativi, e allo stesso tempo amiamo interagire con te, quindi non esitare a contattarci o a divertirti con noi sui social network.ciao@ricorules.com               per qualsiasi opinione su di noiinfo@ricorules.com               per informazioni generalisupport@ricorules.com       per problemi di natura tecnica e supporto   Grazie per aver guardato la nostra campagna! Noi apprezziamo se vorrai supportarci e se vorrai condividerla con i tuoi amici.Federico and Brunella

story:
BEWARE THE BLOOD MOON SUPER ECLIPSE!

While there is time! We are developing custom *for this special event* protective Blood Moon Lunar Eclipse glasses for your supernatural safety.

You survived last year's Total Solar Eclipse by using protective glasses. But are you prepared for the epochal event of January 31st, 2018??? It is the third and final of a dreaded TRIPLE SUPERMOON sequence.  This is truly a once in a lifetime event to be commemorated (with protective eye glasses!).

We want you to safely enjoy the coming Super Blood Moon Lunar Eclipse!

NASA has kept silent about what protection it is giving astronauts during the Blood Moon Eclipse, but we do know this: Direct sunlight contains about 100,000 lumens of intensity. The Full Moon projects 1/100,000th that amount. The Blood Moon eclipse could be 1/10,000th of even that intensity. With so many numbers involved, its clear that you need BLOOD MOON ECLIPSE GLASSES. Our glasses will give nominal safety against photons, UV rays, X-Rays, Sting-Rays and evil spirits emitted from the eclipse. 

(Sample of non-eclipse glasses. Our design is optimized for Blue Blood Super Lunar Eclipses)

 

In California, on the morning of January 31st, the Blood Moon Eclipse will set in the Western sky, having bloodened the Earth for three hours. Not only will our Lunar Eclipse Glasses protect you from any harmful rays, but through the magic of fireworks diffraction grating optics, you will see glimpses of faeries, sprites, vampires, chupacabra, undead, ghosts, zombies, wraiths, and failed first dates. This effect will continue into the daytime and following nights for your continued protection.

The Blood Moon Eclipse timeline for your city can be found here.

(NOT INTENDED FOR WEREWOLVES! If you or your loved once suffer from chronic or occasional lycanthropy, please seek seek prescription strength protection such as a steel bucket and heavy chains for this event.)

With your support, we can complete the design and distribution of Blood Moon Lunar Eclipse protective glasses and distribute them to our backers in time for The Event.

Backstory: I am a science teacher at the San Jose Conservation Corps Charter School. This project is the idea of one of my students, Gloria Plancarte. One of the most rewarding moments as a teacher is to spot talented minds and give them a boost. Gloria is exactly that kind of talented mind. In December, we were discussing how there would be three consecutive supermoons, capped off by a lunar eclipse -a Blood Moon. We laughed about how there would probably be “end of the world” warnings like there were for the total solar eclipse last August. Everyone else just laughed, but Gloria suggested making a fun business out of it. 

So here we are. 

Smile and contribute. Give aspiring entrepreneur Gloria Plencarte her start. :)
