story:
Purpose

Gage Timepieces began a little over two years ago when I was reading a men's magazine. There was an advertisement for a luxury watch. The ad featured some movie star leaning casually against a vintage car looking off to some new adventure off screen. I loved the watch but thought that I would never take that watch on a road trip.

I immediately decided that the world needed a heirloom quality watch that will do what high end watches once did: Go out into the field. Climb mountains, descend to the ocean floor.

The relationship between men and machine shouldn't mean that a cherished watch goes into a collection and only get brought out for New Year's parties. When it gets passed on to your children, your watch should have some character that tells stories to tell about where you have been.

I believe that technology has made our world bigger, not smaller. A century ago your dreams would end at the edge of your small farming town. Now, you can be anywhere in the world in 24 hours, doing anything you want. Your only limitation is how big you can dream. And when you get there you will need a rugged watch. It won't hurt if your timepiece looks awesome too.

Thanks to the rise of crowdfunding I am able to make my dream a reality and send you on your travels with the very best watch I can design.

The Watch

 

The Gage Worldtimer is a modern casual design that doesn't abandon traditional design, it drop-kicks it. Thanks to its patent pending lugless design, the watch will feel smaller than it's 43 mm case would suggest. The double crowns feature a double o-ring design to keep your watch water resistant to 100 meters or 330 feet. An internal bezel rotates to set to your current timezone and let you know at a glance how many hours ahead or behind you another city is: prefect for coordinating business calls to other countries or just keeping in touch with your friends and family across the country. The crystal is 2.5 mm thick sapphire, one of the hardest materials known which will resist scratches keeping a clear view of the watch dial for years.

The hour and minute hands as well as the applique indices are coated in superluminova which allows you to tell time late into the night by their bright glow.

The heart of the watch is a Sellita 200 automatic Swiss movement that is powered by the swing of your arm. The technology of automatic movements has been perfected and is the soul of every high end luxury watch on the market. While your smart watch will be worthless and outdated in a few years the automatic watch is timeless.  Rather that the rough ticking of a quartz movement, the second hand on an automatic sweeps seamlessly over the dial. With no toxic lithium batteries, the Worldtimer is more environmentally friendly and your watch will never die at a bad time. With periodic maintenance few years by a watchmaker, your Worldtimer will continue ticking for your children and grandchildren.

The Worldtimer is available in three variations to fit your personality and wardrobe: 

  • oxblood dial with black leather strap
  • onyx dial with a rich brown leather strap
  • navy blue dial and matched leather strap

All variations can be upgraded in the perks to include an Italian rubber band, spare set of pins and pin removal tool with your watch so that you can protect your leather strap from the effects of water, sweat or mud.

The Gage Serpent

People ask me what the logo featured on the dial and movement rotor is. Here is the story.

My dad built a sailboat in his mom's backyard when he was a young man and the serpent was a design he painted on the bow. For years he told a tall tale about how the serpent was called Niehigh and in South American legend it led his master to paradise. The truth was that a tattoo artist friend just doodled it for him.

But the lie became a real legend. My dad was just a blue collar metal worker but with hard work and dedication to his dream he eventually sailed his boat on three voyages across the Pacific ocean to many tropical paradises and back.

The serpent became my brand logo as a reminder that anybody can accomplish anything, including me, an Army veteran who knew nothing about watchmaking, teaching himself watch design and launching his own brand.

Risks & Challenges

This campaign will raise the funds I need to set up tooling for a larger production run. To really crowdfund a production run I need a working model in my hands to show the watch world for the marketing I need to get that kind of traction.

Right now I have a digital prototype, where a computer engineer created a virtual version from my CAD drawings and tested all the components, but nothing physical that I can hand over to the watch blogs for their critique. Your backing will allow to to expand this dream from a set of computer files into a living, breathing watch brand.

At the end of this campaign, I will forward funds to my manufacturing partner in Martigny, Switzerland who will produce the dies and return a functioning model. Your watches will ship after tooling is complete while I am running the second larger crowdfunding campaign, but no later than April 2017. 

Even in the event of complete failure of my brand, I will still own the tooling and have the cash reserves on hand to order your watches to be produced via CNC milling which allows such a small production run. You will get your watch no matter what.

story:
We are 3D printer owners and we use a lot of plastics. We pay a lot of money for our supplies.

But... plastic is cheap! We asked ourselves: What can we do? Why pay so much?!?

The Problem

We have a problem that many other makers have: the plastic is very expensive! Why does it cost so much? Yet the raw material is really cheap!

What can we do to obtain an high-quality plastic filament, produced in Italy at an affordable price?

The Solution: Filonero

We have tried to produce plastic in our garage. Then, at the end, we succeed in create a really good product. It's cheap and others may benefit. We are using it. It's really good!

We decided to produce it and to ask for help to the community of makers

Tech Specification

High quality, pure ABS plastic filament. 100% made in Italy.

RoHS compliant, high strength, good toughness

Diameter: 1.75mm (roundness +/-0.03mm)

Material: actually only ABS 100% virgin material.

Color: actually only black like Ford's T-Model... ;-)

Perks

We will offer these perks:
  • Your Help for 5 EUR
  • A single spool of black ABS - 1Kg (400m) @ 19 EUR
  • A kit of small spool (five colours: black, white, red, blue, yellow) - 5 spool - 250gr x 5 (100m x 5) @ 34 EUR


What We Need

We need 10,000 EUR to start our first batch of ABS spools and to start our local production.

  • FiloNero is developed, tested and ready to be sold, but we just need your support to reach a viable volume for production!

What You Get

You get to be a part of our family, you get to be one of the first to receive our pure ABS filament.

  • Perks will ship within one month of campaign ending successfully.
  • wWe do not guarantee for the colors of the kit. The colors may be subject to the availability of the raw material. You will be notified of any change.

Next Goal

If we will reach:
  • .10.000 EUR - you can get Filonero ABS in every colour you want (not only Black)-
  • 20.000 EUR - we will introduce kits of 10 colors.
  • 50.000 EUR - we will introduce the production PLA spools.

Shipping Costs

Shipping and handling charges are not included in the amount of perks. When your perks will be ready, we will contact you and at the time of shipment payment we will send the item.

About Us

We are interested in 3D printing tecnologies since a few years. We are italian entrepneur and passionate makers.

Fabrizio Macchi it’s an engineer who builds electronic projects and program software.

Stefano Brivio is a young Italian businessman. He's is very skilled in organizing industrial productions. He has great ideas and is quick to implement. Paolo supports the "garage", by providing the technological support and technical solutions.

Simone De Giuseppe as business consultants and 3D specialists.

story:
! exclamation F/W 2014/2015 Campaign


We just released our first image of the new International Campaign.


! exclamation


This is the name of our brand new fashion line. And this is our logo. 
We've been working in the fashion industry since ever and now it just came out to be the perfect time to release our own fashion brand. 
But we wanted to make something that was a real strong meaning of quality, high quality, both for the designs and the materials we are going to use. 

The Old Italian Tradition

That's what inspired us since the beginning.
The old memories of moms and grammas, sitting on a couch doing fashion.
They didn't know they were holding in their hands one of the ancient secrets of the italian traditions. 
Of course they had no trendy designs planned on a table of a famous art director. 
They just did fashion for the family. All the family. 
When we opened this company I wanted to make sure that the same tradition, the same good taste and huge level of quality would have been protected. 

Tailor Made Fashion

That's the extraordinary service we want to give to every client.
The innovative way we see the fashion industry today: working on tailor made clothes.
We can guarantee a 5 days + shipping delivery. 
All our clients will place orders online and with the orders they send us their own sizes.
In 5 days the clothes are ready for the shipping and we can guarantee a worldwide delivery in 2 days. 




    The Goal

    We have already 3 people working full time on the new designs both for wool and for the cotton projects. But we need at least 3 more.
    We already invested around $45,000 for the company registration, 3 employees, the rent for the warehouse and a couple of instruments but we really need more.
    We are taking it by steps. The very first step is connected to the funding request of this campaign. But further funding will be more than welcome, considering to open
    the Spring summer 2015 collections very soon and a representative and delivery office in the USA as well within January 2015.

    The money for the first step would be for: 

    1 - Two iMac for the graphics and the designs
    2 - One iMac to manage the online store
    3 - Instruments for the production steps
    4 - Cottons - different types and colours
    5 - Wool - different types and     colours 
    6 - Software for the Store and for the online store
    7 - Packaging

    We started producing hats, gloves, shirts, pulls, scarfs and clothes for kids but if we can reach the goal we can start for teens and grown-ups too, both male and female, with a full collection.

     

    The Materials

    The quality of the materials we use is not something we accept to deal around. 
    We only work with the best wool and the best cottons available. That is not making us the cheapest company on the market, but we are not born to be the cheapest, we want to be the ones you remember for the quality. 




    The Store

    http://exclamationstore.com

    The Official Launch is fixed for October the 10th, 2014 - 9PM London Time.
    The Online store will be one of the most amazing shopping experiences our clients never had. With personal private profiles with their own sizes, their own preferences, their own wishing lists, and much more. 


    Shipping Worldwide

    Even if we produce the clothes in Italy we want to reach our clients everywhere in the world with the best shipping experience possible. 
    We work with the best international express courier and our clients can get their personalised packages in only 1 or 2 days max. 

    Risks

    There's no company in this world that we can call a risk-free investment, but at least there are companies that can reduce this gap.
    I can't tell you that this company will be a huge success, but for sure I can tell you that we'll do our best to make it happens.

story:
Tiny Equine Stockings!

Your chance to get your own Tiny Equine Stockings has arrived. Order a few for yourself to prance around with, or order the Friendship Pack to share with those special somehorses in your life.

PLEASE ADD $5 SHIPPING TO YOUR ORDER FOR THE CONTINENTAL USA, and $10 FOR ALL INTERNATIONAL ORDERS.

Message me at tinyequinesocks@yahoo.com if you've got any questions or a coupon code.

The Stockings

One size fits most! The stockings are stretchable, breathable, and surprisingly strong.


Pictured above, in order: Clever Horse, Magic Horse, Fast Horse, Party Horse, Shy Horse, Apple Horse, Fashion Horse


The Goal: $5000

If met, the funding goal of $5000 will be put directly towards the mass production of the stockings. Because they'll be produced in bulk, the price per pair drops significantly, hence the low prices for you guys.


Funding

  • When full funding is reached, the first stretch goal will become available as an additional purchasable perk, as well as a free addition to everybody who orders the Sock Buddies perk or higher. Afterwards, new stretch goals will be announced as each previous goal is met, and each new design will be added FREE OF CHARGE to Friendship Pack supporters.
  • Please spread the campaign as much as possible! More funding means more stretch goals, which means more socks for everyhorse! Use the tools on the top of the page, or simply share the URL wherever you've got friends. You have friends, right? Right?


No Funding

If the campaign isn't fully funded, nobody will be charged anything. But then the stockings won't be made. How terrible. :( That's why it's so important we reach our goal. If the campaign is over-funded, addons will become available. With the addition of these additional designs, the production time will increase slightly, possibly causing delays in delivery, but ultimately providing a better product.



STRETCH GOALS

  • FULL FUNDING: THE STOCKINGS WILL BE MADE! You get all the socks you pledged for! They'll become tangible, physical objects that you can hold in your hands and wear on your legs.

  • $7,500: The Sun Horse and Moon Horse designs (concepts below) will become available as extra stretch goals, and will be added to any Friend Pack order free of charge.



  • $10,000 (concepts coming soon): Music Horse Duo Pack! Choose your side, Classical or Electronic. Why not take both?
  • FURTHER STRETCH GOALS (TBA):  Princess & Pretender Duo Pack!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
It all started in 2017. We began as a marketplace to promote a wide range of vegan fashion products that were on-trend and also ecological, but we soon noticed the lack of good quality vegan belts on offer. Traditionally, belts are made from leather or 100% PVC, which often use animal-derived glue. 

You're also limited to one style, a hip or waist belt, not the Voodism way. We set out to create a belt that could be worn on the hip and waist and everything in between. A functional design, styled by you, our very first Voodism belt collection.

 

 

Our focus was to make the perfect belt and we didn’t want to limit the design in any way. Although it’s vegan, it’s not limited to vegans: it’s for everyone.

Our first belt range is crafted from a green PU made with renewable sources, 48% of which are derived from the corn plant. Supported by an inner layer of FSC certified cork and held together by 100% plant-based glue, making it not only durable but green to its core.

It’s also designed to be reversible, so you can choose from two colours, and it fits both at the waist and hip, making it a truly versatile accessory for the wardrobe.

 

 

 

Meanwhile, the Italian-made triangle solid brass buckle is available in a chrome or gold-tone and is detachable. We felt this was an important key feature as it means all future collections will allow customers to solely purchase the strap and this minimises our environmental footprint. 

 

 

 

 

 

All wrapped up in eco-friendly packaging, this provides 100% veganism that we are proud of. That’s how committed we are to keeping style, and the earth, green.

 

 

 

To launch our belt on the new Voodism website, we are aiming to raise £10,000. This will help fund the production of our initial range and enable us to purchase materials for future collections.

Beyond this, our goals are to be carbon neutral, support the development of more eco-friendly vegan fabrics and to invest profits into environmental and social projects, which we’re really excited to do.

 

 

 

It's easy, just follow these 3 simple steps. New to Indiegogo? So are we! Let's do this together. If you have any questions, just check our FAQ or email the team.

 

 

 

Let’s start with your hips. Measure around your hips, where your low rise pants would fall. Got it? Now measure around your high waist.

Measurements in CM

Measurements Inches

Found your ideal size? The high range size for your hips is based on the second hole from the end, we have 8 holes! So if you’re at the high end of the range and would like a bit more give then opt for a size higher. The holes are spaced 2.5 cm/1 inch apart. Just make sure you fall within the waist range. The low waist size is the final hole, you really can’t go any smaller!

 

 

Our first collection is made with green PU that has a total bio-based content equal to 75%  (48.6 % corn polyols, 27 % cotton, 24.4 % normal PU). The inner lining is made from FSC certified cork and held together by natural latex glue.

story:
*As featured on the BBC Apprentice*

LUMO provide urban cyclists the optimum blend of style, visibility and comfort, on and off a bike. Following a successful Kickstarter campaign in December 2014 to launch our debut collection, we have come back to crowdfunding to introduce our latest release that has been 12 months in the making. 

Inspired by the military issue MA-1 flight jacket, the Clissold Bomber has been adapted for life on the bike and is the perfect crossover from cycling specific clothing to stylish outerwear.

CYCLING FUNCTION

Every detail on this jacket has been considered to make urban cycling as comfortable as possible:

  • 14x4 Lumen waterproof LEDs on front & rear, visible 400m away
  • Up-to 14 hours battery life on a single charge
  • USB charged lithium polymer battery pack
  • Dropped hem to keep you covered on the bike
  • Additional sleeve length for comfort when in riding position
  • Zipped pocket closures in waist and chest pockets
  • High ribbed collar for wind protection
  • High performance fabric providing water resistance and breathability
  • Moisture wicking mesh lining 

WATER RESISTANT

The Clissold Bomber jacket has been made using Schoeller® 3XDRY® performance fabric, meaning the outside of the jacket is water, dirt and stain repellent and any moisture on the inside is quickly absorbed and evaporated away from the body, keeping you dry and comfortable on the bike.

 

VISIBLE 400 METRES AWAY

Ultra high brightness waterproof LED lights run down the front and the back of the jacket and are visible to traffic up to 400 metres away. Positioned in the most visible location on the body, the lights will last up to 14 hours on a single charge and are USB rechargeable.

The lights are powered via a lightweight USB rechargeable lithium polymer battery pack that sits neatly in an inside pocket and will last up to 14 hours on a single charge.  
 
 

All LUMO garments have been designed to look as good off the bike as they do on it. We offer a casual, tailored fit that is comfortable for cycling in, whilst providing a relaxed look off the bike. Both men’s and women’s jackets are sized based on average height and build and designed to go over two lightweight layers like a top and a jumper. If you will be wearing heavy layers underneath, we recommend you size up one size on your normal choice. All our garments have been made with additional length in the sleeves and back to offer comfort whilst in the riding position.

For more information on sizing and how to measure yourself, click here.

UNISEX STYLES

The Clissold Bomber jacket is a unisex style, meaning the cut is exactly the same for men as it is for women, but womens sizes are slightly shorter in the arms and rear hem than mens. 

CARE AND WARRANTY 

We offer a free lifetime repair service. We offer a 12 month warranty from the time of delivery and will replace or repair any faulty product within that period, as well as offering lifetime repair outside of warranty. To find out how to care for your LUMO product and operate the lighting system, have a read of our user manual.

 

The Full package includes two items from our current collection, the Bermondsey Backpack and Camden Polo:

Since launching, LUMO has had coverage in mainstream, technology and cycling media.

With the experience of the last campaign behind us, no stone has been left unturned in delivering the Clissold Bomber. Everything from manufacturers to packaging and fulfilment is already in place, and we have a team of people with the knowledge, skills and experience to deliver. We understand how long the product will take to manufacture and when we will be able deliver it to our backers who wish to pledge and be the first people to receive the Clissold in the world.

If you like what you've seen but aren't in a position to make a pledge, we'd really appreciate your support in helping to spread the word about this campaign. Simply click on the links below to share the campaign on Twitter and/or Facebook. 

How long do the lights last for?

The lights on the Bomber jacket will last up to 14 hours on a single charge. The lightweight lithium Polymer battery pack is USB rechargeable and will flash red when the battery is under 25% charged and green when fully charged. 

Would the jacket replace my existing bike lights? 
No. All LUMO products add a layer of security. It is recommended that you use LUMO in conjunction with your existing lights. For more information on this, see our user manual.

Have you identified the manufacturer?

Yes, we currently produce the LUMO range with a European manufacturer who specialise in performance sportswear and high end fashion. The Clissold Bomber jacket will be produced at the same factory. 

 

Risks and challenges

Timeline

With one successful Kickstarter campaign already under our belt that shipped to over 450 backers in 32 countries, we are confident we can deliver on the timely delivery of the new products. We have existing suppliers and manufacturers ready and waiting for a production order and have factored in two more rounds of sampling to make sure we account for backer feedback ahead of starting production

Final products

What you are seeing are final Kickstarter samples, so expect the final product to be even more polished. There is a chance we opt to change certain features on the Bomber Jacket based on backer feedback following the campaign. This will be clearly communicated to backers ahead of production and will result in a better end product.

Warranty

We're confident in the build quality of these garments. So much so, that we offer a one year replace or repair warranty on them from the date of delivery, with a free lifetime repair warranty after that.
story_txt:
*As featured on the BBC Apprentice*
LUMO provide urban cyclists the optimum blend of style, visibility and comfort, on and off a bike. Following a successful Kickstarter campaign in December 2014 to launch our debut collection, we have come back to crowdfunding to introduce our latest release that has been 12 months in the making. 

Inspired by the military issue MA-1 flight jacket, the Clissold Bomber has been adapted for life on the bike and is the perfect crossover from cycling specific clothing to stylish outerwear.


CYCLING FUNCTION
Every detail on this jacket has been considered to make urban cycling as comfortable as possible:

14x4 Lumen waterproof LEDs on front & rear, visible 400m away
Up-to 14 hours battery life on a single charge
USB charged lithium polymer battery pack
Dropped hem to keep you covered on the bike
Additional sleeve length for comfort when in riding position
Zipped pocket closures in waist and chest pockets
High ribbed collar for wind protection
High performance fabric providing water resistance and breathability
Moisture wicking mesh lining 

WATER RESISTANT
The Clissold Bomber jacket has been made using Schoeller® 3XDRY® performance fabric, meaning the outside of the jacket is water, dirt and stain repellent and any moisture on the inside is quickly absorbed and evaporated away from the body, keeping you dry and comfortable on the bike.


 

VISIBLE 400 METRES AWAY
Ultra high brightness waterproof LED lights run down the front and the back of the jacket and are visible to traffic up to 400 metres away. Positioned in the most visible location on the body, the lights will last up to 14 hours on a single charge and are USB rechargeable.



The lights are powered via a lightweight USB rechargeable lithium polymer battery pack that sits neatly in an inside pocket and will last up to 14 hours on a single charge.  
 

 

All LUMO garments have been designed to look as good off the bike as they do on it. We offer a casual, tailored fit that is comfortable for cycling in, whilst providing a relaxed look off the bike. Both men’s and women’s jackets are sized based on average height and build and designed to go over two lightweight layers like a top and a jumper. If you will be wearing heavy layers underneath, we recommend you size up one size on your normal choice. All our garments have been made with additional length in the sleeves and back to offer comfort whilst in the riding position.
For more information on sizing and how to measure yourself, click here.

UNISEX STYLES
The Clissold Bomber jacket is a unisex style, meaning the cut is exactly the same for men as it is for women, but womens sizes are slightly shorter in the arms and rear hem than mens. 
CARE AND WARRANTY 
We offer a free lifetime repair service. We offer a 12 month warranty from the time of delivery and will replace or repair any faulty product within that period, as well as offering lifetime repair outside of warranty. To find out how to care for your LUMO product and operate the lighting system, have a read of our user manual.





 
The Full package includes two items from our current collection, the Bermondsey Backpack and Camden Polo:



Since launching, LUMO has had coverage in mainstream, technology and cycling media.



With the experience of the last campaign behind us, no stone has been left unturned in delivering the Clissold Bomber. Everything from manufacturers to packaging and fulfilment is already in place, and we have a team of people with the knowledge, skills and experience to deliver. We understand how long the product will take to manufacture and when we will be able deliver it to our backers who wish to pledge and be the first people to receive the Clissold in the world.







If you like what you've seen but aren't in a position to make a pledge, we'd really appreciate your support in helping to spread the word about this campaign. Simply click on the links below to share the campaign on Twitter and/or Facebook. 



How long do the lights last for? 
The lights on the Bomber jacket will last up to 14 hours on a single charge. The lightweight lithium Polymer battery pack is USB rechargeable and will flash red when the battery is under 25% charged and green when fully charged. 
Would the jacket replace my existing bike lights? No. All LUMO products add a layer of security. It is recommended that you use LUMO in conjunction with your existing lights. For more information on this, see our user manual.
Have you identified the manufacturer?
Yes, we currently produce the LUMO range with a European manufacturer who specialise in performance sportswear and high end fashion. The Clissold Bomber jacket will be produced at the same factory. 
 
Risks and challenges
Timeline
With one successful Kickstarter campaign already under our belt that shipped to over 450 backers in 32 countries, we are confident we can deliver on the timely delivery of the new products. We have existing suppliers and manufacturers ready and waiting for a production order and have factored in two more rounds of sampling to make sure we account for backer feedback ahead of starting production
Final products
What you are seeing are final Kickstarter samples, so expect the final product to be even more polished. There is a chance we opt to change certain features on the Bomber Jacket based on backer feedback following the campaign. This will be clearly communicated to backers ahead of production and will result in a better end product.
Warranty
We're confident in the build quality of these garments. So much so, that we offer a one year replace or repair warranty on them from the date of delivery, with a free lifetime repair warranty after that.

story:
What?

It's a pin pack. I like pins, they are shiny. I've gone for hard enamel, it's a tiny bit more expensive than soft enamel but it has a smooth finish, unlike soft enamel which kinda looks like a big ol' butt in comparison.

Here are some comparisons off the top of my head...

 

Why?

I just wanted to make something fun …and what's more fun than happy smiley skeletons? Nothing. That's what. Maybe a can of Diet Blood. FUN.

Here are the 3 pins I'll be making, two are coated black nickel, one is coated brass and all three are real shiny like. The pins will come with a rubber clutch to hold them on, which is better than those awful gold pin backs which suck and stabbed me that one time.

They are also 100% not haunted.

 

How?

I'll be doing sets of three using fixed funding so they only get manufactured once the full funding is reached. This should keep the price down for you, yes YOU!

If this works out I'll open up a shop so people can buy individual designs without the need to fund each pack. Literally how this site works, I know.

 

Huh?

Huh?

 

Manufacturing & Shipping

Manufacturing takes around 3-4 weeks after the goal has been reached, shipping will take around a week, or 3 working days if you're based in the UK.

Shipping is free for UK backers. Woop!

 

Shrek Goals

Hopefully if the funding is met I'll be able to add these on - more details when we get closer!

story:
FASHION MEETS FUNCTIONALITY

BOLI MUNICH is a new German brand with an innovative approach serving the worldwide loving dog owner community with an ultra cool and functional softshell jacket. For men and women.

15+ Pockets and Features

FUNCTIONALITY 

Frontside

Backside
 

Detailed explanation of all pockets further below...

 

FASHION

Besides the functionality of this jacket we paid high attention on the look. A modern cut paired with the latest colors and material, this softshell jacket stands out at places.
Our background in fashion design guarantees you a top modern jacket.

Even when you are without your best friend!

 

COLOR

Depending on the backed number of jackets we want to offer them in as many colors as possible. Basically, the more you back and the more you share this campaign, the more variations you can choose from :)
Of course, you can even give us more inspiration. For now we have the following colors:
Black, Dark Brown, Light Grey, Blue, Red, Light Blue/Coral, Neon-Yellow, Pink.
Even single color versions are possible.

We will ask every backer for their desired color combo and hopefully we reach the number to satisfy every wish. THE FIRST 30 BACKERS WILL GET THEIR DESIRED COMBO OUT OF THOSE 8 COLORS ANYWAY!!! So maybe YOU get an UNICUM! You better hurry!
There will be at least 5 combinations each male and female version.

 

POCKETS AND FEATURES
 

Treat Pocket
-> An innovative doggy treat pocket will be visible when folded down. Comfortable in use with washable inner bag.

Treats


Leash Holder
-> Due to a press button you can quickly release the leash and tight it easily.

Leash Holder


Waste Bag Dispenser
-> An inside pocket with a slot contains the waste bags. Always and easy to access.

Waste Bag Dispenser


Large Pocket Backside with Zipper
-> This large pocket can be used for a water bottle, toys or valuables due to the zipper.

Backside Pocket with Zipper


Toy Pocket Backside
-> Large pocket which is very comfortable and easy to access. For toys, dummies etc.

Large Pocket for Toys


Ball Launcher Holder
-> Must-have for one of the coolest gadgets! Gives you free hands and doesn't affect your free movement.

Ball Launcher Holder


Whistle Holder
-> Easy to access holder for your whistle. For standard whistles. Always within reach.

Whistle Holder


Cupholder
-> Smart holder for your coffee, smoothie, water bottle etc. Holds it tight.
Probably we will keep the holder in the same main color of the jacket. Looks smoother. What do you think?

Cup-/Drink Holder


Smartphone Pocket
-> Safe and easy to access pocket with zipper. With smart inside outlet for the earphone.

Smartphone Pocket with Zipper


Earphone Holder
-> Earphone go through the inside outlet of the smartphone pocket through a loop of the back collar which holds them where they should be.

Earphone Holder


Inside Pockets
-> 3 inside pockets for belongings like wallet, keys, sunglasses, snacks etc.
+ a bit of extra room in the waste bag pocket.

e.g. for Wallet, Keys, Snacks, Sunglasses etc.


2 Slim Pockets
-> 2 smart slim pockets, perfect for flashlight and energy bar.

e.g. for Flashlight, Energy Bar, Sunglasses


Hood with Screen
-> Super comfortable hood with screen. Adjustable.

Adjustable Hood with Screen


2 Standard Pockets with Zipper
-> 2 classic standard pockets with zipper. Either for additional stuff or your hands :)

Standard Pockets with Zipper

 

FOCUS ON QUALITY 

Made from softshell material, tested for quality & longevity, dog's hair resistend, breathable, water - and windproof with a water column of 10,000mm.
92% Polyester and 8% Spandex.

Designed in Munich and made in Albania/Europe, we provide premium quality, both in garments and processing. We just started manufacturing the jackets.

Only Highest Quality



Our Story

Ever since we got our dog it has always been kind of inconvenient having a walk with him. There were so many items to think about. At the end we always had a whole bag of stuff taking with us. 

In fact, there are a handful of sellers of dog owner jackets, but they are either not very fashionable or they simply just have two extra pockets but that's it. As seen in the video.

With our background in fashion design we created this ultimate patent pending jacket which leaves nothing to be desired. Super modern design meets functionality!


Why Indiegogo?
Your pre-orders will help us to aim a competitive production price. Obviously we need a certain number of jackets to make them affordable.
And of course, your feedback is very valuable to us!


Thank you for sharing!


Core Team 

Chief Executive Dog
 

Fashion Designer & General Servant
 

EXCHANGE POLICY 

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices on Indiegogo, we won’t be able to accept returns.
 

Risks and Challenges

On this campaign, we will work with fun but absolute professionalism to ensure that your jackets are delivered as promised.

We do know in life and in business there are always unforeseeable risks and challenges, and we are committed to put forth every effort to do right by the customer if or when these situations arise.

We want this jacket and brand as much as anyone else and won't stop until we deliver the best dog owner jacket worldwide.

story:
Be ready for anything with CEAM -soft cotton essentials that combine cutting-edge nanotechnology with a sleek, minimal aesthetic. 

Imagine the confidence of knowing that you’re impervious to spill a cup of coffee, everyday wrinkles, and sweat stains. 

Now, imagine that confidence paired with contemporary designs, -sleek, minimal, and capable of seamlessly taking you from work to play.

What’s more, imagine these wardrobe essentials are made from comfortable cotton oxford, making them soft to the touch and breathable. 

Imagine getting ready in the morning with CEAM -an entirely new kind of clothing.  

 

 

Cotton is the most useful fabric of all time because of its softness and breathability, but it’s incredibly susceptible to water and liquid stains. All earlier treatment to solve these issues altered the hand feel and softness of the fabric we wear daily. 

Our collection is made with an invisible microscopic layer that encapsulates cotton fibers and forms a protective coating that repels liquids, maintaining the softness we love about cotton.

 

Our partner, Dropel, makes clothing lifeproof. Their performance-enhanced natural fabrics are used in all of our garments. We chose DropelTech Cotton because it's the only water and stain repellent fabric that maintains it's softness and breathability.

Dropel has been featured in Time, Business Insider, Mashable, WWD, Forbes and many others. They were recognized by Apparel Magazine as a Top Innovator of 2016 and SXSW as an Innovative World Technology Finalist.

  

Our fabric repels...

Water
 
Soy Sauce

 

Honey
 
 

CEAM is made in Okayama, Japan, a city world-renowned for its manufacturing of high-quality clothing. And CEAM is designed by an upcoming designer who has presented his collection at Paris Fashion Week.

 

 

 

He wears M size. He is 6' 154 lbs

 

 

 

He wears M size. He is 6' 154 lbs

 

   

 

He wears M size. He is 6' 154 lbs

 

  

 

 

 

  

She wears M size. She is 5' 8" B30.5 W23.5 H35

 

 

She wears M size. She is 5' 8" B30.5 W23.5 H35

  

 

 

She wears M size. She is 5' 8" B30.5 W23.5 H35

　

　 

She wears M size. She is 5' 8" B30.5 W23.5 H35

 　

　

 

She wears XS(Women's M) size. She is 5' 8" B30.5 W23.5 H35

 

   

 

 

 

 

・Do not bleach or dry-clean

・Do not use fabric softener

・Some detergents may affect the treatment of fabric. Please test before washing. We recommend an organic detergent.

・Do not iron. Steam ironing is vey effective.

・Tumble dry low

・Turn garment inside-out

・Wash with like colors

・Machine or hand wash in cold water

Not following these instructions may affect the garment's water repellency.

For best results, allow spills to roll off the garment; if any remains, a small amount of water will wash it away.

 

Q. What is the composition of this fabric?

A. 100% natural cotton

Q. Is this treatment harmful?

A. Not at all. ISO Certified, PFOS-free, and PFOA-free

Q. How long will the effect stay?

A. The effect will last through 15-20 washes. The less you wash the clothing, the longer the effect will last.

Q. How can I smooth the wrinkles?

A. Ironing on a high heat may affect the treatment. We suggest using a steam iron on a low setting to remove any wrinkles.

Q. If the shirt resists stains, will I need to wash it?

A. While our hydrophobic nanotechnology will repel water-based liquids, it’s still susceptible to dirt and oil-based stains. Hot liquids may also result in increased staining.

 

Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter for continued updates regarding our production process. If you like what we’re doing, we encourage you to support us in this Kickstarter campaign and like, share, or retweet our activity!!

Please spread the word with

#ceamcloth 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

*The fabric 
We are still working on updating our fabric. This fabric is washable but still susceptible to chemicals. If you do not use an organic detergent, the water-repellent coating may be damaged in the washing process. Please follow the care instructions.

*Manufacturing 
We have an excellent relationship with our factory in Japan, however it does not have a huge capacity. Therefore if we receive an order for over 1000 pieces, there may be a delay in the order.

*Delivery 
All orders within the United States are shipped via UPS Ground from New York.  
All orders outside of the United States are shipped via EMS or FedEx.  
Some errors or issues with these shipping companies may happen. Please understand it is out of our control once a package has left our warehouse. If there is a problem (stolen, lost, destroyed, etc), we can file an insurance claim with the shipper, but we can not cover the cost of replacement.

*Fulfillment 
We are a small team that is shipping all the orders ourselves. We hope there are no mistakes, but if there are we will do our best to solve the problem as quickly as possible and will cover the shipping cost if the error is on our side.

story:
What is the Rungh System?

Picture this:  You get home and have only minutes to get ready to go out.  You pick out a dress but don’t have a nail polish to match.  Do you:

a).  Choose another dress based on the nail polish colors you have on hand

b).  Quickly run to the store, and buy a color that maybe goes with your dress

c).  Go bare or mismatched

d).  Decide to create your own.

I chose d).

I believe in dressing well and having matching accessories but found it frustrating and expensive to constantly buy dozens of commercial nail polishes just to match specific outfits.  The color would never be right or go with the dress I was going to wear for a particular occasion.  It was then that a light bulb went off!!!  What if I could create my own?!  And that’s how Rungh was conceived!

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise the funds for inventory, production, and expansion. Our ability to raise the funds will enable us to expand our production capacity, launch new lines, and negotiate better terms with the suppliers and our shipping partners so we can offer the product to all of you at the lowest possible price.

We are offering to our donors first dibs to own, flaunt, and use the Rungh System before it is available to the general public. Plus you will have the ability to offer your input for the next version, including preferred colors to be launched in refill color pack sets. 

So how do you get your hands on a set like the one above? Five easy steps: 

1) Click contribute now, and the link will connect you to either just contribute $s or choose the Rungh Nail Polish System kit by clicking on a perk at $30 or higher.

2) Next, click continue to payment, and it will take you to PayPal.

3) Put in your payment information

4) Click agree & continue, and you are done - Thank you so much!

5) Indiegogo tracks purchases and will send us a list at the end of the campaign, and we will process and your own Rungh Nail Polish System will soon be on its way to you!


The Impact

The Rungh Nail Polish System was inspired by seeing the hundreds of colors that you can get with paint. By using just the right color combination mixed into a paint base, you can have an endless array of colors for your walls.  So, we felt that we wanted to empower consumers with the same choices of selecting their own colors and creating new shades using combinations of color pigments without having to settle for a color or shade available at a store at that point of time.

Now, for the first time ever, you can create a nail polish color to match your dress or mood, and that too, in under a minute. With the Rungh System, you can create up to 132 different shades using just the 18 color capsules in one set.  Add a refill color pack (another 18 color capsules), and you could create up to 552 shades, add 3 and create 1260 shades...hey at that rate you will have a mini salon at home!   We want to help everyone bring out their true colors and your support will go a long way towards this mission.

Check this out...here are 20 swatches out of the possible 132 made from just one Rungh Nail Polish System.

 Pretty cool isn't it?

And the first 100 backers ($30 or higher) get a special bonus; a free refill color pack!

                          


Meet the Team!

 

Hey there! I'm Neha, Co-founder and CEO of Rungh Cosmetics. As a nail polish fanatic, I have researched and learned all about nail polish and its creation. As an international business major, I have a vision to bring a new customizable approach to cosmetics; something that has never existed before. Join me in inspiring everyone to express themselves with their own creations. Come create with me!

Nick is a marketing insights expert with more than an entrepreneurial streak; he has founded and launched two other successful businesses.  At Rungh, he is our COO and deals with suppliers, banks, accounting, and marketing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Come check us out on Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook, and YouTube.  Nail Color of the Month contests (coming soon) will be awarded to color creations that garner the most votes.  Feel free to reach out to all your friends so you can start up your own Rungh clubs to compete individually or collectively.  Remember, you can always use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
What is the Rungh System? 
Picture this:  You get home and have only minutes to get ready to go out.  You pick out a dress but don’t
have a nail polish to match.  Do you:
a). 
Choose another dress based on the
nail polish colors you have on hand
b). 
Quickly run to the
store, and buy a color that maybe goes with your dress
c). 
Go bare or mismatched
d). 
Decide to create your own.
I chose d).
I believe in dressing well and having matching accessories but
found it frustrating and expensive to constantly buy dozens of commercial nail
polishes just to match specific outfits. 
The color would never be right or go with the dress I was going to wear
for a particular occasion.  It was then
that a light bulb went off!!!  What if I
could create my own?!  And that’s how Rungh was conceived!
   What We Need & What You Get 
We are looking to raise
the funds for inventory, production, and expansion. Our ability to raise the
funds will enable us to expand our production capacity, launch new lines, and negotiate better
terms with the suppliers and our shipping partners so we can offer the product
to all of you at the lowest possible price.
We are offering to our donors first dibs to own, flaunt, and use the Rungh System before it is available
to the general public. Plus you will have the ability to offer your input for
the next version, including preferred colors to be launched in refill color pack
sets. 


So how do you get your hands on a set like the one above? Five easy steps: 
1) Click contribute now, and the link will connect you to either just contribute $s or choose the Rungh Nail Polish System kit by clicking on a perk at $30 or higher.
2) Next, click continue to payment, and it will take you to PayPal.
3) Put in your payment information
4) Click agree & continue, and you are done - Thank you so much!
5) Indiegogo tracks purchases and will send us a list at the end of the campaign, and we will process and your own Rungh Nail Polish System will soon be on its way to you!

The Impact
 
The Rungh Nail Polish System was
inspired by seeing the hundreds of colors that you can get with paint. By using just the right color combination mixed into a paint base, you can have an endless array of colors for your walls. 
So, we felt that we wanted to empower consumers with the same choices of
selecting their own colors and creating new shades using combinations of color
pigments without having to settle for a color or shade available at a store at
that point of time. 
Now, for the first time ever, you can create a
nail polish color to match your dress or mood, and that too, in under a minute. With the Rungh System, you can create up to 132 different shades using just the 18 color capsules in one set.  Add a refill color pack (another 18 color capsules), and you could create up to 552 shades, add 3 and create 1260 shades...hey at that rate you will have a mini salon at home!   We want to help everyone bring out
their true colors and your support will go a long way towards this mission.
Check this out...here are 20 swatches out of the possible 132 made from just one Rungh Nail Polish System.
 Pretty cool isn't it?
And the first 100 backers ($30 or higher) get a special bonus; a free refill color pack!

                          


Meet the Team!

 

Hey there! I'm Neha, Co-founder and CEO of Rungh Cosmetics. As a
nail polish fanatic, I have researched and learned all about nail polish and
its creation. As an international business major, I have a vision to bring a
new customizable approach to cosmetics; something that has never existed
before. Join me in inspiring everyone to express themselves with their own
creations. Come create with me!

Nick is a marketing insights expert with more than an entrepreneurial streak; he has founded and launched two other successful businesses.  At Rungh, he is our COO and deals with suppliers, banks, accounting, and marketing. 



    
Other Ways You Can Help 
Come check us out on Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Facebook,
and YouTube.  Nail Color of the Month contests (coming soon) will be
awarded to color creations that garner the most votes.  Feel free to reach out to all your friends so
you can start up your own Rungh clubs to compete individually or collectively.  Remember, you can always use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hello!

Here you can read more about the project i hope to kick-off with you guys. 
I will in this description tell you guys a little bit more about me, Oskar and why i want to start this brand.

I will also show you the products that we have made samples of and that will be available for you guys to support! And i just want to say that every effort and help you guys put into this, is a dream come true! I will make sure that you gentlemens, you fathers, you boyfriends, you brothers will get the chance to buy high quality luxury footwear without the luxury markup.

 

THE SHOES - below you can see the models that are available for this project and what style you can choose from if you decide to support my project.

 

THE GUNNAR BOOT

Made from a stunning cognac colored calf leather.

THE GREY FRANK

You can in many way say this is the brother of the "gunnar" our first boot. Comes in a luxury grey suede. 

THE GUMMI WILLIAM BOOT

The Gummi William boot is a more relaxed, casual expression of our Gunnar boot. Comes in a painted burgundy calf leather and a wedge sole.

 

THE ROBERT BURGUNDY

Our first double strap made ever. The Robert comes with in a burgundy calf leather material.

THE GREEN LANTERN

The brother of our Robert double strap shoe. Comes in same material but with a green color.

THE TWEED LOAFER

For a more summerly season this loafer will be just perfect. With the tweed material and stunning pattern, this one will be a favorite.

THE CAMO LOAFER

The ultimate camo loafer!

THE OX

Our first ever made Oxford shoe. Comes with a brown suede material.

THE BURG OX

Second choice if you want to have our Oxford shoe. Made from a stunning burgundy calf leather material. 

 

 

The Brand / The Story Behind  

Oscar Woodington was created in the cold early days in Norway 2016, in my one room apartment and in March 2016 the idea was put into reality. It was actually because of my girlfriend that it all really started. I was tired of having to empty my wallet every time I had to buy new clothes, accessories and shoes. A time before all this got real, I was sitting with my girlfriend at home drawing shoes, bracelets and clothes for fun and found it very interesting. I've always been quite interested in fashion and especially in dressing with creativity and colors (always liked to be different). As I had no idea of how to make clothes, accessories and shoes. I started looking online about fabrics, factories and just started from scratch. After hours after hours spent on google and contacting different factories around the world, I started my first collection of 15 bracelets. It all sold out! And since then I haven't looked back. Oscar Woodington is a brand for the everyday dapper gentleman who pays attention to the details and dares to be different. By going the opposite way of the minimalist Scandinavian design - I want to show the world out there the creative Scandinavian design. As I like to say, Oscar Woodington is creating creativity to the modern man's wardrobe. Thank you so much for the support so far, and if you haven't joined our universe yet, it's not too late! 

Me Oskar (founder) with my girlfriend Malin at my friends wedding.

 

The Handmade Luxury  

Every shoes that will be launched and produced from Oscar Woodington is made by hand in Almansa, Spain. The factory is family driven place that has been in the family for over 70 years. Today there is craftsmen that have over 40 years of experience. Combined with this fantastic artisans and top leather from Italy we can create luxury FOOTWEAR that will stick with you for a long time.

With my design im not about following trends or "fashion". I mean fashion doesn't define you as a person. Your style is the definition of you and what you want to tell other people about yourself. And i believe you can never lock one particular style. Style is shaped after your state of mind, confident and where you are in life. The style develops in the same speed as the man is developing and finding his role in life. I want to be a part of that by giving you the possibility to buy luxury shoes to an afordable price and make sure your feet is just as good as when your 80. #wearscandinavian   

For this project i have selected seven types that can fit for the summer, fall and winter. And you wonder how we can offer luxury footwear under 200 $? In today's market prices have only been pushed upwards and upwards. By avoiding expensive marketing, middlemen and expensive shops can we be sure to keep costs down. After a bit of research I found that the expensive brands today almost ten doubles the price of leather out to the customer after all has got its slice of the pie. So our goal is to keep all our cost in the leather, production and give the customers a chance to buy some high luxury footwear. (Because today there is no shortage of leather). So the prices should reflect that!

Risks and challenges

The risk of the project is already been calculated and taken care of regarding to stay on time with delivery and keep the cost down.

The work i have in front of me now is keep making sure that all parts of the process is top quality. I daily speak with the factory in Almansa to keep track of the process and checking the quality.

But as we all now, there can be problems in the process like this that could slow us down. If so, i will personal keep you guys updated on the process.

So our goal is to keep all our cost in the leather, production and give the customers a chance to buy some high luxury footwear. (Because today there is no shortage of leather). So the prices should reflect that!Risks and challengesThe risk of the project is already been calculated and taken care of regarding to stay on time with delivery and keep the cost down.The work i have in front of me now is keep making sure that all parts of the process is top quality. I daily speak with the factory in Almansa to keep track of the process and checking the quality.But as we all now, there can be problems in the process like this that could slow us down. If so, i will personal keep you guys updated on the process.

story:
My name is Edward Coleman and I am a fashion designer located in Reno, Nevada.  I am originally from Arkansas and growing up, I was surrounded by many strong women who showed me how fashion literally had the power to transform a womans spirits.  I am inspired to create clothes that will make all women fell beautiful.  I attended the Arkansas School of Fashion in Little Rock, AR where I  trained under Jamelah Kamran.  In the past I have owned my own business in Little Rock and again in Reno doing design and custom work for clients and stores.  Design and Fashion are my soul.  Over the past year poured everything into my craft to be a better designer and get myself and my ideas out there.  This past June, I put my own fashion show on to showcase the current line I am working on, Sinister.  The concept of the line, Sinister, is that it combines asian influences with a retro sixties style that has been updated to be contemporary.  The majority of the line was recently showcased at the Reno Art Town Fashion Show which was hosted by super model Janice Dickinson, and she looked stunning in the royal blue gown that I designed for her to wear as the host of the show.   
I have a once in a lifetime opportunity to present my fashion line at the Concept New York Fashion week show this September.  Being able to showcase my line at New York Fashion week would mean that all my hard work, sleepless nights, worried days, and grim determination have paid off.  It quite literally is the apex of fashion shows in this country and every designer dreams of having their creations celebrated in the company of fashion legends.  I am honored to have been invited to present at it and now the only thing stopping me is the financial component.  If I can meet my goals here by August 15th, which is the deadline to sign up for NY Fashion Week as a participating designer,  I will be able to accept the invitation to present in a venue that has always been associated with the biggest names in fashion.
Thank you for being a part of this exciting journey and know that your friendship and support will be invaluable to me.  I am asking that you please also consider parternering with me and helping me get to NY Fashion Week.  Any contribution amount, big or small, will be instrumental in helping me reach my goals and if you have a busines, please contact me (my contact information may be found on my website www.edwardscolemandesigns.com) about some unique sponsorship opportunities available for this event.  This is an opportunity that I will not let pass without giving my all to achieve it.
 
The Cost for the trip breaks down as follows:
 
The entry fee ranges from $4300 to $4900.  Each designer must choose 2 times that they would like to present an then they are assigned one based on participation either their primary or secondary choice.  This fee covers everything associated with the production of the show; models, steamer services for the clothes, and hair and make up.
 
Currently Flights from Reno, NV to NYC are ranging from 450 to approximately 650 round trip.
 
Business sponsors will be included in the event information and can also donate for items for gift bags.

story:
For photographers, it's always about the image, so make sure yours is sharp!


 

Lilah Snow is about changing the way you carry your equipment by providing a top quality, genuine leather handbag for women, fitted with customisable padded panels within a removable padded box.


Combining fashion with function we aim to change the way the traditional camera bag is viewed and allow women (and eventually men) to express their individual style when carrying their camera either for work or play. 

 

 

The Bags

The exterior of the bag is full grain leather and the bag is lined with strong durable cotton. 

 

The removable inner box is padded with closed cell foam and has 6 padded panels (2 large, 4 small) which are able to be moved around inside the box and attach anywhere to the soft lining of the walls for full customisation.

 

Inner Dimensions of Box:

  • 17cm wide  (6.7 inches)

  • 28cm long  (11 inches)

  • 22cm deep  (8.7 inches)

This box will fit a gripped Pro Body and a 70-200mm lens unattached.

There are 2 external pockets with magnetic closures, each 18 x 12 cm (7.0 x 4.7 inches) in size which are able to carry two 77mm filters in their cases.

Internally there is one zippered pocket, 20 x 12 cm (7.9 x 4.7 inches) and two open pouches 8 x 12 and 12 x 12 cm in size.

There is a zippered compartment on the back of the bag, 26 x 21 cm (10.2 x 8.3 inches) which is large enough to fit a full sized iPad.


The bag comes with a padded cross-body strap for hands free shooting.

 

 


'Zoe'

This bag is smaller than Pippi with the internal foam box measuring approximately 28cm long x 15 cm wide and only 16cm high.

There are two separate pockets underneath the front flap measuring 11cm wide x 12 cm deep and 3 cm thick.

This bag comes with adjustable shoulder straps and a longer separate padded strap for carrying cross-body.

Internally there is one zippered pocket, 20 x 12 cm (7.9 x 4.7 inches) and two open pouches 8 x 12 and 12 x 12 cm in size.



 


The Next Step

I already have two designs manufactured to prototype stage and will continue to grow the range of styles and colours.  I have been working with a manufacturer for several months and they are ready to produce the order once the funds are in place. I am looking for funding to order my first production run in both styles and colours. 


Why start so small?

I am committed to making this project work and have elected to start with a small run to ensure that every single contributor receives their perk.  I will expand the project when the original target is met.

 

The Perks

 

  • As a great big thank you to all of you early backers, I would like to offer you a complete, genuine leather Lilah Snow Camera Handbag (RRP $300) for your contribution of $200.  This bag will be in the style 'Pippi' and in the colour Cayenne with light gold accents as shown. Some details of the bag may vary slightly from the prototype images. Shipping is included within Australia, but please add $30 post to NZ and $50 to anywhere else worldwide.
  • JUST ADDED! A complete, genuine leather Lilah Snow Camera Handbag (RRP $300) for your contribution of $200. This bag will be in the style 'Zoe' and in the colour shown with nickel accents. Some details of the bag may vary slightly from the prototype images. Shipping is included within Australia, but please add $30 post to NZ and $50 to anywhere else worldwide.

  • If you are not able to invest the full amount straight away, I would like to offer you a discount voucher to the value of $150 for a contribution of $100.  This will be redeemable via our online store and will be valid throughout the first year of sales.  The voucher will be applied to the selling price at the time of purchase as a thank you for your early support.  You will also receive a Lilah Snow Branded USB flash drive.

 

  • Every little bit helps, and a $50 contribution will give you a $75 discount voucher which can be used at our online store, valid for 1 year.  With this contribution, you will also receive a Lilah Snow branded microfibre cleaning cloth for your lens or screen.

 

  • Contributions of $35 will receive an exclusive Lilah Snow Branded USB flash Drive cased in natural wood and a Lilah Snow Branded Microfibre Lens Cleaning cloth - to help improve your image! This cloth works well on computer, tablet and phone screens as well.

 

  • $1 contributions can be made in any amount to help get my project funded and will be received with a great big personal thank you!


Please note: you will be responsible for any customs/duty charges applied by your country to receive the perks.

     

    The Designer

    My name is Emma Anderson. I am an amateur photographer with a passion for creativity.  I have been working in my profession of Optometry for 17 years but have had a lifelong desire to work in a more creative field.  I am logical and reasonable and committed to success. I have had confidence in this project since it's inception 9 months ago and I am enjoying every single step along the way as I bring it to fruition.


    Please check out my Facebook page to see my journey up to this stage.


    It has been said that the best camera in the world is the one you have with you.

    Now you can be sure that your best camera is the one you have with you!



    I know a lot of you may have landed here via a link in Facebook or Twitter and so may not be familiar with the Indiegogo Platform.  The way this campaign is set up, your contribution is held by Indiegogo/Paypal until we reach our funding goal of $6000 and have enough to get the bags made. 

    If we don't reach the goal, your money will be refunded, but if we do reach the goal you get a gorgeous bag, or other perk, as well as bragging rights to being on the ground floor of a new company! 

    So tell your friends and share that link and make it happen!

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you are not a photographer, you can still help my project significantly by just sharing amongst your contacts, especially to the 'image conscious' people that you know. Chances are, if she is a woman and she takes photos, she will want one of these!

     

    Please share this link now: www.igg.me/at/lilahsnow

     

     

    Claim your perk now and help get this project funded!

The Designer
My name is Emma Anderson. I am an amateur photographer with a passion for creativity.  I have been working in my profession of Optometry for 17 years but have had a lifelong desire to work in a more creative field.  I am logical and reasonable and committed to success. I have had confidence in this project since it's inception 9 months ago and I am enjoying every single step along the way as I bring it to fruition.
Please check out my Facebook page to see my journey up to this stage.
It has been said that the best camera in the world is the one you have with you.
Now you can be sure that your best camera is the one you have with you!


I know a lot of you may have landed here via a link in Facebook or Twitter and so may not be familiar with the Indiegogo Platform.  The way this campaign is set up, your contribution is held by Indiegogo/Paypal until we reach our funding goal of $6000 and have enough to get the bags made.  
If we don't reach the goal, your money will be refunded, but if we do reach the goal you get a gorgeous bag, or other perk, as well as bragging rights to being on the ground floor of a new company!  
So tell your friends and share that link and make it happen!

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you are not a photographer, you can still help my project significantly by just sharing amongst your contacts, especially to the 'image conscious' people that you know. Chances are, if she is a woman and she takes photos, she will want one of these!
 
Please share this link now: www.igg.me/at/lilahsnow

 
 
Claim your perk now and help get this project funded!

story:
Still using disposable chopsticks?


PenstiX- Turns a pair of chopsticks into a pen.

From the Past to the Future

Chopsticks, a symbolic utensil invented from the eastern culture thousand years ago, has been growing in usage and broadly spreading across homes and restaurants nowadays. It has been designed as a perfect way for picking up foods. The number of people using chopsticks has seen a huge uptick as Asian cuisine goes mainstream. However, there are still 80 billion pairs of disposable chopsticks being thrown away around the world each year, causing serious environmental damage. 

Therefore, we have been working hard to develop a better solution. Its the next generation of chopsticks, or chopsticks 2.0.   It should be environmentally friendly,  easy to carry, seamless to use and clean. Most importantly,  it should be sleek and cool. Going great length to design and prototype the concept, we are glad to present you PenstiX, the next generation of chopsticks.  

Features

  • Compact design in portable size
  • 1 pair of full length chopsticks in 1 PenstiX
  • Only 12 seconds to assemble 
  • Tip lock design  
  • Rocking chopsticks holder
  • Easy cleaning 
  • Add stylus tips to get extra mileage out of your chopsticks

You Can Use PenstiX Anywhere!



 Bonus Perks: 

 We just added a special case to go with your Penstix!  Its made with renewable bamboo that also doubles as a stationary base for the office.  Makes a perfect present for the holiday season.



Tip-Lock Design

Tip-lock design can let chopsticks stay extended while in use

Tip-Lock Testing


Easy to Clean

PenstiX can be easily disassembled for cleaning.

Basic Cleaning Tutorial



Deep Cleaning Tutorial



Eat Eco-friendly, PenstiX is Your New Eco Chopsticks!

PenstiX is a pair of eco-friendly chopsticks, containing a whole pair of chopsticks (extended length: approx. 20cm). It's been minimally designed, and can be cleaned easily. 

Each part has been designed and tested thoroughly. For your safe consumption, it has even passed SGS international food safety standard testing. 

Design Process

Early sketches

Technical drawings

3D renderings

Prototypes and material tests

Final prototype, ready to produce!

Design in Accurate Size

We focus on product precision and durability. During the prototyping process, each component has been tested precisely. It has been designed accurately to make every part fit altogether. All components will be manufactured and assembled in Taipei, Taiwan. After testing a huge amount of prototypes, we have confident and are ready to provide you the best product in highest quality while the funding reaches our goal!

Specification 

PenstiX + Stylus

Carry your chopsticks with a stylus in it! 

For people who often use stylus on their touch screen, we offer you another option by combining PenstiX with stylus tips. Like no other stylus, PenstiX stylus tips is exchangeable and can be added to your PenstiX easily! From now on, you won't forget to take your stylus with you!  

Exchangeable Stylus Tips

All caps are exchangeable. PenstiX stylus has 2 tips (7mm & 5.5mm) for exchange. 

3 + 1 Colors For Your Choice

When PenstiX goes into production, we offer three colors for your choice- silver, red and black with metallic finish.

The special limited golden PenstiX edition can be yours now!

Each PenstiX has both laser engraved logo- "PenstiX" and company logo "YUAN" on it.


Rubber Chopsticks Aid -

The world's only chopsticks aid which fits on all types of chopsticks!


In order to help people learn chopsticks easily, we came up with the rubber chopsticks aid to go with your penstiX. The silicone rubber can wrap around all types of chopsticks, and pick up your foods easily.

Take along PenstiX for mountain climbing, business trip, eating out......anywhere.

Your best choice of food utensil while you are on a hike!

Let's Taste Green!

Hello Indiegogo, in the past few years, we've been designing various kind of chopsticks. But still, we need your help to make our new concept "PenstiX" a reality. Please support our campaign. And in turn, we can work together to save our environment.


Our Team

Yuan Design is a team that specializes in lifestyle designs, with focus on crafting eco-friendly chopsticks. In the past years, we have been innovating on various chopsticks that are ready at production level. Yuan Design is putting efforts on durable designs with hope in reducing environmental waste by creating eco-friendly products.
