story:
Ortenca is a camera bag brand. We go beyond a traditional camera bag to offer you a fashionable stylish accessory with a vintage/hipster look to it.

Note: Our bags are currently available at a special launch price at Indiegogo. Select a perk on the right to pre-order your Ortenca Bag.

Ortenca is defined by stylish fashionable high quality camera bags. We have dedicated 11 months to designing over 50 camera bags, as well as researching and testing materials until we finally came up with the perfect bag.

We have designed two Ortenca Bags models. A small bag, to carry on a casual photographic escapade, and a large bag to carry a photographic equipment set including a 15” laptop.


Both models are made out of high quality leather with vegetable waterproof tan colored canvas. The leather is treated to have a naturally aged look. The canvas has wax treatment to make a semi-rigid waterproof bag to protect your equipment against the elements.

The interior compartments are fully customizable to suit your needs and fit the contents of the bag like a glove. Both bags are covered with a thick layer of insulating material to protect the equipment against shock and drops. 

We use reinforced ergonomic padded leather straps designed to easily carry the weight comfortably. Our bags are thoughtfully designed to the finest detail, such as our logo engraved in leather both on the strap and a small panel in the lower right corner of the bag.


The bags feature high quality metallic and magnetic parts for closures and clasps, finished in a beautiful aged color. The magnetic clasps have been carefully designed to provide comfortable easy access to the contents of the bag.

We have designed each bag to be stylish and practical, with waterproof flaps to protect the equipment from rain and snow. It features several pockets and compartments to store batteries, chargers and caps.

We have designed two Ortenca Bags models


TheMini: An everyday stylish and practical light camera bag, perfect for the city and daily photographic escapades.

Ortenca15: A beautiful comfortable bag, capable of fitting a complete photographic equipment set, including a 15” laptop. It’s perfect to be taken as hand luggage when travelling by air.



A smart, light and discrete everyday camera bag with enough room to fit up to one camera and two lenses, featuring many pockets to carry anything you need. Available in chocolate colour.

Buy Ortenca TheMini

Main Features:

·  Ideal to carry two lenses and one SLR body

·  Adaptable/Removable inner panels

·  High quality leather and waterproof canvas

·  Magnetic clasps, mobile phone pouch and multiple pockets

·  Lined interiors

Comfortable adaptable messenger bag designed to suit your needs, perfect for trips. It can safely and comfortably carry one photographic equipment set complete with a laptop. Features many compartments for lenses, cameras, iPad, notebooks…

Available in chocolate, matching our smaller bag, TheMini.

Buy Ortenca15

Features:

·  Ideal to carry a full photographic equipment set complete with a 15” laptop

·  Adaptable/Removable inner panels

·  High quality Italian leather and waterproof canvas

·  Magnetic clasps, mobile phone pouch and SD card compartments

·  Lined interiors 

Our bags are thoughtfully designed to the finest detail, such as our logo engraved in leather both on the strap and a small panel in the lower right corner of the bag.

Metallic and magnetic parts with a beautiful aged gold finish.

Mobile phone pouch and SD memory card holders. 

Ortenca Bags logo engraved in leather over the beautiful vivid colored inner lining.


Download the Ortenca's IndieGogo project information in other languages.

 Deutsch    Español    Italiano    Coming soon

Why this Project?

A year ago I decided to buy a new camera bag. I was looking for something that would not only protect my equipment, but would also look stylish, casual and distressed. I was disappointed to find that most of the bags designed to carry photographic equipment have a lot of room for improvement when it comes to aesthetics and looks. I decided it was the time to create my own bag, an appealing beautiful bag that would protect my equipment.

What makes Ortenca Bags so special?

We worked on the perfect bag to our standards through almost one year. There were over 50 designs made and many materials to assess in order to find the perfect design. We are sure you’re going to love them!

Can these bags protect my photographic equipment like traditional bags?

Yes! Ortenca Bags are designed to protect your camera and photographic equipment. Featuring waterproof canvas and a special isolating anti-shock material, Ortenca Bags are designed to protect your equipment from shock and the elements.

How do I choose my perfect size?

The Ortenca Bags are available in 2 sizes:  

TheMini: An everyday stylish and practical light camera bag, perfect for the city and daily photographic escapades.

Ortenca15: A beautiful comfortable bag, capable of fitting a complete photographic equipment set, including a 15” laptop. It’s perfect to be taken as hand luggage when travelling by air.

Are Ortenca available in other colours or styles?

Currently, Ortenca Bags are only available in chocolate. However, we plan to broaden our collection with new colors and designs. Follow us to get updates and the latest news about Ortenca Bags!

What are you going to do with the money you raise?

We already have the designs, fabric, leather and materials. We have constructed several prototypes and have finally gotten to our final design, but we still need €5000 to get this project going.

Help Ortenca Bags succeed and we’ll return the favor by sending you an amazing camera bag at a much lower price than you would ever find at a store.

Once we reach our goal, we’ll make your bags and ship them as quickly as possible. Any additional funds raised will go towards the production and expansion of our current line to include new colors, designs and sizes, as well as a few surprises to come.

Can I track my package?

Yes you can. With an extra €10 we will ensure your package is tracked. Please note: if you have already purchased Ortenca but forgot to add €10, you can still do so by clicking “contribute now” and entering 10€. You will receive a notification or tracking number immediately. We will contact you after the campaign is over with details about your delivery.

When will I get my Ortenca Bag?

Our manufacturing partners are standing by and excited to start producing Ortenca Bags. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work.

We need 20 days to receive the funds we raise. You can expect to have your Ortenca Bag delivered to you within 2 months after the campaign has ended. We will do everything we can in order to get your product to you as soon as possible.

What if I don't like them?

In the unlikely event that you do not like your Ortenca Bag, we stand by our product 100%. If you aren't happy with your Ortenca Bag, just reach out to us at ortencabags@gmail.com and we'll arrange for an exchange or refund within the first 30 days after shipping.

I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?

Yes you can. Please email ortencabags@gmail.com with the subject: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

story:
Cliquez ici pour voir la vidéo sous-titrée en français, ou dans l'onglet galerie, n'oubliez pas d'activer les sous-titres en bas à droite de la vidéo Youtube.


An innovative fashion 24h watch making yourself exclusive and different.

"Can we change the usual perception of time ?"

As designers, we always have to reinvent ourselves to reinvent the world we live in.

We are Benjamin and Maxime, two young designers from the You&Me Design Agency in Bordeaux (France) and we decided to change our relation to time.

Vasco Watches intend to bring up a totally different way to read Time with an innovative concept: a 24h hand-free watch, crafted with the best of french savoir-faire. Time precision is about 15 minutes.

This new collection of watches is designed in the highest accuracy in term of details and finishes, but also in term of concept and newness.

After a year of project conception, working prototypes are ready ! We're making this crowdfunding campaign in order to make Vasco come true: we need you.



"Peut-on changer notre perception habituelle du temps?"

En tant que designers, nous devons sans arrêt nous réinventer pour réinventer le monde dans lequel nous vivons.

Nous sommes Benjamin et Maxime, deux jeunes designers bordelais de l'agence de design You&Me et nous avons décidé de changer notre relation au temps.

Vasco Watches souhaite amener une façon totalement différente de lire l'heure grâce à un concept innovant: une montre 24h sans aiguille, fabriquée avec le meilleur du savoir-faire français. La précision est de l'ordre de 15 minutes.

Cette nouvelle collection de montres a été conçue avec la plus grande attention en terme de détails et de finitions, ainsi que sur l'intention de nouveauté et de concept.

Après un an de travail de design et de conception, les prototypes fonctionnels sont prêts ! Nous avons mis en place cette campagne de crowdfunding afin de réunir assez de fonds pour lancer Vasco en série et que ce projet devienne réalité: nous avons besoin de vous.



Vasco Watches doesn't really exist yet as a company. We know that with your help, this can be true very soon. We conceived the watches from the sketches to the final prototypes. It means Vasco can be produce in a short delay. 

You have the opportunity to invest into our project by getting the watch before everyone. 

First 50 backers will have a bigger discount, a letterpress giftcard for Christmas and a numbered watch ! Time to choose the good one.

Vasco Watches n'existe pas encore réellement en tant qu'entreprise. Nous savons qu'avec votre aide, cette idée pourra devenir réalité très bientôt. Nous avons conçus ces montres depuis les premiers croquis jusqu'aux prototypes finaux. Ce que nous voulons dire, c'est que Vasco peut être produit en peu de temps.

Vous avez l'opportunité d'investir dans notre projet en achetant la montre avant tout le monde.

Les 50 premiers acheteurs auront une remise plus importante, une carte de Noël en letterpress et une montre numérotée ! Il est temps de choisir la bonne.

The first collection is called "North". We love compass and old exploration instruments, this is where we wanted to go first. It's also the direction to take if you want to read time on Vasco. 

Dial is a 2x12h, like a.m and p.m time reading.

La première collection se nomme "North". Nous adorons les boussoles et tous les anciens instruments d'exploration. C'était l'univers vers lequel nous voulions nous projeter en premier et c'est également la direction à prendre si vous souhaitez lire l'heure sur Vasco. 

Le cadran est en 2x12h, comme la lecture en a.m et p.m nord-américaine.

Second collection is "Cape", refering to navigational equipment and to water world. The dial is a real 24h plate looking like old wooden rudders.

La deuxième collection "Cape" est un hommage à la navigation et au monde nautique: le cadran rappelle un gouvernail et se dessine autour de 24h.


Inaugurated in 1999 by the APCI (Agency for the Promotion of Industrial Creation), the Design Observeur is an annual exhibition that aims to highlight and reward a selection of the best creations resulting from the collaboration between companies and designers.

The Observeur du Design awards annually the Stars of the Observeur and some special Prizes handed by our partners (Ministry of Industry, City of Paris, Le Lieu du Design, OSEO, INPI and others …).

The Observer has the label « international competition » of ICSID (International Council of Societies of Industrial Design), a referent institution in design.

Organisé par l’APCI depuis 1999, l’Observeur du design est ouvert aux entreprises, designers, écoles et collectivités dans tous les secteurs d’activité. Il repère les réalisations innovantes grâce au design – qu’elles soient commercialisées ou non – auxquelles il décerne le Label de l’Observeur du design.

Il récompense chaque année l’excellence par l’attribution du prix français du design, les Étoiles du design et des récompensesdécernées par nos partenaires : Prix du ministère du Redressement productif, de la Ville de Paris, de Bpifrance, de l’INPI et d’Autodesk.

L’Observeur du design est la seule compétition française qui bénéficie du label « international competition » de l’ICSID / IDA (International Council of Societies of Industrial Design – a Partner of the International Design Alliance), institution de référence en matière de design.



We are also publicated on the exhibition book: "Instead of looking for seconds, minutes or hours scrolling away, this watch smelling good adventure and cut into urban exploration gets rid of the traditionnal hands in aid of a dial, giving the day tempo."

Nous sommes également publié dans le livre consacré à l'exposition et aux labellisés: "Plutôt que de donner à voir des secondes, des minutes et des heures qui défilent, cette montre fleurant l'aventure et taillée pour explorer l'univers urbain fait disparaître les aiguilles traditionnelles au profit d'un cadran qui donne le tempo d'une journée entière."




We've been working in our own design agency You&Me since three years now. We've learnt a lot with our clients and several projects totally differents. Vasco was really our intern project, something that we wanted from the beginning of our business adventure. 

But a dream like this one can't be made alone, and few partners joined us to make Vasco going farther and farther, and this is not over yet !

Nous travaillons dans notre propre agence de design You&Me depuis trois ans maintenant. Nous avons beaucoup appris aux côtés de nos clients et de projets totalement différents. Vasco a vraiment été notre projet interne, quelque chose que nous voulions faire depuis le début de notre aventure entrepreneuriale. Mais un rêve comme celui-ci ne peut se réaliser seul, et c'est pourquoi quelques partenaires nous ont rejoins pour pousser Vasco de plus en plus loin, et ce n'est pas encore fini !

Vasco Watches co-founders and design managers : 

Benjamin Chamfeuil and Maxime Pousset 


A BIG THANKS TO / UN GRAND MERCI À:


Abaque Industrie • Sweet prototypes and research : http://www.abaqueindustrie.com

Dolly Production • Amazing videos : http://www.wearedolly.fr

Riverside Press • Awesome printing house : http://www.riversidepress.fr

Horel Store • Wonderful watch store : http://www.horel-store.com

Osez Bordeaux • Best town ever: http://www.darebordeaux.com

Digital Campus • Marvelous students : http://www.digital-campus.fr

Special thanks to Ben Gouaud, the fantastic web developer ever.

Finally, thank you everyone for watching our project. We hope you like it and you can share it on the web, talk to people around you, invest in Vasco and keep this dream rockin' on !

Merci à tous de nous soutenir. Nous espérons que ce projet vous plait et que vous pourrez le partager sur Internet, en parler autour de vous, et que vous croyez suffisamment en nous pour que ce rêve prenne vie !

More to come (pictures, technic details, FAQ) / Plus à venir ( photos, détails techniques, FAQ).

Thank you and keep exploring Time,

Benjamin and Maxime.


Crédits:

Video by Bertrand Bouchez, Dolly Production

Watch and conception Pictures by Iveta Kulhavá

For retails, please contact us at hello@vasco-watches.com

Pour les ventes en boutique, contactez-nous à hello@vasco-watches.com
story_txt:
Cliquez ici pour voir la vidéo sous-titrée en français, ou dans l'onglet galerie, n'oubliez pas d'activer les sous-titres en bas à droite de la vidéo Youtube.


An innovative fashion 24h watch making yourself exclusive and different.

"Can we change the usual perception of time ?"

As designers, we always have to reinvent ourselves to reinvent the world we live in.
We are Benjamin and Maxime, two young designers from the You&Me Design Agency in Bordeaux (France) and we decided to change our relation to time.
Vasco Watches intend to bring up a totally different way to read Time with an innovative concept: a 24h hand-free watch, crafted with the best of french savoir-faire. Time precision is about 15 minutes.
This new collection of watches is designed in the highest accuracy in term of details and finishes, but also in term of concept and newness.
After a year of project conception, working prototypes are ready ! We're making this crowdfunding campaign in order to make Vasco come true: we need you.
"Peut-on changer notre perception habituelle du temps?"
En tant que designers, nous devons sans arrêt nous réinventer pour réinventer le monde dans lequel nous vivons.
Nous sommes Benjamin et Maxime, deux jeunes designers bordelais de l'agence de design You&Me et nous avons décidé de changer notre relation au temps.
Vasco Watches souhaite amener une façon totalement différente de lire l'heure grâce à un concept innovant: une montre 24h sans aiguille, fabriquée avec le meilleur du savoir-faire français. La précision est de l'ordre de 15 minutes.
Cette nouvelle collection de montres a été conçue avec la plus grande attention en terme de détails et de finitions, ainsi que sur l'intention de nouveauté et de concept.
Après un an de travail de design et de conception, les prototypes fonctionnels sont prêts ! Nous avons mis en place cette campagne de crowdfunding afin de réunir assez de fonds pour lancer Vasco en série et que ce projet devienne réalité: nous avons besoin de vous.







Vasco Watches doesn't really exist yet as a company. We know that with your help, this can be true very soon. We conceived the watches from the sketches to the final prototypes. It means Vasco can be produce in a short delay. 

You have the opportunity to invest into our project by getting the watch before everyone. 
First 50 backers will have a bigger discount, a letterpress giftcard for Christmas and a numbered watch ! Time to choose the good one.
Vasco Watches n'existe pas encore réellement en tant qu'entreprise. Nous savons qu'avec votre aide, cette idée pourra devenir réalité très bientôt. Nous avons conçus ces montres depuis les premiers croquis jusqu'aux prototypes finaux. Ce que nous voulons dire, c'est que Vasco peut être produit en peu de temps.
Vous avez l'opportunité d'investir dans notre projet en achetant la montre avant tout le monde.
Les 50 premiers acheteurs auront une remise plus importante, une carte de Noël en letterpress et une montre numérotée ! Il est temps de choisir la bonne.


The first collection is called "North". We love compass and old exploration instruments, this is where we wanted to go first. It's also the direction to take if you want to read time on Vasco. Dial is a 2x12h, like a.m and p.m time reading.
La première collection se nomme "North". Nous adorons les boussoles et tous les anciens instruments d'exploration. C'était l'univers vers lequel nous voulions nous projeter en premier et c'est également la direction à prendre si vous souhaitez lire l'heure sur Vasco. Le cadran est en 2x12h, comme la lecture en a.m et p.m nord-américaine.

Second collection is "Cape", refering to navigational equipment and to water world. The dial is a real 24h plate looking like old wooden rudders.
La deuxième collection "Cape" est un hommage à la navigation et au monde nautique: le cadran rappelle un gouvernail et se dessine autour de 24h.




Inaugurated in 1999 by the APCI (Agency for the Promotion of Industrial Creation), the Design Observeur is an annual exhibition that aims to highlight and reward a selection of the best creations resulting from the collaboration between companies and designers.
The Observeur du Design awards annually the Stars of the Observeur and some special Prizes handed by our partners (Ministry of Industry, City of Paris, Le Lieu du Design, OSEO, INPI and others …).
The Observer has the label « international competition » of ICSID (International Council of Societies of Industrial Design), a referent institution in design.
Organisé par l’APCI depuis 1999, l’Observeur du design est ouvert aux entreprises, designers, écoles et collectivités dans tous les secteurs d’activité. Il repère les réalisations innovantes grâce au design – qu’elles soient commercialisées ou non – auxquelles il décerne le Label de l’Observeur du design.
Il récompense chaque année l’excellence par l’attribution du prix français du design, les Étoiles du design et des récompensesdécernées par nos partenaires : Prix du ministère du Redressement productif, de la Ville de Paris, de Bpifrance, de l’INPI et d’Autodesk.
L’Observeur du design est la seule compétition française qui bénéficie du label « international competition » de l’ICSID / IDA (International Council of Societies of Industrial Design – a Partner of the International Design Alliance), institution de référence en matière de design.

We are also publicated on the exhibition book: "Instead of looking for seconds, minutes or hours scrolling away, this watch smelling good adventure and cut into urban exploration gets rid of the traditionnal hands in aid of a dial, giving the day tempo."
Nous sommes également publié dans le livre consacré à l'exposition et aux labellisés: "Plutôt que de donner à voir des secondes, des minutes et des heures qui défilent, cette montre fleurant l'aventure et taillée pour explorer l'univers urbain fait disparaître les aiguilles traditionnelles au profit d'un cadran qui donne le tempo d'une journée entière."


We've been working in our own design agency You&Me since three years now. We've learnt a lot with our clients and several projects totally differents. Vasco was really our intern project, something that we wanted from the beginning of our business adventure. 
But a dream like this one can't be made alone, and few partners joined us to make Vasco going farther and farther, and this is not over yet !
Nous travaillons dans notre propre agence de design You&Me depuis trois ans maintenant. Nous avons beaucoup appris aux côtés de nos clients et de projets totalement différents. Vasco a vraiment été notre projet interne, quelque chose que nous voulions faire depuis le début de notre aventure entrepreneuriale. Mais un rêve comme celui-ci ne peut se réaliser seul, et c'est pourquoi quelques partenaires nous ont rejoins pour pousser Vasco de plus en plus loin, et ce n'est pas encore fini !
Vasco Watches co-founders and design managers : 
Benjamin Chamfeuil and Maxime Pousset 
A BIG THANKS TO / UN GRAND MERCI À:

Abaque Industrie • Sweet prototypes and research : http://www.abaqueindustrie.com
Dolly Production • Amazing videos : http://www.wearedolly.fr
Riverside Press • Awesome printing house : http://www.riversidepress.fr
Horel Store • Wonderful watch store : http://www.horel-store.com
Osez Bordeaux • Best town ever: http://www.darebordeaux.com
Digital Campus • Marvelous students : http://www.digital-campus.fr
Special thanks to Ben Gouaud, the fantastic web developer ever.
Finally, thank you everyone for watching our project. We hope you like it and you can share it on the web, talk to people around you, invest in Vasco and keep this dream rockin' on !
Merci à tous de nous soutenir. Nous espérons que ce projet vous plait et que vous pourrez le partager sur Internet, en parler autour de vous, et que vous croyez suffisamment en nous pour que ce rêve prenne vie !
More to come (pictures, technic details, FAQ) / Plus à venir ( photos, détails techniques, FAQ).
Thank you and keep exploring Time,
Benjamin and Maxime.Crédits:Video by Bertrand Bouchez, Dolly ProductionWatch and conception Pictures by Iveta KulhaváFor retails, please contact us at hello@vasco-watches.comPour les ventes en boutique, contactez-nous à hello@vasco-watches.com

story:
Welcome to KcLacs!

http://www.KcLacs.com

FAQ: Please Read!!

- Shoe size will be collected after the campaign. Mens sizes 7-15 available and they run in whole sizes with medium width. If you wear a half, order the size down.

- Some common questions about the campaign:

What is a pledge?

- Because your "pledge" or purchase is what funds the company it is considered a pledge instead of a purchase. You are pledging in exchange for the item selected.

- If total goal is not reached all pledges are returned to individuals.

You WILL either receive your product or your money
 

- August shipping....really?

This one is tough and nobody wants to get these out sooner than I do. After the campaign there is production and distribution. Instead of walking into a store, purchasing and leaving with a good you are purchasing a product and at the same time helping to create a new company. Instead of bringing on a single investor you fund the company by selling to individuals that are interested in your product and would like to see it succeed! It's about buying a product and at the same time contributing to a worthwhile cause and you receive a discounted price for doing so. 

-The process consists of metal molds being made for each size.

- Final production sample made for each size.

- 1500+ shoes manufactured.

- Shipped to ocean liner.

- Freight shipped by barge over ocean.

- Sorted, boxed and final distribution in the U.S.

Although it's a structured process it still does require a decent amount of time allotment.



-The initial launch color scheme is black and red. Pictured below.

 

With a successful launch there will be more colors added in the future.


Hope this clears up a lot of concerns that I have received.

 

Thanks! 

KcLacs


KcLacs Story!

Over five years ago I set out to create the most comfortable casual slip-on shoe possible. I started with a house-shoe and began combining what I believe to be the most comfortable aspects of athletic shoes, casual shoes and of course the relaxed slip on style shoes (slides). Today I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to join the KcLacs family and own the original style in the KcLacs collection, the Chauffeur.

Lacs: Luxury - Attitude - Comfort - Style

There have been a ton of obstacles along the way but as of today there's a high quality manufacture lined up, an awesome product available and only one missing piece to make KcLacs happen, and that's you! By pledging today you are joining a dream that I have pursued relentlessly for over five years because I believed in the project and the vision from day one. I need to fill the gap in the shoe market with an athletically styled, extremely comfortable casual slip-on shoe.

Day One.

 Starting with a pair of house shoes that I used to slip insoles in for added comfort, I thought I created the perfect combination for those of us that get up last minute for class or just want a convenient slip on shoe for daily casual wear. Although they were comfortable they would wear out quickly because they were not actually meant for daily outside wear, plus you would receive at least a few looks a day for wearing house shoes in public. That's how the original idea was born but I wanted to take it to the highest level possible and create the most comfortable slip on shoe possible with added style and great quality. That became the original foundation on which KcLacs was born.

Original Sketches


Back to Photoshop.

In the beginning to prove to myself I would fully pursue this project I would take a drawing around to stores and try to gain interest in KcLacs. Through the process I gained a lot of insight into the different aspects people were looking for in the footwear they were purchasing. During the process there have been multiple overseas suppliers, designers, photo editors and others that have contributed to the project. By dealing with many different people I have been able to put in place the correct companies and individuals that will allow the design, manufacturing and distribution to take place as smoothly as possible while maintaining high quality standards.

KcLacs Headquarters (AKA-Dining Room)

Making Progress.

I have sorted through unlimited materials, spent countless hours with professionals on Photoshop designing and redesigning all aspects of logos, insoles, air-sole dimensions etc. to formulate the right combination to bring together my original vision of KcLacs. It's a very slow process but when you see it continually gaining momentum it keeps you excited and motivated to get to the next step in hopes of one day being able to share your product with the world.

My vision for a KcLacs customer is someone that enjoys living an active lifestyle that is looking for a casual shoe with athletic appeal. This could be an athlete before the game that wears KcLacs to the event while carrying their athletic shoes in the track bag, someone on vacation that is relaxing poolside and prefers a comfortable slip-on shoe, or something for the gym while lifting weights and other activities.

When setting out on a project you learn to do a lot on your own with no previous experience or your vision will never continue moving forward. Learning to network in order to gain industry contacts has been the most valuable asset I have added to my personal attributes. I'm very proud to tell people interested in KcLacs about Otabo , which is who oversees the manufacturing and quality control of KcLacs. Otabo represents a high quality demand in process and product. They are proud to promote their ability to handcraft high end dress shoes and because of their attention to detail and standards I knew they were a perfect fit for KcLacs.

The current sample shown in the video and below  is the final pre-production sample provided by the factory. This means that all dimensions and materials have been confirmed. For the final production sample and production run, all logos and details will be fine tuned for styling and all colors fine tuned to match. I have had the samples for over 5 months doing a variation of revisions and color combinations to find what makes KcLacs really stand out!

The past five years have been dedicated to developing an awesome product that I'm proud to offer to you and my family and friends while creating a KcLacs family with a great foundation on which to build. The last three months have been dedicated to getting the word out about the initial launch and gain the interest of potential backers that understand the style and overall vision. Now that you are here and have a good understanding about what KcLacs is all about, I hope you decide to pledge today and contribute to what can become an awesome company made up of unique backers that all come together to create a new Kclacs family.

I have had the samples for over 5 months doing a variation of revisions and color combinations to find what makes KcLacs really stand out!The past five years have been dedicated to developing an awesome product that I'm proud to offer to you and my family and friends while creating a KcLacs family with a great foundation on which to build. story:
Connect with us on Facebook, Instagram or visit our Website.

 

 

Hi! We're Miami Watch Company (MWC). We are a team of horology masters and creative designers from sunny South Florida.Between all managing partners, there is approximately 20 years of combined professional experience in watchmaking and design. We’ve been manufacturing watches and developing individual watch components for other companies and individual entrepreneurs for many years.We have multiple watch brands, the most successful of them all being Amir Watches. We’ve decided to launch Viperidae watch series through crowdfunding to allow our clients to help us bring this work of art to life and create a tradition of quality & unique watchmaking. Our next project is to bring one of our own timepiece creations to life and we are confident that our background, creative drive and meticulous attention to detail will result in a quality product. But we need your help!

 

 

Miami Watch Company

pursued 3 objectives:

 To assemble watches that reliably serve their main purpose to always display a precise time;

 To apply meticulous attention to every detail that would make our timepieces durable and classy;

 To keep the watches affordable 

 

Through endless trial and error, combinations of materials and technologies, we have finally found a perfect balance between quality and price. The result is the Viperidae Watch Series. 

Mounted with scrupulous attention to every detail, Viperidae Watch Series are created to fulfill the requirements of those who are looking for an intelligent purchase and are able to appreciate the functionality and craftsmanship of our timepieces. Our watch collection is a perfect combination of powerful and reliable technologies. 

  

We have named our series after specific snakes since we share common characteristic. Both are vicious, relentless and uncompromised. 

MWC incorporates these attributes into the design of our timepieces, included in these five options:

 

Each strap has a unique number so that everyone will be able to specify exactly which strap they would like with their watch when placing an order.

 

  

 

 

 

Case

  • 3 parts case, 316L surgery steel
  • Solid screw down caseback, 42mm Diameter
  • Bezel – 2 step
  • Crown – screw down “onion” crown
  • Scratch resistant Sapphire crystal that allows an optimum clarity of the dial (9 moh hardness)
  • Sapphire crystal with double anti reflective coating inside, rotatable reflector ring made of ceramic and filled with Vintage Super Luminova.
  • Waterproof – 20ATM

Mechanism

  • Self-winding Automatic NH35 movement
  • Functions – central hour, minute and seconds hands

Dial

  • High gloss finishing, applied indexes filled with Vintage Super Luminova
  • 3 Hands filled with Super-Luminova: Hour, Minute, Second

Bracelet

  • Heavy duty canvas strap and several other leather 
  • Strap options are available which you will be able to select prior to your purchase
  • Stainless steel dornbuckle

 

 

All of our past experience has been with the development of key watch components for other corporate and individual clients. After many years of producing quality timepieces for others, we have finally decided that it is time for us to bring one of our own to life. We have launched a line of classic timepieces called Amir Watches which currently is in high demand in Central Asian countries.

 

These images illustrate the Renderings vs. Actual Photos of the watches. As you can see, there is little to no difference whatsoever between the renderings that we envision and the final product which we produce. As part of the standard process we always start with prototypes and produce working samples for our watches. 

 

All watches purchased from the Miami Watch Company come with a 24 month manufacturer’s warranty. This warranty covers material production defects concerning the watch, strap and movement. It does not cover damage caused through misuse or physical force. Your warranty will be valid from the date of purchase and need to be registered in our database through this form.

  

We will be using the funds that we raise to execute our first production run! We highly value our customers’ trust in us and, therefore, will be constantly updating this campaign with the latest news of the process! We need to raise $20,000 to cover the cost of manufacturing and logistics of our timepieces to our backers or it will take much longer to bring this work of art to life. So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we are offering substantial discount on our timepieces and an opportunity to be one of the very few to own our watches. Your contribution will help us start the manufacturing process much sooner and faster, and further, it will help us reward our supporters with discounted pricing and streamlined delivery. Thank you!

 

  


We have planned our supply network and logistics. All we need now is your help to fund our first production run! We highly value any help in the realization of our project, whether it is material or simply sharing our campaign with your friends via Social Media and help us spread the word.

  

When will I get my watches?

We will ship the watches to our supporters by mid-end of March 2015. Since we have a production experience of 20 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion. Please refer to our Project Timeline section for more details leading up to the delivery of your Viperidae watches. We will also keep you updated on the progress via our Indiegogo page.

How will my funds be used?

Thank you for asking. We will be using the funds to execute our first production run! We highly value our customers’ trust in us and, therefore, will be constantly updating this campaign with the latest news of the process!

Are MWC watches unisex?

Yes. All of our models are universal and can be worn by any gender or age.

Are the Miami Watch Company models scratch resistant?

Yes! Our watches use Sapphire crystal that is three times harder than mineral crystal. It is made of an extremely durable synthetic material that makes it shatterproof and scratch resistant.

What type of movement mechanism do MWC watches use?

All of our watches use only self-winding Seiko NH35 with 24 Jewels and 21,600a/H, 42 Hours of Power reserve.

Are MWC watches waterproof?

Yes! They are 20 ATM waterproof. MWC watches can be even worn while swimming (However, proceed at your own discretion while scuba diving).

How long does my warranty last?

Your MWC watches are warrantied for a period of 24 months from the date of the purchase.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we can directly ship your MWC watches to almost every country. Continental US will enjoy Free shipping.

What’s your return policy?

We guarantee our watches to be free of any manufacturing defects and will accept any defective item for a refund or exchange. We will issue a refund within 14 days of purchase in the form and amount tendered for the original transaction (Returns must be unworn, in the state you received them, and in the original packaging).

My question isn't answered here. How do I contact Miami Watch Company team if I have more questions?

Feel free to email info@miamiwatch.company. We try to reply as quickly as we can, usually within 12 hours.

Bezel – 2 step
Crown – screw down “onion” crown
Scratch resistant Sapphire crystal that allows an optimum clarity of the dial (9 moh hardness)
Sapphire crystal with double anti reflective coating inside, rotatable reflector ring made of ceramic and filled with Vintage Super Luminova.
Waterproof – 20ATM
Mechanism

Self-winding Automatic NH35 movement
Functions – central hour, minute and seconds hands
Dial

High gloss finishing, applied indexes filled with Vintage Super Luminova
3 Hands filled with Super-Luminova: Hour, Minute, Second
Bracelet

Heavy duty canvas strap and several other leather 
Strap options are available which you will be able to select prior to your purchase
Stainless steel dornbuckle
 

 

All of our past experience has been with the development of key watch components for other corporate and individual clients. After many years of producing quality timepieces for others, we have finally decided that it is time for us to bring one of our own to life. We have launched a line of classic timepieces called Amir Watches which currently is in high demand in Central Asian countries.
 
These images illustrate the Renderings vs. Actual Photos of the watches. As you can see, there is little to no difference whatsoever between the renderings that we envision and the final product which we produce. As part of the standard process we always start with prototypes and produce working samples for our watches. 



 

All watches purchased from the Miami Watch Company come with a 24 month manufacturer’s warranty. This warranty covers material production defects concerning the watch, strap and movement. It does not cover damage caused through misuse or physical force. Your warranty will be valid from the date of purchase and need to be registered in our database through this form.
  

We will be using the funds that we raise to execute our first production run! We highly value our customers’ trust in us and, therefore, will be constantly updating this campaign with the latest news of the process! We need to raise $20,000 to cover the cost of manufacturing and logistics of our timepieces to our backers or it will take much longer to bring this work of art to life. So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we are offering substantial discount on our timepieces and an opportunity to be one of the very few to own our watches. Your contribution will help us start the manufacturing process much sooner and faster, and further, it will help us reward our supporters with discounted pricing and streamlined delivery. Thank you!
 


  



We have planned our supply network and logistics. All we need now is your help to fund our first production run! We highly value any help in the realization of our project, whether it is material or simply sharing our campaign with your friends via Social Media and help us spread the word.
  

When will I get my watches?
We will ship the watches to our supporters by mid-end of March 2015. Since we have a production experience of 20 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion. Please refer to our Project Timeline section for more details leading up to the delivery of your Viperidae watches. We will also keep you updated on the progress via our Indiegogo page.
How will my funds be used?
Thank you for asking. We will be using the funds to execute our first production run! We highly value our customers’ trust in us and, therefore, will be constantly updating this campaign with the latest news of the process!
Are MWC watches unisex?
Yes. All of our models are universal and can be worn by any gender or age.
Are the Miami Watch Company models scratch resistant?
Yes! Our watches use Sapphire crystal that is three times harder than mineral crystal. It is made of an extremely durable synthetic material that makes it shatterproof and scratch resistant.
What type of movement mechanism do MWC watches use?
All of our watches use only self-winding Seiko NH35 with 24 Jewels and 21,600a/H, 42 Hours of Power reserve.
Are MWC watches waterproof?
Yes! They are 20 ATM waterproof. MWC watches can be even worn while swimming (However, proceed at your own discretion while scuba diving).
How long does my warranty last?
Your MWC watches are warrantied for a period of 24 months from the date of the purchase.
Do you ship internationally?
Yes, we can directly ship your MWC watches to almost every country. Continental US will enjoy Free shipping.
What’s your return policy?
We guarantee our watches to be free of any manufacturing defects and will accept any defective item for a refund or exchange. We will issue a refund within 14 days of purchase in the form and amount tendered for the original transaction (Returns must be unworn, in the state you received them, and in the original packaging).
My question isn't answered here. How do I contact Miami Watch Company team if I have more questions?
Feel free to email info@miamiwatch.company. We try to reply as quickly as we can, usually within 12 hours.

story:
Short Summary

Atelier West started out as nothing more than an idea, it began with the simple concept that clothing can change the world. 

I have always been intriugued by how the human mind works, what causes us to make certain decisions, are we truly a product of our environment and circumstance or are we free to create ourselves in the way we see fit? As an artist and designer my goal is to attempt to answer those questions by creating garments and accessories that create a dialog or forum for us to be able to talk about those questions in a way that seems natural and organic. Approaching fashion from a psychological and artistic perspective, that is Atelier West.

What We Need & What You Get

Unfortunately, it costs money to be able to create wearable art, but that's where you come in!

  • Now, first and foremost I would never expect anyone to support something I don't support myself which is why I set the target goal at the same amount that I have already invested into the brand myself, I just ask that you match my efforts.
  • In return for your support, you get to pick one (or multiple)  of the items I have designed specifically for this campaign. (limited edition pieces)
  • The funds from this company will allow us to create more freely by giving us the capital to source new fabrics, contract manufactures, outfit our new Philadelphia studio and market our products to a global audience.

The Impact

"What if Picasso never got the chance to paint?" 

By contributing to this campaign you are helping to build the foundation of a fashion house that will be around for decades to come and will change the landscape of fashion in the progress. If that last statement seems bold, I ask you to question yourself why? Before "Polo" there was just a boy from the Bronx named Ralph Lifshitz who later became Ralph Lauren. So why can't a boy from Philadelphia with a dream to change the world become just as iconic? There is no reason...

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge for us quite simply is a lack of capital necessary to create complete, and precise collections.

  • For the last 4 years of my life I have studied and researched countless aspects of the fashion industry from fabric sourcing, manufacturer sourcing, printing techniques, technical garment creation, cut and sew pattern making, the list goes on and on, and with that knowledge I am able to create garments that aren't just clothes but wearable art and an outward expression of emotion, I just need your help to make it happen.
  • The capital from this campaign will allow us to go from Idea to Item to Asset.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Follow @atelierdewest on instagram 
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Bow & Stern was established four years ago, since the beginning our core focus has been to create premium quality timepieces that are affordable and durable to ensure they last all life's adventures. 

Our promise has always been, if an issue arises with your timepiece, we will repair or replace the unit.

All of our timepieces are assembled by hand to ensure precision and superior finish.

We're also proud to play our part as an environmentally conscious brand, for every Bow & Stern unit sold a Blue Gum Eucalyptus Tree will be planted in the Annya State Forest, Australia.

Purchase your timepiece with peace of mind, our Industry Leading Lifetime Guarantee ensures your timepiece will stand the test of time and evolve with you on your life journey.

Our timepieces are built to last, we stand behind our product with our repair or replace guarantee.

Luxury timepiece shouldn't be mass produced, with only 1200 available per style, your timepiece is a unique expression of your style and individuality. 

Each timepiece will come with a limited edition certificate which will display the serial number of your watch. 

Crafted from Premium Components, assembled by hand for precision and superior finish. 

100% Carbon Neutral - For every unit sold a Blue Gum Eucalyptus Tree is planted in the Annya State Forest. 

BOW & STERN is a boutique watch brand established four years ago, based in the beachside suburbs of Sydney, Australia. 

We're committed to individuality, quality and value. Our love for the Australian beach lifestyle is reflected through our nautical minimalist aesthetic and our industry leading Lifetime Guarantee ensures your timepiece will stand the test of time and evolve with you on your life journey. 

Let the adventure begin! 

Over the past 14 months our team has been working with our manufacturers to refine our latest Limited Edition timepiece.  

We've been through multiple design revisions, prototypes and tests in order to guarantee the reliability and level of quality we set for all of our timepieces. 

To maintain the exclusivity of this range, only 1,200 units per style are available worldwide.

 

 

2mm thick Sapphire Crystal Glass, which is resistant to scratches. 

 

Super-LumiNova has been used to illuminate the indexes, hands and zero mark on the bezel. We have used the highest quality, brightest glow luminescent material available to ensure the dial is visible in dark environments. 

Fitted with 2mm thick Sapphire Crystal Glass, a Screw Crown and a Hermetically Sealed Caseback. The ABYSS is Guaranteed Waterproof to a depth of 200M (660ft). 

Crafted from Brushed 316L Stainless Steel and finished with our trademark anchor logo. The winding crown screws down against the case to create a waterproof seal resisting pressures down to 200M (660ft).   

Movement Type: 24 Jewel Automatic NH35A Movement

Features: Date Calendar, Second hand Halt mechanism,Bi-directional Hand Windable 

Beats Per Hour: 21,600 bph (6 beats per second)

Power Reserve: 41 hours 

Shock System: Diashock (shock resistant device)

Functions: Hours, minutes, central seconds, date calendar

316L Stainless Steel is often used in the medical and marine fields due to its high resistance to corrosion, high tensile strength and excellent durability. 

The unidirectional rotatable bezel is a key functionality of the watch. With a luminescent marker at the zero marker ensures legibility in dark environments. The bezel’s edge is knurled to offer excellent grip.

story:
OBO's intentions are to prolong the pleasure of perfuming skin in a beautiful and sensual gesture. That is what we call Fragrance Wear.

OBO are pearls of perfume worn as part of a bracelet or a necklace nestling against the body.  

Simply grasp it with your fingertips, detach it from its piece of jewellery and roll it across your skin to release the perfume within.

A fragrance experience that follows your every step. For beautiful, sensual application that blossoms through 24 hours. A fragrance for each and every moment. 

Created by French perfumers Anne-Sophie Behaghel et Amélie Bourgeois from FLAIR. 

It all begins with... 

We will make you discover new fragrances from our collection during the Indiegogo's campaign. 

The OBO team has honed a unique olfactive profiling model: through astute questions and observation of your style, we will try to guide you towards a fragrance that fuses your skin.

Questionnaire available for online sales.

Develop new kind of designs for bracelets and pendants: shapes,colors etc. 

Engineers 

 The technical team in charge of managing product development ad patenting OBO products.

Designers 

EATS: The creative team that designs, sculpts and create brands from an original and passionate idea.

Perfumers 

FLAIR: Creative studio based in Paris who works exclusively for niche brands. Their creations are alternative and unique, contrasting with large commercial brands and common fragrances.

Communication

AEDEL: A comprehensive story-teller, Aédél imagines and creates meaning in order to communicate the essence of a brand or a product.

Producing a product like OBO is very complex and requires many types of manufacturers ranging from glass suppliers, jewel producers to resin makers and packaging experts.  

Producing 3,000 OBO products requires 80,000 euros. We have to pay for industrial molds and the manufacturing of the first series.

We have put love, passion and effort to develop OBO and lack of funds is our final barrier. That is why we come to you and ask for your support. 

 Make Obo a reality by funding this campaign

Pre order bracelets or pendants

Share with your friends and family to increase visibility

Enquiries: contact@oboparis.com 

Press: julien@oboparis.com 

What are the sizes available for the bracelet ?

The bracelet comes in two sizes: Small (S) and Medium (M).

How many times can i perfume myself with one pearl?

The pearl contains 3ml of perfume. It is about 20-25 applications on your skin.

Are the materials allergenic?

All raw materials used for manufacturing obo products are hypoallergenic.

How can i apply the perfume on my skin?

The perfume is applied by rolling the pearl on the skin.

Can i choose the color of my pearl?

Before commercial launch, pearls will be available by packs of three.

Can i put my own perfume in the pearls?

Once the pearl is empty, it is not possible to refill it. We are working on a product allowing you to easily fill a pearl with your own perfume.

Is the pearl recyclable?

All components are recyclable. You just need to pull apart the glass from the stainless steel manually.

What do i do when my pearl is empty?

You can either collect or recycle the pearl.

Can i buy pearls of perfume from well-known brands?

For now on, the idea is to make you discover fragrances from trendy and independent creators.
story_txt:
OBO's intentions are to prolong the pleasure of perfuming skin in a beautiful and sensual gesture. That is what we call Fragrance Wear.

OBO are pearls of perfume worn as part of a bracelet or a necklace nestling against the body.  Simply grasp it with your fingertips, detach it from its piece of jewellery and roll it across your skin to release the perfume within.
OBO products are available in two finishings: black resin and white resin. The materials are all hypoallergenic.
The bracelet is available in two sizes: Small (S) and Medium (M). To be sure that it fits you, we will ask for your wrist size once you order











All OBO products are shipped to you in a custom OBO packaging: 

The pearl is made out of glass, a silver finishing and a marble applicator. 
The story and identity of each pearl are unique. Every color is chosen by the perfumer depending on the fragrance that he creates. 

The perfumers have taken the greatest care in order to offer you 8 unique fragrances, with notes ranging from floral to oriental. A fragrance experience that follows your every step. For beautiful, sensual application that blossoms through 24 hours. A fragrance for each and every moment. Created by French perfumers Anne-Sophie Behaghel et Amélie Bourgeois from FLAIR. It all begins with... We will make you discover new fragrances from our collection during the Indiegogo's campaign. The OBO team has honed a unique olfactive profiling model: through astute questions and observation of your style, we will try to guide you towards a fragrance that fuses your skin.Questionnaire available for online sales.Develop new kind of designs for bracelets and pendants: shapes,colors etc. 

If we reach out our objective, we will work on a new kind of pearl allowing you to put the perfume of your choice in OBO products. 



Part of the idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle.
By reaching out on Indiegogo, we can assess our demand, build a stronger relationship with our early adopters (you), and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.

story:
What is the Mr. Shirt accessory?  

Shirt stays have been the solution for those looking to maintain a professional look throughout the day. However, they are uncomfortable to wear and can sometimes provide a wake-up call as they shoot up your leg. The Mr. Shirt accessory is our flagship product and is a modified shirt stay that is not only effective but comfortable to wear as well. 

How does it work?


There's three parts to the accessory the elastic strap that wraps around your leg and is connected with velcro, the clips necessary to attach to your shirt and lastly the sliders on the straps to adjust the tension. The accessory has been designed to stretch to any leg type, so there's no need to mess with sizes or measurements. 


A front and side view of a properly attached Mr. Shirt.

An innovative Velcro design allows for a universal fit no matter what your leg size is.

Clips allow for strong and easy connection to the shirt and the adjustable sliders aid in decreasing or increasing the tension.

Why be interested in Mr. Shirt? 
At Mr. Shirt, we believe in the fact that every individual should look their best whether in the office, at a social event or climbing Mount Kilimanjaro. Studies have been conducted and found a fascinating insight -- men who tuck their shirts in are happier, wealthier and generally more successful. Hence the slogan for Mr. Shirt Inc, "Look Good! Feel Good! Do Good!".  

Mr. Shirt Inc. is a Michigan-based veteran start-up located in Lansing, Michigan. As a veteran start-up, we pride ourselves on utilizing an American manufacturer and being able to stamp 100% American Made on our packaging.

What's the plan after the campaign?
Directly following the campaign we will begin manufacturing in the month of March and start shipping orders mid-April.

Also, for those interested in the slick Mr. Shirt T that comes in the classic Mr. Shirt red, there is a snapshot below of the front and back.

No IndieGoGo campaign comes without risk, here's how we at Mr. Shirt have mitigated those risks...

1) Teamed up with a top notch vendor who has confirmed minimum order quantities and can handle ever-increasing capacity. They source, cut and sew the "Original" Mr. Shirt accessory making them a triple threat for the Mr. Shirt team.

2) Fulfillment we'll be done by none other than the mighty Amazon. This will allow us to guarantee order fulfillment and accuracy.

story:
When you think of clothing it's a reflection of someone. It's a form of expression, regardless of how simple or how complex it appears.  We tend to use that to express things we love and how we feel.  Vaping is a thriving heart pounding culture full of loving people who love to share and inspire. We wanted to capture that pulse within the community with Salt Fire and represent it with whatever we created.  Our Salt Fire Shirt represents passion and creativity and most of all our love for vaping.  We've seen a lot of good things come from vaping. So many people coming together sharing stories about how it changed their lives and saved others and yet we face some very serious challenges.  So many people fear or simply want to stomp the life out of this world for all the wrong reasons. We support the community, we support the good, and we will donate 10% of all profits to advocacy. We are here for the community and to keep the Fire of our passions burning!  

The art for our first shirt was hand illustrated by the very talented Angel Arsi and edited digitally by Ade Suryana.

The shirt is screen printed on 100% cotton. The art is featured with black ink & accented by metallic silver and gold. It is recommended that you wash your shirt in cold water and dried with cold are on a delicate setting. 

Each order will be shipped via USPS with tracking for both Domestic & International Orders. 

Your not just purchasing a shirt, your also helping defend this thriving culture we all love! 10% of all profits will be donated to an advocacy group.  Want to learn more about advocacy? Visit www.consumersforadvocacy.com see how you can help. Consumers for Advocacy provides very educational literature and lists the top Advocacy groups that you can follow and support.


- THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Movimagnet sunglasses, ¡lo más novedoso en gafas de sol personalizadas!

Revolucionando el mercado hemos creado una nueva línea de gafas de sol que tú mismo podrás personalizar. Puedes tener unas gafas alegres y divertidas para el día y elegantes y distinguidas para la tarde. Elige el diseño que mejor combine con tu personalidad y podrás estrenar gafas de sol todos los días.

Gafas de sol personalizadas a la moda

Con una tecnología única en el mundo Movimagnet te permite reinventar tus gafas de sol, personalízalas tú mismo y no olvides que nuestros pilares son la calidad y el diseño. Nuestro sistema consiste en cambiar parte de la varilla a través de unos imanes de neomidio con tus propias manos de una manera fácil y segura. Sin tener que usar ningún instrumento complicado y sin miedo a que tus gafas se puedan romper o desajustar.

 



NUESTRA HISTORIA

Todo empezó observando que hoy en dia está muy de moda poder personalizar todos los productos del mercado, moviles, relojes, etc... incluso las gafas. Pero vimos que las gafas que había personalizables consistían en cambiar las varillas con algún instrumento y eso hacía que las gafas se rompieran o se desajustarán. Y después de varios meses investigando patentamos un sistema de personalización con imanes de neomidio, que son los que mejor agarre tienen del mercado. Y decidimos crear MOVIMAGNET. Nuestra idea es que tengas unas gafas de sol de gran calidad y que puedas darle tu toque personal a cada momento, combinandolas con cada momento del día y con tu estilo de vestir.

¿Te atreves a llevar unas gafas así?

Elige tus gafas Movimagnet y empieza a crear estilo


QUE INCLUYE UN PACK DE MOVIMAGNET SUNGLASSES?

Cada gafa Movimagnet Sunglasses incluye unas gafas de sol, unas lentes de sol espejadas o polarizadas y un pack de 4 diseños de magnets que irán en un estuche metálico pequeño para que siempre puedas llevarlo encima y poder combinar tus gafas en todo momento.

Puedes elegir entre 5 packs de colores para que escojas tu color favorito y  que mejor combine contigo...

Incluye un modelo de gafa ALEC (estilo Rayban Wayfarer), unas lentes grises polarizadas y cuatro diseños de magnets que ves en la foto.

Incluye un modelo de gafa ALEC (estilo Rayban Wayfarer), unas lentes espejadas azules y cuatro diseños de magnets que ves en la foto.

Incluye un modelo de gafa ALEC (estilo Rayban Wayfarer), unas lentes espejadas verdes y cuatro diseños de magnets que ves en la foto.

Incluye un modelo de gafa ALEC (estilo Rayban Wayfarer), unas lentes espejadas rojas y cuatro diseños de magnets que ves en la foto.

Incluye un modelo de gafa ALEC (estilo Rayban Wayfarer), unas lentes espejadas amarillas y cuatro diseños de magnets que ves en la foto.

 ... o puedes crear tu pack personalizado por ti, elige tu modelo de gafa, el tipo de lente y cuatro diseños de magnets.  Una vez finalice la campaña nos pondremos en contacto contigo para personalizar el pedido a tu gusto. Empieza a diseñar tu pack!!!!!


NUESTRAS GAFAS DE SOL

Nuestra primera colección consta de dos modelos, uno sport y otro clásico, hechos en acetato de alta calidad, lo que supone una garantía para tus gafas y la seguridad de un buen acabado.


MODELO CROSSES (UNISEX)

       

Diseño unisex, con un estilo sport en color negro. Ideal para hacer deporte ideal para hacer deporte, conducir, ir a la playa, la nieve…

Sus medidas son estándar

Calibre lente/puente 55/20 mm

140 mm largo varilla


MODELO ALEC  (UNISEX)

         

Diseño unisex, clásico y elegante, en color negro. Ideal para estilo urbano.

Sus medidas son estándar

Calibre lente/puente 50/22 mm

140 mm  largo varilla


NUESTROS MAGNETS

Nuestro sistema patentado permite poder combinar los magnets con cada situación del día para que puedas estar siempre perfecto, ya que no te expresas igual en el trabajo que estando con tus amigos o tu pareja, elige entre nuestra colección para identificarte con cada momento y estar siempre perfecto.


Tambien disponemos exclusivamente para INDIEGOGO de unas colecciones de diseños de autor:

 

Catalina Alzate                                                                                                                         Diseñadora Gráfica


Rocio Rodriguez                                                                                                               Diseñadora Gráfica 


  

      


NUESTRAS LENTES

Para completar tus MOVIMAGNET, elige las lentes que más te gusten y convierte tus gafas en únicas.

POLARIZADAS: son lentes que tiene un filtro vertical que bloquea la luz del sol que llega a los ojos de forma horizontal, como por ejemplo la que se refleja en el mar, nieve, carretera y asfalto, y permite el paso a la luz vertical que se puede aprovechar para ver claramente.

Son lentes con protección 100% UV perfectas para conducir, esquiar, la playa, hacer deporte…

ESPEJADOS: Las lentes espejadas ofrecen múltiples beneficios tanto para la salud  visual como para nuestra seguridad, en actividades como la conducción de vehículos por ejemplo.

La capa espejada de las lentes disminuye la cantidad de luz reflejada que pasa hacia los ojos y aporta un gran confort visual.

Son lentes 100% protección UV gracias al filtro neutro que controla hasta 400 nanómetros de luz.

Puedes elegir entre nuestros colores plata, amarillo rojizo, azul y verde.



Debido a los costes iniciales y cantidades altas del pedido mínimo en la fabricación de nuestras gafas de sol, necesitamos tu apoyo para que podamos comenzar nuestra primera serie de producción.

Los gastos de la campaña iran destinados en un 80% a fabricación de los moldes y al acabado de las gafas. El otro 20% ira destinado a gastos de gestión y costes de envios, ya que asumimos el coste total a envios en España y un porcentaje de los envios internacionales 

Si conseguimos el 200% podremos seguir desarrollando nuevos diseños y podremos colaborar con diseñadores para seguir sorprendiendo con nuevas ideas.


EXCLUSIVO PARA INDIEGOGO

Por apoyar nuestra campaña y confiar en nuestra idea tenemos unas recompensas únicas y exclusivas en  INDIEGOGO para ti.

Nuestra oferta personalizada incluye unas gafas de sol que elijas, 4 pares de magnets que elijas de nuestros diseños, unas lentes de sol que elijas y una funda para tus gafas. TENDRÁS UNAS GAFAS ÚNICAS Y DISEÑADAS POR TI!!!!!!!!!!

Todas nuestras recompensas incluyen ser el primero en recibir el catálogo de nuestros nuevos productos antes de que salgan al mercado y por supuesto siempre tendrás un trato VIP por ser pionero en nuestro proyecto.

Como agradecimiento una vez recibas tus Movimagnet podrás enviarnos un selfie con tu diseño favorito y la pondremos en nuestra web junto a todos nuestros mecenas.

Además ofrecemos en nuestra primera colección hasta el 50% de descuento.

                                                PRECIO INDIEGOGO                 PRECIO DE MERCADO

1 MOVIMAGNET                                 54€                                                100€

2 MOVIMAGNET                               99€                                                200€


PLAZOS DE ENTREGA

Las primeras gafas las enviaremos a finales de Junio y principios de Julio, ya que las fábrica tarda 2 meses en entregarnos la primera colección debido a la fabricación de los moldes y el control de calidad.



GRACIAS POR CONFIAR EN NOSOTROS!!!!!!!!




PREGUNTAS FRECUENTES

¿CUANDO ELEGIRE MIS GAFAS?

Una vez finalizado el proyecto nos pondremos en contacto contigo para que puedas elegir tus gafas totalmente personalizadas y para solucionarte cualquier duda que tengas.

story:
What is Instant Access IPS?

Storing a weapon for home defense has always been a trade-off between safety and accessibility...until now. With Instant Access IPS (In Plain Sight), you no longer have to choose between securing your weapon and being able to access it quickly in an emergency.

Our security cabinets offer a secure, locked enclosure for you to store your tactical home defense weapons or handguns. They can be accessed quickly with a simple, user programmable, 3-8 digit code. You don't even have to sacrifice your home decor, as our cabinets rest behind a tasteful piece of artwork. 

Why are we conducting this campaign?

Launching a new product is never easy.  There are startup costs, production minimums, volume pricing agreements, and numerous other barriers to bringing a new product to market.  We've been making and selling our tactical weapons "in-wall" cabinet for almost a year and a half.



But a number of our supporters either do not own their own homes or are otherwise not in a position to install one of our in-wall solutions.  So we have developed a pistol cabinet that mounts on the wall rather than in the wall.  With the Pistol Cabinet, anyone who needs to safely secure their handgun but still have almost immediate access to it has that ability.  Whether you are a renter or just don't want to cut into your drywall, the Pistol Cabinet offers a great solution.  Using drywall screws and drywall anchors, the Pistol Cabinet installs in just a few minutes.



But in order to make the Pistol Cabinet more affordable, we need to have a large first production run.  That's where you come in.  Whether you are just donating, buying some of our awesome swag, or pre-purchasing a cabinet (or two or three), you are helping to make our new product a reality.  Without your help, this product does not exist.

How they work

The unit uses 8 AA batteries to power a user programmable micro-controller.  Press the grey button on the printed circuit board and input your customized 3-8 digit code.  One beep confirms that your code has been accepted (two beeps indicates your code is either too long or too short).  Now every time you enter your code, the electronic solenoid locks release and the cabinet opens.  Type in the wrong code and you will hear two beeps.  The electronic solenoid locks are self-retracting, so no need to input the code to close the unit.  There is a keyed override should the electronics fail or the batteries run down.  Typical battery life is greater than one year under normal usage. 


       



Are there size considerations?

Yes.  While the unit has been designed to accommodate most semi-automatic handguns, some are just too long or too wide (think Desert Eagle).  Max length is about 8 3/4 inches.  Max height is about 9 inches.  Max width is 1 9/16 inches.  The non-marring pins are adjustable laterally to provide a custom fit for most pistols. [Note: the depth restriction eliminates many revolvers so please measure yours before ordering]  



Where are we with our new product?

We have completely designed the pistol cabinet in 3D CAD software (Solidworks).  We are fully prototyped and have refined the design to its final form.  We have numerous manufacturing agreements already in place.  Once we reach our funding goal we will reach out to our suppliers and execute our volume pricing purchase options and begin assembly.  With your help, and ONLY with your help, we will bring this innovative weapons storage solutions to responsible gun owners all across the country.




So what?

Instant Access IPS is more than just a product. It's a movement. We want everyone to have the option to protect their homes with an easily accessible home defense weapon...without having to compromise the safety of their loved ones. By backing Instant Access IPS, you're helping to create a world with safer homes and a culture of responsible gun ownership. 



Whether you're purchasing a unit for your own home or you're simply contributing a few dollars to the cause, you are making a huge difference. Without this funding, we will not be able to launch the pistol cabinet. Your contributions will help us to continue to operate and provide a safe and accessible alternative for gun storage in the home. 


A Look at the Perks

Home Protected by flyer:
Carabiner Multi-Tool


Hat
Polo


Pistol Cabinet standard art selections: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4-W5NRs43UkdU...


Other Ways you can Help

In addition to donating or pre-purchasing it would help us a great deal if you would consider assisting us in reaching even more people. Share our campaign on your facebook page, tweet about it on twitter, email your friends. Every little bit helps. 

Thank you for taking the time to explore our campaign page. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us!



If you have any questions at all regarding the products or perks, please don't hesitate to contact us at mark@instantaccessips.com.

story:
The story.... 


- My name is Jiri and when I was 19 I decided to go to study abroad - Denmark. As you might think, it is one of the most expensive country for living, so my begging as an unemployed foreign student wasn't easy. During my stay in Denmark I found out two things. Danish people like luxury clothes and fitness. I decided to build up a team and create a High-end sport brand because  there is nothing like premium sport brand in the current market.


- We set up a clear rules in the beginning of this project which are: High quality of the clothes, exclusivity, unique design, functional gadgets, serial number of each product, glossy wooden boxes for our products, certificate of authenticity with serial number, special fragrancy of the products and much more... We were working hard on the designs of the clothes (cooperation with  fashion school of Paris), boxes and certificates, registration european trademark and we are just about to finish the prepared e-shop. 



- Currently we are at the last stage of the project. We have the wooden boxes, certificates, prepared webpage but the only thing we are missing (the most important) are the CLOTHES.



What We Need & What You Get


-We need 7000 USD to order 5 kinds of clothes for men (T-shirts, sweatshirts, sweatpants, undershirt and shorts) and 5 kinds of clothes for women (T-shirts, sweatshirts, fitness bras, leggings, shorts)
-You might be interested why only 10  kinds of clothes in general? Because that is our uniqueness. Every product will be sophisticated to the smallest detail. We bring you not only the product but also a feelings.


-After receiving requested amount, we will contact our supplier which will make the products for us, deliver it to Denmark, we will photoshoot it on our models and put it on the website.
-If you support us, with 10 USD, your name will be mentioned in the official page as a supporter. If you will send us 100 USD you will get 30% discount on one product by your choice after opening the e-shop. 200USD you will get 40% discount on one product by your choice. 300USD you will get 50% discount on one products by your choice. 

-Everybody who will help us with more than 100 USD will get to its product letter of thanks with signature of CEO and whole team.


We are....


We are not like other luxury brands. We are focusing entirely on sports clothing.
This means that Jack de Rossé takes your experience from exercising to the next level. We don’t want you to only feel and look good, we want you to show everyone else who you really are.


Don’t feel ashamed for your success, embrace it and tell the world around you that you got what it takes to be on top.


You are a winner and you want to show others your status. We will help you to do that. 


Specialization - flexibility

-We are ready to adapt our products to the customer needs. Our customer is our boss. For example if there will be muslim people interested in, we are ready to make products for them. Our advantage is flexibility but we keep our rules.


Risks & Challenges

-If you are an entrepreneur, there is always risk of failing. Since 2014 we were observing Scandinavian people, asking them a questions and majority of them said, that it is a great idea, that they are missing premium sport brand for sport. 

-Another evidence is, that if you visit local fit center, you will see people wearing high-end brands in the gym even though, that the clothes are casual, just because they want to show their classiness. 

Designs

-We are designing your products via photoshop. Currently we cooperate with fashion school of Paris on designs and functionality of our products. 


Other help

We would appreciate your help in choosing process of our products. Take a look on out Instagram profile (www.instagram.com/jackderosse), choose product you like the most and comment it with: JDR

Thank you for all kind of help.

We really appreciate it.
story_txt:
The story.... - My name is Jiri and when I was 19 I decided to go to study abroad - Denmark. As you might think, it is one of the most expensive country for living, so my begging as an unemployed foreign student wasn't easy. During my stay in Denmark I found out two things. Danish people like luxury clothes and fitness. I decided to build up a team and create a High-end sport brand because  there is nothing like premium sport brand in the current market.- We set up a clear rules in the beginning of this project which are: High quality of the clothes, exclusivity, unique design, functional gadgets, serial number of each product, glossy wooden boxes for our products, certificate of authenticity with serial number, special fragrancy of the products and much more... We were working hard on the designs of the clothes (cooperation with  fashion school of Paris), boxes and certificates, registration european trademark and we are just about to finish the prepared e-shop. - Currently we are at the last stage of the project. We have the wooden boxes, certificates, prepared webpage but the only thing we are missing (the most important) are the CLOTHES.



What We Need & What You Get-We need 7000 USD to order 5 kinds of clothes for men (T-shirts, sweatshirts, sweatpants, undershirt and shorts) and 5 kinds of clothes for women (T-shirts, sweatshirts, fitness bras, leggings, shorts)-You might be interested why only 10  kinds of clothes in general? Because that is our uniqueness. Every product will be sophisticated to the smallest detail. We bring you not only the product but also a feelings.-After receiving requested amount, we will contact our supplier which will make the products for us, deliver it to Denmark, we will photoshoot it on our models and put it on the website.-If you support us, with 10 USD, your name will be mentioned in the official page as a supporter. If you will send us 100 USD you will get 30% discount on one product by your choice after opening the e-shop. 200USD you will get 40% discount on one product by your choice. 300USD you will get 50% discount on one products by your choice. -Everybody who will help us with more than 100 USD will get to its product letter of thanks with signature of CEO and whole team.We are....We are not like other luxury
