story:
Never again get caught stealing your boyfriend’s boxers or shopping in the men’s department for yourself…

After a long day’s work, we know the value of coming home and being comfortable. 

There is a serious lack for comfortable, breathable loungewear for women. We are talking about loungewear that is made of sustainable, 100% cotton that is built to last years. That is where we come in. 

Introducing My Lilianas, premium 100% cotton shorts for women that can be worn as underwear, loungewear, sleepwear, or outerwear on the go! 

Most of women’s clothing is not designed with comfort in mind. Men’s clothing, on the contrary, is designed for comfort and utility. More and more women have found themselves purchasing men’s clothing in the pursuits of comfort. But there’s still a problem… these clothes do not fit correctly or feel just right, because they were not designed with the female body in mind.  

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our boxers feature:  

  • 100% cotton that is airy and breathable  
  • Pockets, because we know how to please! Store your stuff in our deep pockets built for utility!
  • Environmentally-friendly made with 100% cotton and low-impact dyes
  • Soft-to-the-touch waistband that stretches to keep you comfortable and your boxers in place
  • Stitching designed with a woman’s body in mind so that it has a snug feel on your body
  • Slits to provide extra flexibility and comfort as you move throughout your day 
  • Every pair goes through a pre-shrink process to prevent shrinking
  • A softer feel with each wash

Imagine the feel of a light cotton bed sheet wrapped around you--it keeps you cool and comfy. That is how our boxers feel.

 

 

 

 

Currently, we provide loungewear shorts for women's sizes 0- 18, but we would like to expand our sizes. With your help, we can grow our brand large enough to be able to afford more sizing options. We apologize if we do not currently provide your size. 

We have manufactured our first round of shorts! Now, we need your help to manufacture even more shorts (and to spread the word about our boxer shorts to as many people as you know)! All contributions will go towards our next order of shorts (it will help us to increase our inventory). We have found our manufacturer, talked with women across the country to find out how we could create the most satisfying shorts for our customers, and we have gone through sample after sample to make sure we have the product we've envisioned and a product you will love! We believe you will love your pair of Lilianas so much that you won't want to take them off!

 

Fit a whole hand, a cell phone, chapstick, and other things you would like to keep in our deep pockets built for utility! 

 

 

The Impact

Our shorts are designed with comfort as our #1 goal. Our light, airy, breathable material feels good in exactly the right places. 

Our shorts are sustainable and built to last. During our process of finding a manufacturer, we sought one that uses non-hazardous and environmentally friendly materials. For our patterns and colors, low impact dyes and natural dyes are used throughout the process from start to finish. Our boxers are built to last you as they are made of 100 % cotton.

We surveyed women from all over the country to figure out how to make the perfect women’s boxers so that they have all the features you desire! Our design has been time tested again and again to make sure we have the optimal design for a woman’s body with bonus features that make our shorts extremely comfortable and flexible. You will want to live in them!   High quality loungewear requires quality manufacturing, so we partnered with the finest manufacturer with years of experience creating top-notch materials. We worked closely with them every step of the way to refine our prototype again and again to be able to transform our vision into a reality.

 

Our Story

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Since we have already manufactured our first round of shorts, and we have partnered with a top-notch manufacturer (with years of experience), we have reduced risks and challenges. However, if challenges arise, you as our backer, will be the first to know! We believe in open communication. You may receive your package sooner than our delivery dates. We will keep you updated with important information and updates every step of the way! Thank you!

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please spread the word to your friends and family about us!
  • Please share this link to others! 
  • Follow us [My Lilianas] on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter! 

 

 

Thank you for your support! Any and all support is genuinely appreciated!

story:
a magic story - introducing wundaland


OUR STORY

Hi! We are Ina & Albert, the founders of wundaland.

We started wundaland with the vision to bring fine jewelry, with our unique design to life at a fair price without compromising on quality.

Your pledge will help us to produce a first small series of 100 items per design. This is the minimum number we need to produce to be able to offer you the jewelry at these prices.

We have spent years to find the best and most talented goldsmith and to develop a process that allows a detailed re-creation of the beauty, individuality and richness of nature.

Unlike luxury jewelry brands we do not mark up the gold and diamond raw material price of up to 500%.

We’d be thrilled if you be part of this journey and help us with your contribution to bring the magic of wundaland to life.


DESIGN

It begins with the founders vision of beauty that is brought to life through the model of nature. All bracelets, earrings, pendants and brooches are one of a kind and reflect the uniqueness and individuality of nature.  

Our goldsmith has developed a secret and complex process to recreate the detail and individuality of nature at the highest level.


CRAFTSMANSHIP

"Our family has a long tradition in creating jewelry for the leading luxury brands around the globe."

All our jewelry is 100% made in Germany in one of the oldest and most traditional goldsmith towns.  Our factory supplies the world's top luxury jewelry brands and shares our passion for perfection and highest quality products


MATERIALS 

We use the best of the best: 18k gold, 18k rose gold, cold enamel and anthilope leather.

PRICE  
We work with the same materials, goldsmiths and diligence as top luxury brands. However, by selling to you directly and reducing marketing and distribution spend, we offer comparable jewelry at more than 70% off luxury prices.


***


PERKS

18k gold & enamel beech leaf earrings 
$ 229

18k gold beech leaf earrings 
$ 199



18k gold and enamel beech leaf pendant 
$ 139



18k gold beech leaf pendant 
$ 119



18k rose gold beech leaf pendant 
$ 139

18k gold ginkgo leaf earrings  
$ 199

18k gold ginkgo leaf pendant 
$ 129


18k gold oak leaf pendant 
$ 129

18k gold and enamel wild wine leaf pendant 
$ 299

18k gold and gold  & enamel ginko brooch
$ 129 (per item)




18k gold oak leaf brooch
$ 129


***

All jewelry comes in our black wundaland signature box. 



PRODUCTION PLAN

Jan 15 – Campaign closes
Jan 25 – Goldsmith starts production
Feb 23 – Final quality control
March 15 – Packaging
March/April – Your orders will arrive


PLEASE NOTE

Delivery time:
The overall risks are very minimal as we went thru the complete production cycle and have repeatedly produced small quantities of all product lines. However there is the odd chance that delivery will be delayed if we are not happy with the quality of the produced lot.

Duty / VAT charges: 
If you live outside of the EU, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. For the US we will issue you a pro-forma invoice via DHL.

Customs: 
There may be some delay for in some countries but all our parcels will be tracked and you should get full visibility of the status.


Thank you for your support! 



Paypal disclaimer:

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
Red Violin is established in 1961. The concept of Red Violin watch comes from different historic relics of different countries.  

The collection we now launch is France. Each series from France collection is designed by a French designer, Pierre Chambrier. Every watch is made from high quality material and symbolizes the romance of French.

 

 

Louvre Series

Louvre Series is either made from premium stainless steel or genuine leather. It represents smart, bright and capable.  

 

Louvre White Dial with Silver Stainless Steel - USD97

 

Louvre Black Dial with Silver Stainless Steel - USD97

 

Louvre Blue Dial and Silver Stainless Steel - USD97

 

Louvre Black Dial with Black Genuine Leather - USD89

 

Louvre White Dial with Brown Genuine Leather - USD89

 

Louvre Black-Rose Gold with Black Genuine Leather - USD89

 

Louvre Brown-Rose Gold with Brown Genuine Leather - USD89

 

 

 Eiffel Series

Eiffel series comes with two rolls of Swarovski crystal with the high quality genuine leather. It represents elegant, gorgeous and stunning.  

 

Eiffel White Dial with Red Genuine Leather (with two rolls of swarovski crystal surrounding) - USD99

 

Eiffel White Dial with Pink Genuine Leather (with two rolls of swarovski crystal surrounding) - USD99

 

Eiffel White Dial with White Genuine Leather (with two rolls of swarovski crystal surrounding) - USD99

 

Eiffel White Dial with Black Genuine Leather (with two rolls of swarovski crystal surrounding) - USD99

 

Eiffel White Dial with Brown Genuine Leather (with two rolls of swarovski crystal surrounding) - USD99

 

 

 

Every Red Violin watch is covered by a ten-year warranty against any material or manufacturing defect at the time of purchase.

story:
Hi! My name is John and I’ve been a leather goods enthusiast since I was a kid. I have been designing leather products since 2015 with a goal of including style and function into each one. Along with my co-founder we were tired of being disappointed by overpriced and underbuilt shoes that do not include additional features or cost a premium to add. Often using cheaper and inferior leather and other raw materials. We found that many others felt the same and decided to start our own leather goods brand.

John Candor came to life during a trip to Colombia while visiting family and friends. With our desire to start our own leather goods brand and wanting to help the local economy, it was a perfect match. We are committed to supporting them with our business and other post conflict community-building initiatives. Over the past years we have invested thousands of dollars and countless hours into fine tuning and creating our products. We continue to innovate and develop new designs so that you too can enjoy unique artisan crafted leather goods without having to break the bank.

Candor is a straightforward, honest, and sincere expression in how we run our business and bring our products to life. We want every customer to love their John Candor shoes as much as we do, and we proudly stand behind our products, never take shortcuts, honor our commitments, and admit when we can do things better. Our business approach is to be straightforward, unreserved, and sincere. We are passionate about creating and providing our customers with exceptional products that are excellent in quality, responsibly produced, & sustainable for future generations. We pay higher prices to get the right materials to use when we design and create each shoe, then pass on savings to you by going ‘direct-to-consumers’.

Each of you can help us continue to bring this project to life. Every pair goes a long way! Shoes you can feel great about buying and wearing. We hope to WOW you with our products so that you will feel enthusiastic about joining our adventure and bring others along.

John Candor is a Veteran owned, small family business based out of Dallas, Texas that is partnered with third generation leather artisans in Medellin, Colombia. We are simple guys and two friends who enjoy time with family and friends, new adventures, sharing good food and playing soccer on the weekends.

Our Goal, Mission and Vision

We exceeded our minimum order quantity (MOQ) funding goal on Kickstarter by raising $47,789 USD! But this is just the start and to be able to do this full time we need to keep the momentum going. We have poured our lifesavings into this with the dream of making this our life’s work.

You can be one of the first to wear John Candors! We are offering our shoes at a 30% discount. All backers on Indiegogo will then receive an exclusive 25% off or greater on our other products. 

John Candor’s initial launch date was planned for May 2020, but when the covid-19 pandemic struck, all our raw material factories were closed by end of March. We had no idea if they would reopen or not. Thankfully, they did by the end of 2020. Many small businesses were crippled, especially in countries where government support was limited or non-existent. Colombia was no exception, leaving family businesses treading water and fending for themselves. Our partners pivoted to making masks so they could stay afloat financially and keep all their employees and contractors working. They are now ready to get back to making leather goods!

This project is an opportunity to revive many families hopes and dreams while pursuing the craft they love.

Our Impact in Colombia

At John Candor we take great pride and personal ownership of not just every product we make, but in HOW every product is made. Over 50 families, many of whom are single mothers and heads of households, contribute to bring our products to market and they are equally entitled to happy, balanced, and satisfying lives. We are not successful unless they partake in that success. We will never compromise their wellbeing for a profit margin and ensure each one receives fair pay with benefits, training opportunities, and safe working conditions.

Our certified leather tanners incorporate on-site water treatment plants that recycle, purify, and reuse the water needed for the curing and tanning process. With over one million+ USD invested into these plants any unused water is returned to its original source in an even cleaner state. They also assist local communities with treating and purifying their wastewater as to minimize their environmental impact.

Risks & Challenges

We are bringing this product to life during a worldwide pandemic while businesses and factories have been closing. This brings with it a series of unique challenges, especially regarding the availability of materials, worker's welfare, social distancing measures, and international shipping delays.

Nevertheless, we are greatly confident that we can accomplish all of this since we have spent thousands of man hours doing our homework, working on, analyzing, and fine-tuning our production process! Our third-generation artisan shoemakers will deliver a premium product and we have been running successful ecommerce businesses since 2015. During which we have learned many valuable lessons along the way pertaining to international markets, manufacturing, and project delivery. We know how to take our prototypes from the design phase and successfully carry them through to project execution and delivery.

Although we do not foresee any hold ups, if there are any delays in production, we will contact you right away with an updated completion date!

Our shoes are made per standard US sizing. When choosing your size, stick with your usual dress shoe size. John Candor Shoes are available from US Men's size 6.5 to 15. Wide sizes are available in "E".

Measuring Guide

We recommend you measure your foot length (from heel to longest toe) in Cm or Inches, add .5" / 1.27cm and identify your correct shoe size from the chart above. You can also use the Brannock Device (that metal scale you put your feet on at any shoe store).  

If your foot length in inches or centimeters is right at the boundary between sizes, we generally suggest that you choose the size up for a looser, more relaxed fit.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t need a new pair of shoes but want to help? You can back us with a tip or share John Candor with your family and friends. You can find us on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and our website. Please use the Indiegogo Share Links up at the top.

We are simple guys and two friends who enjoy time with family and friends, new adventures, sharing good food and playing soccer on the weekends.























Our Goal, Mission and Vision
We exceeded our minimum order quantity (MOQ) funding goal on Kickstarter by raising $47,789 USD! But this is just the start and to be able to do this full time we need to keep the momentum going. We have poured our lifesavings into this with the dream of making this our life’s work.
You can be one of the first to wear John Candors! We are offering our shoes at a 30% discount. All backers on Indiegogo will then receive an exclusive 25% off or greater on our other products. 
John Candor’s initial launch date was planned for May 2020, but when the covid-19 pandemic struck, all our raw material factories were closed by end of March. We had no idea if they would reopen or not. Thankfully, they did by the end of 2020. Many small businesses were crippled, especially in countries where government support was limited or non-existent. Colombia was no exception, leaving family businesses treading water and fending for themselves. Our partners pivoted to making masks so they could stay afloat financially and keep all their employees and contractors working. They are now ready to get back to making leather goods!
This project is an opportunity to revive many families hopes and dreams while pursuing the craft they love.

Our Impact in Colombia
At John Candor we take great pride and personal ownership of not just every product we make, but in HOW every product is made. Over 50 families, many of whom are single mothers and heads of households, contribute to bring our products to market and they are equally entitled to happy, balanced, and satisfying lives. We are not successful unless they partake in that success. We will never compromise their wellbeing for a profit margin and ensure each one receives fair pay with benefits, training opportunities, and safe working conditions.
Our certified leather tanners incorporate on-site water treatment plants that recycle, purify, and reuse the water needed for the curing and tanning process. With over one million+ USD invested into these plants any unused water is returned to its original source in an even cleaner state. They also assist local communities with treating and purifying their wastewater as to minimize their environmental impact.

Risks & Challenges
We are bringing this product to life during a worldwide pandemic while businesses and factories have been closing. This brings with it a series of unique challenges, especially regarding the availability of materials, worker's welfare, social distancing measures, and international shipping delays.
Nevertheless, we are greatly confident that we can accomplish all of this since we have spent thousands of man hours doing our homework, working on, analyzing, and fine-tuning our production process! Our third-generation artisan shoemakers will deliver a premium product and we have been running successful ecommerce businesses since 2015. During which we have learned many valuable lessons along the way pertaining to international markets, manufacturing, and project delivery. We know how to take our prototypes from the design phase and successfully carry them through to project execution and delivery.
Although we do not foresee any hold ups, if there are any delays in production, we will contact you right away with an updated completion date!


Our shoes are made per standard US sizing. When choosing your size, stick with your usual dress shoe size. John Candor Shoes are available from US Men's size 6.5 to 15. Wide sizes are available in "E".
Measuring Guide
We recommend you measure your foot length (from heel to longest toe) in Cm or Inches, add .5" / 1.27cm and identify your correct shoe size from the chart above. You can also use the Brannock Device (that metal scale you put your feet on at any shoe store).  
If your foot length in inches or centimeters is right at the boundary between sizes, we generally suggest that you choose the size up for a looser, more relaxed fit.

Other Ways You Can Help
Don’t need a new pair of shoes but want to help? You can back us with a tip or share John Candor with your family and friends. You can find us on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and our website. Please use the Indiegogo Share Links up at the top.

story:
See the entire collection at swimrose.com


The Product

After more than a year of designing, creating, and organizing this launch, I am so thrilled to get our first collection underway.

As other industries are exploring new and exciting ways to transform the way you shop online, swimwear has stayed overly simplified and underwhelming.

I'm here to change that.

Check out swimrose.com to see a sliver of my vision for your future online shopping experience. Along with the beautiful aesthetics you see today, the coming seasons will present you with opportunities to explore your purchase decision like never before.

The velocity of this movement is in your hands.

...And?

Of course our main focus is making swimwear you'll fall in love with. The launch collection for 2014 touches on an array of styles and color palettes. Bold or traditional, triangle or bandeau, colorful or conservative, the bikini you choose will earn the attention you'll receive. 

The comfort and quality are the first things you'll notice when you tie those strings the first time. After all, our swimwear is made in California.

How It Works

Head over to swimrose.com to look at our launch catalog. Any of the product pages will bring you right back here.

Select your option on the right of this page. After you checkout, you'll receive a form from us to select which suit and size you want (or we'll send you a promo code, if that's what you selected).

The price for one suit is nearly 30% off what they'll be once the site goes live after the Indiegogo campaign.

One suit is defined as a top + bottom together, as shown on swimrose.com. Tops and bottoms for this first collection are not interchangeable.

You can check out frequently asked questions and a size chart here.

Zero Risk

Good news - EVERYTHING is ready to go. 100% of the money from this campaign will go towards our first full production order (aka inventory). This means there's no risk to you, as this is an all-or-nothing campaign. So if the goal isn't reached, you won't be charged.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share! Whether it's a link to this campaign or our website, we sincerely appreciate your help.

You could post a video, too!

  • Link to the official video from the top of this page.
  • Fun video I've been sending to friends :)

story:
Our aim is to change people’s perspective towards traditional handicraft, which is often seen by most young generation as old-fashioned, time consuming and worthless.

Your order will allow us to support the local community , empower and improve help Thai artisan get pay for their hard work. By providing constant income to the rural community for their artisanal skill, we hope that it will encourage young people to look at these traditional craft with a new set of eyes.

This is when we come up with an idea of the wicker boat shoe – a collaborative project between native Thai brands: VT THAI and MANGO MOJITO. MANGO MOJITO is a brand specialized in classic gentlemen footwear, while VT THAI is an online market platform for Thai traditional handcraft items.

By reinterpreting the classic boat shoe, we incorporate the locally made wicker sheet into our design and turn the simple piece of material into stylish and charming footwear.   

The beautiful patina is created by submerging the entire pair in a dye, creating beautiful and unique vintage appearance. The boat shoe comes with classic rubber sole, which is highly durable and can be worn in any terrain.

The wicker sheet made from water hyacinth was meticulously crafted by woven communities across Thailand. It requires tremendous effort to create these sheets as the plant needs to be harvest, clean, and dry – processes which can take up days before it is ready to be woven.

We take pride in the knowledge that has been passed on to us over the century and have confident in the craftsmanship of our artisans. We hope to be the pioneer who takes Thai traditional handcraft and handicraft items to an international market.

Join us on this exciting journey, and thank you for all of your support.

Note: Actual product color may vary from the image due to differences in lighting and monitor display.

story:
Available in 2 versions:

Moodberries Standard

or

Moodberries Bluetooth


Designed to be your chandelier, your night-light, your thunderstorm, or your window to imagination, Moodberries let you be as creative as you want and express your style. No more searching for the perfect brightness, colour patterns and lamp shape. Let your personality stand out, inspire you, and entertain you!


Make your evening date unforgettable

Host an outstanding dinner party and impress your friends

Be creative and turn Moodberries into fire


Make your camping days more fun and colourful 


Be calm and creative in your 'me' time


Smile and be happy - you're in good company


Moodberries Standard version

Want to stick to the basics? Get the Moodberries Standard version and enjoy your lights right away! It offers no customization but comes with a button that regulates awesome predefined colour patterns and brightness.  You get 26 Mooberries patterns in total to choose from!



Moodberries Bluetooth version with an app

Want to play it smart? Get the Moodberries Bluetooth version and control the lights with your smartphone! Ignite your Moodberries experience and let the app do the magic! The Bluetooth version includes all of the features of the Standard version!


Moodberries come with 10, 20, or 40 balls. The Standard version is only available with 10 or 20 light balls, and the Bluetooth version is only available with 40 or 20 light balls.


General specifications



Extra Specifications


As an added bonus, you can get an exclusive big light ball for a better lighting experience. As it’s not a light source on its own, you have to substitute any of the existing light balls to see its effect. The ball is white, 10 cm in diameter, and made of cotton string.

Got a power bank?

Moodberries are multi-powered - all you need is a power adapter to plug the lights in. Or any power bank if you want to carry Moodberries around!


Power bank support


It’s people who add meaning to light. We’re used to the fact that light is functional. But it’s also deeply symbolic, expanding our thought horizons and helping us discover new emotions. We invite everyone to look beyond the light and see the personality attached to it.


By supporting Moodberries on Indiegogo you help these light balls become a reality, help us improve the product, and help us make it affordable for everyone. This campaign adds another twist to smarter homes, stylish interiors, parties, and imagination. Let’s create a more interesting and entertaining environment where lighting transforms your mood into a work of art!

Forget any decor trouble! Moodberries will let you adapt the lighting to match your wall colour, flooring, furniture and other accessories, but, most importantly, to yourself!

Boost your creative potential


Wake up and have a productive day




We value your commitment, and this is our way of giving back to the community! Join the contest, refer as many friends as you can, invite them to contribute and get FREE Moodberries!



To enter the contest, follow these STEPS:


Step 1: Log in to your Indiegogo account. You need to sign up if you don’t have one yet.

Step 2: Copy the link on the left hand side.

Step 3: Share the link to your friends and encourage them to contribute.


As soon as you send out the link we’ll be able to track your contributions and calculate your prize!


IMPORTANT:


* You MUST be logged in to your account to share the link. If not, we won’t be able to track your referrals!

* You MUST be a contributor of our campaign so we already have your contact details when we start shipping out!



Moodberries are brought to life by GreyNut, a team of hard-working and innovative people with expertise in engineering, business development, marketing, and communication. We’ve also teamed up with expert freelancers and talented professionals from the Draugiem Group. We all love building awesome products, and Moodberries are our appreciation for lighting and design.

Ready to share the journey with us?


A working prototype is already on the table, but we're still aware of manufacturing and logistics challenges that may pop up in the process. We'll do our best to get your Moodberries to you in the shortest time possible!

Shipping commitment

We’ve done crowdfunding campaigns before, with the most notable being the Luxafor campaign on Kickstarter in 2015. Though we didn’t reach our funding goal we still managed to ship the product to our backers. Your support mean a lot to us, and we’ll work hard to make sure you get your Moodberries.

Product shipping delays

We've worked hard to develop a trusted supplier network, however unforeseen risks, such as delays in component shipping, or weather conditions may result in product delivery too.

Manufacturing

We take control over every step of the product development, including manufacturing. We want your Moodberries to be perfect, so we do the product assembling and testing ourselves.

Moodberries press kit

Though we didn’t reach our funding goal we still managed to ship the product to our backers. Your support mean a lot to us, and we’ll work hard to make sure you get your Moodberries.
Product shipping delays
We've worked hard to develop a trusted supplier network, however unforeseen risks, such as delays in component shipping, or weather conditions may result in product delivery too.
ManufacturingWe take control over every step of the product development, including manufacturing. We want your Moodberries to be perfect, so we do the product assembling and testing ourselves.






Moodberries press kit

story:
Umbrella Here is a light that turns your umbrella into a smart umbrella. It's also signals that your umbrella is available for sharing.


As Seen On


Introducing Umbrella Here

Umbrella Here is a light that can be attached on an umbrella. It is controlled by a mobile app that tells people that this umbrella is available for sharing. Just like the light you would see on a taxi. When the light is on, it represents that strangers are welcome to come in and share your umbrella. 


Why choose Umbrella Here?

Connects You With The People You've Met

When you're being helped or you've helped someone and you guys had a great chat along the way. You can login to our website, type in the time and location you've met them, add them as your friends and continue your conversations.

Keeps Record of the Number of People You've Helped

Whenever you've helped someone with Umbrella Here. Umbrella Here tracks the number of people and keep a record of the route to your phone.

Never Lose Your Umbrella Again

Did you remember when was the last time you forget your umbrella and remembering it when it starts raining again? With Umbrella Here, whenever you left your umbrella behind, it sends a notification on your phone reminding you to bring it along with you.

Change the Color of Your Umbrella Here to Match Your Umbrella 

The color of your Umbrella Here can be changed using our mobile app. You can change its color to green to match the color of your umbrella or change its color to pink to match your mood. 

Your Weather Forecast

When you're at home, Umbrella Here turns into a weather gadget. It turns red when the weather is hot and turns blue when it's cold. When it's raining it blinks reminding you to bring your Umbrella Here and your umbrella with you.

Know the Exact Location of Where It's Raining Right Now

Umbrella Here gives you real time information of where it's raining. Just go into Umbrella Here website or our mobile app to check whether places you're heading to are raining or not. 


What we care...

Simple - It Fits Different Umbrellas

This light fits different umbrellas, you simply just plug it into your umbrella when you need it and pull it out when you don’t need it.

Social - Perfect for you to meet someone new

Umbrella Here provides a space for you to connect with different people. Without barriers, it creates a specific moment for strangers to get together. This might gives you a chance to meet someone you enjoy chatting with.

Share - Help someone in need 

"Sharing is caring" is what we all learn from Kindergarten, but as grow older.  It seems like we slowly forget about this. Especially on a rainy people only care about their own destinations and neglect everything surrounding them. Umbrella Here encourages you to help each others during a rainy day and allow us to experiences the joy of sharing.


Rewards


Products

Umbrella Here

Umbrella Here Umbrella


Technology

Bluetooth 4.0

Umbrella Here’s certified Bluetooth Low Energy wireless delivers a fast, stable connection with industry-leading power conservation.

Illuminant Light

Umbrella Here uses LED lights to illuminate the helping signal while you can change its colour.

Lasting Power

Umbrella Here’s battery charges off any USB port in under 90 minutes and delivers power for up to a month of normal use on a single charge.


Specifications

Umbrella Here

  • Width: 7.3cm
  • Communication: Bluetooth 4.0 Low-energy (BLE)
  • Battery Life: 5 Hours 
  • Battery: Lithium Ion Rechargeable (Rechargeable with USB cable)
  • Weather-proof

    Umbrella Here Umbrella

    • Length: 27 inch

    Risks and challenges

    We've taken every step to ensure that we have a successful launch for Umbrella Here. We have brought our Umbrella Here digital prototype that we have built with Arduino to Shenzhen, China, the manufacturing capital of the world. In Shenzhen, we found a product designer and an electronic engineer to help us work on Umbrella Here to make it ready for manufacturing.

    Once we met the engineers and product designers who helped us on our project, we have told them that Umbrella Here has to fit different umbrellas. This is definitely one of the biggest problem we encountered. Right now, our product designers had came up with different designers, where we can ensure that Umbrella Here fits different Umbrellas. Right now, we are under the process of trying out which looks and work best on Umbrella Here. Please expect that we might add something into the hole of Umbrella Here in our final product, which will help Umbrella Here fit different umbrellas.

    Please be aware that every Umbrella Here comes with a wooden stand. The four of us are currently based in Hong Kong and all of our manufacturing will be done in Hong Kong or Shenzhen. We are still currently undergoing the process to check which countries do not allow us to mail a wooden stand. If we encountered any problem of sending out the wooden stand to you, we will changed the stand to other materials. Don't worries, if anything changes, we will definitely contact you.


    FAQ

    1.Can you explain how does Umbrella Here weather forecast works?

    Umbrella Here has a storage the stores a 7-day weather forecast. It takes in the most updated 7-day weather forecast everytime it connects to your phone.


    2.Do I know where's my umbrella, when my Umbrella Here is attached with it?

    As long as your Umbrella Here is connected with your phone, you will be able locate your umbrella.


    3. Will Umbrella Here app has an Android version?
    Yes, if our Umbrella Here campaign is successfully funded, we will have both an iOS and an Android app.

As long as your Umbrella Here is connected with your phone, you will be able locate your umbrella.

3. Will Umbrella Here app has an Android version?
Yes, if our Umbrella Here campaign is successfully funded, we will have both an iOS and an Android app.

story:
WE'RE CROWDFUNDING A NEW KIND OF BUSINESS


Where 50% of our profits

will be used to protect the most incredible animals in the world

and you get to help us decide how!


Humans are heating up the planet like they have a spare one lying around. We think that it will get so hot one day, that the only thing humans will be able to wear are sandals.


So we're making 

Made from the most environmentally awesome materials! 

Together, we can use crowdfunding to change the way we do business!

We're going back to the earth.


THE HERD


THE QUALITY MATERIALS

Hemp Strap: 

Hemp fiber is one of the strongest and most durable natural textile fibers on earth. It's not only strong, but it is also known to hold its shape very well.  As a fabric, hemp provides all the warmth and softness of other natural textiles but with a superior durability seldom found in other materials. Natural organic hemp fiber ‘breathes’ well and is biodegradable. 

E.V.A Footbed:

EVA is a dense foam which acts as an excellent and durable shock absorber for your feet. EVA has the advantage of being 100 % recyclable of all production waste, which means that no waste is achieved while producing Zlopz from the material. EVA is free of chlorides, heavy metals, phenols, latex and all toxins. EVA actually stands for Ethylene Vinyl Avetate and is a polymer widely used in a number of applications. The reason EVA is considered more eco-friendly is that it doesn't use chlorine in its production. This means there is less toxicity released during degradation in a land fill somewhere, if your Zlopz accidentally wind up there. Recycled EVA Foot-bed material is considered even more eco-friendly, because not only is the material itself environmentally safer, but it is likewise not being simply discarded and is instead being re-used again and again. EVA is also widely used in Vegan shoes because it is man made and animal friendly. 

100 % Natural Rubber Latex (NRL) Sole:

It's durable, biodegradable and has great natural elasticity.

Al(OH)3 treated NRL is all natural and renewable, contains no VOCs, is free of known or suspected carcinogens and non-toxic and is the most environmentally safe way to use Natural Rubber that is free of allergens.

Natural rubber is so great, it allows you to spread our prints, on your feet. 


COMFORT

Besides just looking AWESOME, Zlopz will be unbelievably comfortable too! 

We want you to wear them everyday, they have to be comfortable!


PS: Think you know of alternative materials that will make Zlopz even more eco-friendly and comfortable? 

Email your ideas to thisiscomfortable@zlopz.org 

The more we learn, the more we want to change everything.


FOR THE LADIES


Socialize with us:                               



SO HERE'S THE DEAL

Crowdfunding is changing the world, dramatically! 

For the first time in history, anyone can fund their amazing ideas over the internet. At the current rate, Crowdfunding is expanding so fast ($65 Bil - 2014) that these new businesses will play a huge role in our future economy.

We now have the most amazing opportunity to change the fundamental way in which businesses operate, for the good of the planet.


Because life shouldn't just be about the profits.


SO WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?

You decide...

Humans are way cleverer than animals, so we figured:

1) Submit your ideas to myawesomeideas@zlopz.org 

2) Vote for your favorite "BIG Idea"

3) We'll use 50% of our profits to make the best ideas a reality!


THE BIG IDEAS LIST 

(so far)

1) Using drones to protect Rhinos by alerting rangers of nearby poachers.

2) Create a yearly "Cash Prize", that will be awarded to the individual or team that showcases the best conservation idea for each endangered animal.

3) Create an educational Virtual Reality app, that utilizes the Google Cardboard platform, to immerse users in an amazing educational experience with endangered animals. By utilising new technologies, we think this could create an everlasting impression in the minds of humans and shift the mindsets of a generation. If you have ever experienced VR before, you will understand the possible implications of this type of education. Then, convince Google to making this a default app on all Android devices :)

4) Establishing aquaponic farms in starving villages, to create a self sustaining food source for their communities. By feeding the hungry, we can take away the necessity of poaching for meat.

5) Create an open sourced game, where you take part in an amazing human scientist program that will provide information to actual scientists, to save endangered animals. The more human scientist there are, the more we know. The more we know, the more we can do to combat extinction. 

6) "I fear that we may be too late to help the oceans maintain their ability to absorb carbon dioxide. But there is something we can do—and it could make the whole difference and buy us time to develop the necessary low carbon economies. We can halt the destruction of the world’s rainforests—and even restore parts of them—in order to ensure that the forests do what they are so good at—in other words storing carbon naturally. This is a far easier, cheaper and quicker option than imagining we can rely on as yet unproven technology to capture carbon at a cost of some $50 per tonne or, for that matter, imagining we can achieve what is necessary through plantation timber" — Charles, Prince of Wales

(Presidential Lecture, 3 Nov 2008, at the Presidential Palace, Jakarta, Indonesia)

7) We could stop deforestation by employing humans to protect the rainforests in the Amazon. Imagine if we could convert the humans who are cutting the trees down, into tree saving environmentalists. Maybe, we could save Mother Natures lungs.     

8) Try to STOP the buying of endangered animal products, by educating communities. We think if the buying stops, the killing stops. 

9) Your idea could be HERE: __________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________ and that's how you save the world.

Email your ideas to: myawesomeideas@zlopz.org


PLANTATION STATION

(Packaging)

Once our packaging has safely transported your Zlopz, you can plant a tree in them, because they're awesome that way.


 

  ESTIMATED SHIPPING DATE

June 2015 


  FUNDING - $72,000

In order for us to get our feet off the ground, we have to place an order of reach a minimum order quantity of 1600 pairs of sandals for all 6 pairs of sandals. Only then will any manufacturers take a couple of animals seriously... So we need your help to show them that we mean business! 

THESE ARE THE SIZES

Buy your Zlopz now, choose your size later!



ZLOPZ ENDANGERED RANGE

Some animals are so endangered, they need a little extra help.

According to the internet, it is widely believed that the

3rd most endangered animal in the world is the:


Northern Sportive Lemur. 

So we’re making 3 PAIRS and they will only cost: 

$15,000 each.

Every cent raised from the sale of these 3 pairs of Endangered Zlopz, will go directly towards the protection of these little fuzzballs in Madagascar.


    We believe the 2nd most endangered animal in the world is the 

Amur Leopard.

We are making only 2 PAIRS of Endangered Zlopz: 

$20,000 each.

Again, every cent raised will go towards protecting this rad Leopard.


We believe the MOST endangered animal in the world is the 

Ivory-billed Woodpecker.

In fact, many believe it is already extinct. But we don't!

Which is why we’re only making 1 PAIR and selling them for:

$100,000


Introducing Earth's Rarest Zlopz:

100% of the funds raised through this perk will be used to find and protect the Ivory-billed Woodpecker! 


The Zlopz will be so rare, they'll also set the Guinness World Record as the most expensive pair of sandals ever sold, in history of the planet, ever! 

Our GOAL:
To REVERSE the process of extinction.


BECOME AN HONORARY ZLOPZTER!

As backers, you’ll become part of our Herd. You are going to help us decide WHAT we are going TO DO, to STOP this madness of unnecessary extinction! 

We are asking you to leave your carbon footprint behind and help us make Zlopz not only the best sandals in the world, but the best sandals for the world too.


WHY SHOULD YOU CARE?

Well, humans are causing the problem but, they are also the ONLY species on earth, that can solve the problem. Your collective influence counts for everything and your buying habits determine how our planet will evolve in the years to come. 

The latest report from the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) says our planet is in some pretty serious doo-doo! 

http://www.ipcc.ch/report/ar5/wg2/ 

These are the people that humans have put in charge, of looking into our global environmental impact. We know the report is long and boring, so we summarized it for you: HOLY SHIZZLE, I CANT BELIEVE HOW HOT IT'S GETTING UP IN HERE!


The Oxygen Producing Tree ($5 Perk)

Help us plant a tree in the ground and we'll send you our exclusive track: 


All The Single Trees.

By Tony Iger Ft. Ryan the Lion


The Lyrics:

How could you be, so tree like 
I want to be like, you are 
So firmly planted in the ground
I know that I could be found like 
You are 

How could you be, So tree like 
I want to be like, You are
So sturdy as you grow up tall 
You make me feel so jealous 
And small

All the single trees 
Can blow in the gentle breeze 
Without them worrying please! 
About them losing their knees!

How could you be, So tree like 
I want to be like, You are
So underrated as you make it up to be so strong 
How could you be, So tree like 
I want to be like, You are
So Undefinably, Irresistibly, Beautiful

All the single trees 
Can blow in the gentle breeze 
Without them worrying please! 
About them losing their knees!


STRETCH GOALS

$90,000 - 7th Pair of Zlopz 

Help us decide which endangered animal needs our help next! You will also get to help us decide what the Zlopz look like, by submitting your awesome designs to us at: icandraw@zlopz.org 

Once the campaign has come to an end, all our backers will get an opportunity to vote for their favorite designs. Your design could actually help to save a species, how awesome is that!


$120,000 - Youtube Series

We'll produce a YouTube Series, starring our very own Zlopz Ranger and Tony Iger. 


They'll educate you, as they work together with teams from around the world to protect these incredible animals. Education is the most important part of nature conservation. Young or old, the more you know, the more you care. 


$180,000 - Kidz Zlopz

If we reach this target, your kidz won't only get to wear a wicked pair of Zlopz, they'll also get an opportunity to help us design them! They have to wear them after all,  it's only fair! 

Kidz Zlopz will be smaller and cuter, because they're smaller.


CROWDFUNDING 2.0

Funding for our children's future.

There are 2 Types of businesses that exist today: 


We believe there should be a 3rd type of business:


Our 4 STEP plan to change the path of global warming:

1) Pick a for profit business model (haha, they are going to be so mad)
2) Start a crowdfunding campaign to reproduce that model but, in a completely sustainable way - a for non-profit business. 
3) Work with your crowd, to decide what awesome thing you are going to do for this planet, by using 50% of your profits.

4) Make something that our future generations will be proud of. 


We believe we can create businesses, that work hard to make profits for people and the planet. If we are going to be serious about reducing global warming, entrepreneurs need to start thinking about using crowdfunding, to change the fundamental way that businesses operate. 


TRANSPARENCY

We are calling upon the world, to help us find an auditor, to ensure that our business operations are 100% in the best interest of the planet.

We believe that "business as usual", isn't working anymore and we need a Plan B!

We need to commit to creating businesses that measure themselves on how much good they can do in the world.

We believe that by incentivizing people to create businesses that make profits for people and the planet, we can challenge humans to come up with the most sustainable business model possible. 

Dan Pallotta's TED talk will help explain the problem:


Send your suggestions to imwatchingyou@zlopz.org


FAQ

Why do I want a pair of Zlopz so bad?

That's because they're well priced, good quality sandals, that leave awesome prints in the sand AND the're just as good as the best sandals on earth except, we use 50% of our profits to protect endangered animals and you think that's pretty rad? 

When do I get to pick the Zlopz I want?

Once the campaign has ended, we'll be able to get the right tooling to create the best sandals we can possibly make. Once we have finalized the prototypes, you'll get an email that will show you exactly what the final products are going to look like. After you've decided which pair you LOVE the most, you'll get to choose the size you want. If we're lucky and reach our goal of $500,000, you'll also have the option of choosing Kidz Zlopz. 

If I choose the “Herd of Zlopz” perk, can I choose different sizes and types of Zlopz?

Indeed, you can choose from 6 different sizes, 6 different types and whether they're for a male or female human being. 

What if Zlopz do not reach their funding goal?

We are running a fixed funding campaign so, if we don't reach our target, we won't receive any of the funds and we'll be super bummed! 

Can I place an international order?

Yes. If you live outside North America, Europe, South Africa or Australia please add:

 $20 to your order if you ordered 1 pairs of Zlopz. 

$30 to your order if you ordered 2 pairs of Zlopz.

$50 to your order if you ordered 6 pairs of Zlopz.

How does Zlopz manage their Marketing Footprint?

Zlopz takes every effort to minimise our footprint, not just when making our products, but always. Our campaign relies heavily on digital platforms to minimise the usage of natural resources, and we are working flipping hard to ensure that we keep our footprint to an absolute minimum whenever we can. However, we do not claim, nor do we think it is achievable at this time, to create awareness and engagement of so many people on environmental issues with a zero footprint, but that is our aim.

How will backers be involved in the environmental voting process?

You decide which animal you want to support AND you will have a say in how we go about saving that animal. After our campaign has come to an end, you will get to cast your vote on which BIG Ideas, you think we should get behind, to protect the animal that you have chosen.

One vote for every pair of Zlopz you purchase. 

Where can I pre-order Zlopz after the campaign has closed?

On our homepage - www.zlopz.org

Why the name Zlopz?

Z = last letter in the alphabet and 

2015 = our last chance to save some of these endangered animals. 

In South Africa we call Sandals - Slops.

Z + Slops = Zlopz, on your feet.

Who do I contact if I have a question about my contribution?

If you have a question about a perk, shipping address or need to provide additional information for your contribution, please send an email to HEY@zlopz.org 


Why give 50% of the profits away?

At the end of the day we all just want to be happy.

We believe that the easiest path to happiness, is through giving.

We think, this makes us 50% closer to achieving that goal,

while maintaining a profitable business, that only impacts the world positively.


We live in the most critical time of our planets history. 

Through Crowdfunding, we can turn our dreams into reality. 

Dreamers change the world. 


You awesome human.

2015 = our last chance to save some of these endangered animals.

Z + Slops = Zlopz, on your feet.
Who do I contact if I have a question about my contribution?
If you have a question about a perk, shipping address or need to provide additional information for your contribution, please send an email to HEY@zlopz.org 




Why give 50% of the profits away?
At the end of the day we all just want to be happy.
We believe that the easiest path to happiness, is through giving.
We think, this makes us 50% closer to achieving that goal,
while maintaining a profitable business, that only impacts the world positively.


We live in the most critical time of our planets history. 


Through Crowdfunding, we can turn our dreams into reality. 


Dreamers change the world. 





You awesome human.

story:
SILISKIN® GLASS 

Safe | Clean | Green

Several years ago, we were shocked to learn about all the toxic chemicals that have been found in plastic. When it came to our kids, it seemed that everything they used was plastic especially in feeding and drink ware. So we started our company Silikids® making accessories out of silicone. We wanted to provide a safer alternative to plastic and make glass the 'norm again... 
 
 
 
 

Introducing the Siliskin® Glass...

  • Perfect for kids who are ready for a “big kid” cup.
  • Little hands can grip better and no more sweaty, slippery glass.
  • New patent pending Siliskin® design with built in shock absorption to help protect the glass from breakage and provide better grip.
  • Our patent pending Siliskin® is capable of dropping and bouncing from extreme heights.

 The Siliskin® Glass is:

  • Encased in a 100% food grade silicone skin.
  • Dishwasher, freezer, and microwave safe.
  • You can even boil it to sterilize. 

 

The Siliskin® Glass: It's almost here!

  • Prototypes are complete.
  • We have secured manufacturing for the Siliskin and glass source.
  • The funds raised will go towards making the production tool for the Siliskin® and placing the initial order. 
  • Our supporters will be the FIRST to pre-order and recieve this awesome glass as well as participate in chosing the final colors! (We'll send out a survey at the end.)

Less Plastic Please...

Plastics contain chemicals. Some most common are bisphenol-A (BPA), PVC and Phthalates. These chemicals, which have been linked to diabetes, heart disease and cancer, migrate out of the plastic and into the foods and drinks we consume. Not only does plastic degrade quickly, but heat from the dishwasher can also break it down. After prolonged or multiple uses, the surface becomes a coarse haven for bacteria and mold to hide. There is also a terrible environmental impact because so many plastic items aren't recycled, and end up in landfills and oceans.

  • The Siliskin® Glass brings the basics of glass back to the table.
  • Reusable and recyclable. No need for so much excess waste.
  • In the end it doesn't get easier or cleaner than silicone + glass.

 

Spread the Love...

Tell your family, friends and neighbors about the Siliskin Glass! Here's how to help:

  • Like us on our Facebook page.
  • Post our Indiegogo link on your social network sites.
  • Follow Indiegogo's networking tools.

Please note, that any contribution over $25 will automatically receive a set of the Siliskin Glasses even if an annonymous donnation or at the "no perks" level - We are thankful to you all!

By helping to support our campaign and spreading the word you will help make this project a reality. Thank you!

 

Shipping: We ship worldwide!

US shipping is included for the first three perks. For Boutique, through Distributor perks, the US and International shipping cost will vary. An email will be sent to the address on the your Indiegogo account requesting a shipping fee using PayPal. International shipments will be via UPS. For international shipments, UPS is required to prevent packages from being lost and to provide accurate tracking information.
If you're interested, please email us at info@silikids.com with your country and city and we will get you a quote.

story:
Short Summary

Hello I am Conley Giles a member of the Lean Invention G & H product development team.  We have been developing products and services for the past 30 years. 

We were approached by a client to help to address the challenges she experiences in her daily routine to get out the door.  After getting insights and suggestions from ladies via crowdsourcing we found one of the biggest time consumers was hair care, makeup and foggy mirrors.  We took all of these concerns into consideration and The uVu Styling Station was born.  It enables "hands free" hair drying/styling, hands free mirror defogging and keeps everything in one organized/compact space.  We created a few prototypes and the feedback has been great. I recently went to China to finalize the product design and to setup manufacturing.  We are now ready to make it available to IndieGoGo supporters.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is where we are at:  We have already invested thousands of dollars to research and develop the product.   We then set out to find the best blowdryer manufacturer in China along with another factory to make the stand.  After visiting the factories we were able to secure great manufacturing partners.  We have filed our patent application, shot our video, created the campaign,  and now we have launched. 

So now, in order to fund the first production run we need to raise $39,000.  We will use these funds to produce the uVu Styling Station fixture, manufacture the uVu 2200 Pro salon quality blow dryer, detachable mirror and attachable brackets. 

We have created some great perks so that you can be one of the first to own a uVu Styling Station.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • We have greatly reduced the risks associated with this product by personally visiting the factories in China and establishing a solid relationship with our manufacturing partners.  We will return to China when we begin our production run to assure that you get a great product.  We were careful in selecting highly experienced and established factories with great track records.

story:
#INDIEGOGO X SEESUN B:CON

We always think and think how to make/design more comfortable and functional glasses for over 30 years. Just the thing we want is that end-users are satisfied with our item and we would like to get a praise from them. That's all. so through Indiegogo, We shows advanced smart glasses to you and would like to have any feedback from you.

 

 

FEATURED ON :

INTRODUCING SEESUN B:CON

Forget the poorly functioning bone conduction sunglasses of the past. SEESUN B:CON takes bone conduction wearable technology to the next level!

 

 

 

 

SEESUN B:CON uses bone conduction audio technology to transfer stereo sound to your inner ear without the use of earbuds. Your ears remain unplugged, so you can listen to music, answer calls, enjoy safer outdoor activities, and amplify your daily life.

The SEESUN B:CON is a light-weight wireless headset sunglasses that uses Bluetooth technology and Bone conduction transducer. 

-Bone conduction technology  

-Adjustable BTC unit

-Easy one-touch control button  

-Ergonomic Design  

-UV 400 and TAC Polarized Lens Premium quality glasses

 

 

FISHING

 

CYCLE

 

GAME

 

 
 
 
  • One step Bluetooth connects with SEESUN. It is freedom from wires. 
  • Drive, run, cycle, sail, fish, hunt, ski, ride etc. with your ear 100% open to hearing every sound around you.

 

EASY PAIRING

  1.  Press power button for 4 seconds to power on.
  2.  If it is your first time paring the device it will automatically enter pairing mode.
  3.  If it has been paired but no paired device is in range it will enter Pairing mode after 10 seconds
  4.  The LED indicator will flicker a red and a blue light.
  5. On the device you wish to pair, find the bluetooth menu and “search for” or “add” new devices
  6.  Select “B.CON-10” From the list of devices             
  7. Once pairing is complete you will hear an announcement and led light will show a blue light.

 

EASY BUTTON CONTROL

You can control all functions with only 3 control buttons!

 

# WHAT'S DIFFERENT WITH OTHER BONE CONDUCTION GLASSES?

“SEESUN B:CON” is a Smart Bluetooth sunglass with bone conduction technology. With SEESUN’s outstanding sound quality, certified bone conduction unit, and rotational BCT, you can enjoy music and talk on the phone without blocking out external sound. The certified bone conduction unit rotates to perfectly fit different users and transmits clear sound by adhering close to your skin. The open-ear solution allows you to be aware of your surroundings and prevents hearing damage because it does not directly stimulate your ear.

VOLUME LEVEL CONTROL

PATENTED ROTATIONAL BAR

Do you think all people have same face shape? look at your friend next by you. people have different face shapes so the points well heard by bone conduction should be different. here is the solution. you can adjust rotational bar to fit correct point on you by 9 steps.

SAFE LISTENING

Why are you still wearing earphones?  Free your ears with SEESUN while increasing your personal safety.

By being able to hear the bone conduction vibrations as well as external noise, B:CON can prevent accidents that can happen during your daily life, while you drive, and participate in recreational activities etc. Hands-free and fuss-free, this is a safer way to enjoy life.

 

Technology sound system boasts superior sound quality

Many bone conduction wearable technology users are often disappointed by the sound quality of the product. However, SEESUN B:CON’s speakers were developed in a professional bone conduction lab to create the clearest sound for you. Experience the world’s best digital tuning technology through SEESUN B:CON.

 

SMART CONTROL

The Bluetooth feature allows you to make a phone call at the touch of a button in the midst of any activity. The premium quality MIC system, noise canceling system, and bone conduction technology creates freedom of conversation.

 

Bone conduction is the transmission of sound to the inner ear through the bones of the skull. This can be used with individuals with normal or impaired hearing. Bone conduction is one reason why a person's voice sounds different to them when it is recorded and played back. Because the skull conducts lower frequencies better than air, people perceive their own voices to be lower and fuller than others do, and a recording of one's own voice frequently sounds higher than one expects it to sound. Musicians may use bone conduction while tuning stringed instruments to a tuning fork. After the fork starts vibrating, placing it in the mouth with the stem between the back teeth ensures that one continues to hear the note via bone conduction, and both hands are free to do the tuning.

 

SEESUN B:CON has been KC and FCC qualified and has proven its safety and functionality (currently obtaining CE qualification).

PREMIUM HD POLARIZED LENS 

THE U.S.FCC CERTIFICATION

 

 

SEESUN has tested by lots of users through big exhibitions in the world and a universal fit has been developed by their feedback. and BCT unit on temple can reduce pressure on your head. 

SKETCH

2D DRAWING

DESIGN

Why do other sunglasses give only one style?
B:CON provides two styles of front option for your style. 

#B:CON 10

#B:CON-10 B

 

 

 

DIMENSIONS

#B:CON 10

#B:CON 10-B

 

What you'll choose.

you can choose frame color firstly and then choose lens colors. but model B:CON 10-B has only perfect black color in this time.

 

FRAME COLOR OPTION

1.Model : B:CON 10

#Perfect Black(Front:Black / Temple:Black / Rotational bar:Black)

#Black & White (Front:Shiny Black / Temple:White / Rotational bar:Black)

#White & Black (Front:White / Temple:Black/ Rotational bar:White)

2.Model : B:CON 10-B  (Only one color available)

#Perfect Black(Front:Black / Temple:Black / Rotational bar:Black)

Lens Color options

#Polarized Smog

#Polarized Blue Mirror

#Polarized Gold Mirror

What you'll receive.

 

 

While designing and making glasses for over 30 years, we always asked ourselves, “How could we design more comfortable, higher quality glasses?” And even until this day, we are still asking ourselves that question. 

Our company has always wanted to be acknowledged for designing glasses that are ahead of its time, one that everyone will be able to feel good when they wear them. Our interest in wearable technology glasses started about five years ago when wearable technology was still fresh and uncommon. For a company that only produced fashion glasses and sunglasses, the idea of designing smart glasses might have seemed like an impossible challenge. 

The first design was made after countless trials and errors, but we could not produce it because we were not satisfied with the sound quality. For two more years, our company went on a hunt to find the best sound producing technology that could suit the vision for our wearable smart glasses. Now, we are proud to introduce you to the new 2018 SEESUN B:CON through Indiegogo. We kindly ask for thoughts and reviews on the new design. 

Thank you again for the insightful feedback and encouragements that made this upgrade possible.

 

 

 

Ready for Production

SEESUN B:CON is developed completely and had some campaigns already. we are ready to have mass production after the Indiegogo campaign has ended. if we can't meet a promised delivery date, we make sure to refund 100% immediately.

Where do we ship to?

We will ship out SEESUN B:CON to Worldwide, No matter where you are !

 

Risks and challenges

SEESUN is a professional eyeglass design company with 30+ years of experience in Korea. Our team is passionate about the Bone Conduction Sunglasses. We have tested this proven product and know you will love it! 
We will do everything we can to make sure your pre-order is delivered on time as scheduled. If there are any delays we will work with our backers and be fully transparent during the entire process. 
Thank you for your support! :)
story_txt:

story:
UPDATE
You can now pre-order our exclusive "Chicken Tajine ‪#‎sneakerbabouch‬" (limited to 10 pairs only!) designed in collaboration with Graffiti Artist CEET.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


We have been working on this project for the last couple of years and are very excited to introduce our products. We are now on Indiegogo as we need your support to take it to the next level!


Concept

LookMyBabouch [LMB] is more than just another shoe brand. Founded by Nacim Ben Moussa, a French “nomad entrepreneur” living between France and Asia, the brand is the result of a true melting pot taking its energy and inspirations from Africa, Europe and Asia.

Fusing the concept of traditional Tunisian leather slippers (aka “Babouch”) and an icon from urban culture - the original canvas sneaker, LookMyBabouch created the “sneaker-babouch”. The classic pointed toe shape of the slipper is retained but the footwear is remade into urban style sneakers that will take you from the busy alleys of the medina to concrete pavements in New York or cobblestone pathways of Paris.

Find us on:        


Our Story

Nacim has always drawn inspiration from his French and Tunisian roots. In 2011, the dynamic energy of Tunisian Jasmine Revolution fuelled the unconventional entrepreneur to write the first line in the story of LookMyBabouch. Helped by a few friends, he created a shoe that speaks to different cultures.

We’ve spent the last couple of years working on this project: sourcing materials, finding suppliers, developing our brand and designing our collection.

We love wearing our shoes and we’ve gotten great feedback from people that already purchased our sneakers.


Our Products

The “sneaker-babouch” is unisex and designed for comfort. Light cotton canvas sheathes the feet and allows optimal breathability.

The insole is crafted from soft mouton leather and printed with the logo of the model. The cow leather shoe tab (or decorative tongue) is embossed with the LookMyBabouch logo making it easy to slip it on and off. The outsole is made of EVA mixed with rubber to ensure good grip on most surfaces.

The products are delivered with a cotton bag to transport your shoes easily.


What your money goes towards

We already invested in the research and development of the sneaker-babouch, and have completed a few productions for the past few years. Most of the money you pledge will go directly toward covering the costs of manufacturing the next batch (including the new models) and that include: raw materials, cut/stitching/etc and shipping. Rest of the money will be used to promote our product, introduce new colors and designs, attend trade shows and pay the campaign fees (Indiegogo & Paypal).


Models

> Slip-On Canvas Sneakers

> Printed Slip-On Canvas Sneakers (NEW)


Featured in

     

       


Our Perks

NOTE: All rewards include FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.

Please see the reward levels below for the different pledge amounts. We will send a survey via INDIEGOGO to all our backers at the end of the campaign to ask for your shoe size, model preferences and delivery address.

Level 1: 1 USD > BIG THANK YOU!

Level 2: 5 USD > Five (5) exclusive stickers // Free shipping worldwide

Level 3: 30 USD > One (1) Limited Edition Cotton t-shirt (Female) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 4: 30 USD > One (1) Limited Edition Cotton t-shirt (Male) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 5: 45 USD > One (1) pair of sneakers (to choose between “Touareg” or “Harissa”) (retail price: 59 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 6: 55 USD or more > One (1) pair of sneakers (to choose between “fruité noir” and “KIL2M”) (retail price: 69 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 7: 80 USD > Two (2) pairs of sneakers (1 pair of “Harissa” and 1 pair of “Touareg”) (retail price: 118 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 8: 95 USD > Two (2) pairs of sneakers (1 pair of “fruité noir” and 1 pair of “KIL2M”) (retail price: 128 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 9: 160 USD > Four (4) pairs of sneakers (1x“Harissa”, 1x“Touareg”, 1x“fruité noir” and 1x“KIL2M”) (retail price: 256 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 10: 320 USD > Nine (9) pairs of sneakers (complete collection) (retail price: 445 USD) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 11: 1000 USD > Be part of our team during the development of LMB’s 2016 Collection + LMB’s complete collection (9 pairs of sneakers) + 20% lifetime discount!

Level 12: 5200 USD > We will fly you to Hong Kong to meet the team and customize your own pair of sneaker-babouch! + 20% lifetime discount!

Challenges

This will not be our first time producing the slippers, so we are now very familiar with the production process, but there can always be unforeseen challenges during the process that may cause delays. We take every possible precaution to reduce this risk to the minimum and we’ll keep our backers continually updated. We want to be fully transparent with people who have put their trust in this project.

Delivery

All rewards include FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING and will be fulfilled in-house (using Hong-Kong shipping services) and shipped in July 2015, so you can be sure to have your slippers in time for summer.

Please note that if you live outside Hong Kong, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Timeline

>> We will update you frequently about our progress, and if there any blips along the way, we will let you know! <<


Customer reviews

[FR]“Bonjour, je viens de découvrir la marque, bravo pour cette belle initiative, et surtout d'avoir réussi un mix entre les deux cultures, Bonne continuation”

[EN] “Awesome concept and products, I want to buy every color!“

[EN] “Babouches tested and approved for hiking in the Plitvice park in Croatia!”

[EN] “Those shoes are so comfy and love the red so much!”


FAQ

- How can I choose my shoe size and/or model?
We will send an email to the backers during week 1 (see the timeline) to ask for the desired shoe size(s) and model(s).
- If I ordered more than 1 pair, can I choose different shoe sizes?
Yes, of course! We will send you an email to ask about your requirements in terms of shoe sizes.


Want to help us?

We gladly appreciate any kind of support, please feel free to:
- Buy perks on this page (this is a great opportunity to get exclusivities and pre-order products),
- Share our campaign through social medias (please add #babouchrevolution and/or #sneakerbabouch on your posts),
- Post this campaign on your website/blog, and don't forget to talk about it to your family and friends! Thank you!

Contact us

Looking for help? Enquiries? or just want to share some comments?
Please, send us an email: contact@lookmybabouch.com



THANK YOU!

Find out more at www.lookmybabouch.com

Follow us on:       



© Copyright 2015 / LookMyBabouch is a trademark of LookMy Ltd. All rights reserved.
story_txt:
UPDATEYou can now pre-order our exclusive "Chicken Tajine ‪#‎sneakerbabouch‬" (limited to 10 pairs only!) designed in collaboration with Graffiti Artist CEET.




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We have been working on this project for the last couple of years and are very excited to introduce our products. We are now on Indiegogo as we need your support to take it to the next level!




ConceptLookMyBabouch [LMB] is more than just another shoe brand. Founded by Nacim Ben Moussa, a French “nomad entrepreneur” living between France and Asia,
the brand is the result of a true melting pot taking its energy and
inspirations from Africa, Europe and Asia.
Fusing the concept of traditional Tunisian leather slippers (aka “Babouch”) and an icon from urban culture - the original canvas sneaker, LookMyBabouch created the “sneaker-babouch”. The classic pointed toe shape of the slipper is retained but the footwear is remade into urban style sneakers that will take you from the busy alleys of the medina to concrete pavements in New York or cobblestone pathways of Paris.

Find us on: 

      






Our Story


Nacim has always drawn inspiration from his
French and Tunisian roots. In 2011, the dynamic energy of Tunisian Jasmine
Revolution fuelled the unconventional entrepreneur to write the first line in
the story of LookMyBabouch. Helped by a few friends, he created a shoe that
speaks to different cultures.

We’ve spent
the last couple of years working on this project: sourcing materials, finding
suppliers, developing our brand and designing our collection.
We love wearing our shoes and we’ve gotten great feedback from people
that already purchased our sneakers.

Our Products



The “sneaker-babouch” is unisex and designed
for comfort. Light cotton canvas sheathes the feet and allows optimal breathability.
The insole is crafted from soft mouton leather and printed with the logo of the model. The cow leather shoe tab (or decorative tongue) is embossed with the LookMyBabouch logo making it easy to
slip it on and off. The outsole is made of EVA mixed with rubber to ensure good
grip on most surfaces.
The products are delivered with a cotton bag to transport your
shoes easily.



What your money goes towards
We already invested in the research and development of the sneaker-babouch, and have completed a few productions for the past few years. Most of the money you pledge will go directly toward covering the costs of manufacturing the next batch (including the new models) and that include: raw materials, cut/stitching/etc and shipping. Rest of the money will be used to promote our product, introduce new colors and designs, attend trade shows and pay the campaign fees (Indiegogo & Paypal).



Models

> Slip-On Canvas Sneakers



> Printed Slip-On Canvas Sneakers (NEW)



Featured in

     

       







Our Perks


NOTE:
All rewards include FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.
Please see the reward levels below for the
different pledge amounts. We will send a survey via INDIEGOGO to all our
backers at the end of the campaign to ask for your shoe size, model preferences
and delivery address.
Level 1: 1 USD > BIG THANK YOU!

Level 2: 5 USD > Five (5) exclusive stickers // Free shipping worldwideLevel 3: 30 USD > One (1) Limited Edition Cotton t-shirt (Female) // Free shipping worldwide

Level 4: 30 USD > One (1) Limited Edition Cotton t-shirt (Male) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 5: 45 USD > One (1) pair of sneakers (to choose between “Touareg” or “Harissa”) (retail price: 59 USD) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 6: 55 USD or more > One (1) pair of sneakers 
(to
choose between “fruité noir” and “KIL2M”) (retail price: 69 USD) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 7: 80 USD > Two (2) pairs of sneakers (1 pair of “Harissa” and 1 pair of “Touareg”) (retail price: 118 USD) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 8: 95 USD > Two (2) pairs of sneakers (1 pair of “fruité noir” and 1 pair of “KIL2M”) (retail price: 128 USD) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 9: 160 USD > Four (4) pairs of sneakers (1x“Harissa”, 1x“Touareg”, 1x“fruité noir” and 1x“KIL2M”) (retail price: 256 USD) // Free shipping worldwide


Level 10: 320 USD > Nine (9) pairs of sneakers (complete collection) (retail price: 445 USD) // Free shipping worldwide
Level 11: 1000 USD > Be part of our team
during the development of LMB’s 2016 Collection + LMB’s complete collection (9 pairs of sneakers) + 20% lifetime discount!
Level 12: 5200 USD > We will fly you to Hong Kong to meet the team and customize your own pair of sneaker-babouch! + 20% lifetime discount!





Challenges
This will not be our first time producing the
slippers, so we are now very familiar with the production process, but there
can always be unforeseen challenges during the process that may cause delays.
We take every possible precaution to reduce this risk to the minimum and we’ll
keep our backers continually updated. We want to be fully transparent with people who have put their trust in this project.
Delivery
All rewards
include FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING and will be fulfilled in-house (using Hong-Kong shipping services) and
shipped in July 2015, so you can be sure to have your slippers in time for
summer.
Please note that if you live outside Hong Kong, you
will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.
Timeline







>>
We will update you frequently about our progress, and if there any blips along
the way, we will let you know! <<

Yes, of course! We will send you an email to ask about your requirements in terms of shoe sizes.
